en-mt: In patients with severe cases, the level of D-dimer, a fibrin degradation product present in the blood, was increased, and the lymphocyte count was significantly decreased.

sourceString: Abnormalities in chest radiography are found in most COVID-19 patients and featured by bilateral patchy shadows or ground glass opacity in the lungs.
targetString: Keabnormalan dalam radiografi dada ditemui dalam kebanyakan pesakit COVID-19 dan ditunjukkan oleh bayang-bayang bertompok bilateral atau kelegapan kaca tanah dalam paru-paru.
en-mt: Abnormalities in chest radiographs are found in most patients with COVID-19 and are indicated by bilateral patchy shadows or ground-glass opacities in the lungs.

sourceString: Patients often develop an atypical pneumonia, acute lung injury, and acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: Pesakit biasanya mengalami pneumonia atipik, kecederaan paru-paru akut dan sindrom sukar bernafas akut (ARDS).
en-mt: Patients usually suffer from atypical pneumonia, acute lung injury and acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).

sourceString: When ARDS happens, uncontrolled inflammation, fluid accumulation, and progressive fibrosis severely compromise the gas exchange.
targetString: Apabila ARDS berlaku, keradangan yang tidak terkawal, pengumpulan cecair dan fibrosis yang pantas menjejaskan pertukaran gas dengan teruk.
en-mt: When ARDS occurs, uncontrolled inflammation, fluid accumulation and rapid fibrosis severely impair gas exchange.

sourceString: Dysfunction of type-I and type-II pneumocytes decreases the surfactant level and increases surface tension, thus reducing the ability of the lungs to expand and heightening the risk of lung collapse.
targetString: Disfungsi pneumosit jenis-I dan jenis-II mengurangi tahap surfaktan dan meningkatkan ketegangan permukaan, sekaligus mengurangi keupayaan paru-paru untuk mengembang dan meningkatkan risiko kegagalan paru-paru.
en-mt: Dysfunction of type-I and type-II pneumocytes reduces surfactant levels and increases surface tension, simultaneously reducing the ability of the lungs to expand and increasing the risk of lung failure.

sourceString: Therefore, the worst chest radiographic findings often parallel the most severe extent of the disease.
targetString: Oleh itu, penemuan radiografi dada yang buruk biasanya selari dengan tahap paling teruk penyakit itu.
en-mt: Therefore, adverse chest radiographic findings usually coincide with the most severe stage of the disease.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, the first pathological analysis of COVID-19 demonstrated the desquamation of pneumocytes, hyaline membrane formation, and interstitial lymphocyte infiltration, and multinucleated syncytial cells in the lungs of a patient who died of the disease, consistent with the pathology of viral infection and ARDS and similar to that of SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: Pada 18 Februari 2020, analisis patologi pertama bagi COVID-19 menunjukkan deskuamasi pneumosit, pembentukan membran hialin dan penyusupan limfosit interstitial serta sel sinsitium multinukleat dalam paru-paru pesakit yang mati akibat penyakit itu, konsisten dengan patologi jangkitan virus dan ARDS serta serupa dengan patologi pesakit SARS dan MERS.
en-mt: On February 18, 2020, the first pathological analysis of COVID-19 showed desquamation of pneumocytes, hyaline membrane formation and infiltration of interstitial lymphocytes and multinucleated syncytial cells in the lungs of patients who died of the disease, consistent with the pathology of viral infection and ARDS and similar to the pathology of patients SARS and MERS.

sourceString: The detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA via reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) was used as the major criteria for the diagnosis of COVID-19.
targetString: Pengesanan SARS-CoV-2 RNA melalui reaksi berantai polimerase transkripsi-terbalik (RT-PCR) telah digunakan sebagai kriteria utama untuk diagnosis COVID-19.
en-mt: Detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA by reverse transcription-polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) has been used as the main criterion for the diagnosis of COVID-19.

sourceString: However, due to the high false-negative rate, which may accelerate the epidemic, clinical manifestations started to be used for diagnosis (which no longer solely relied on RT-PCR) in China on February 13, 2020.
targetString: Walau bagaimanapun, akibat kadar negatif palsu yang tinggi, yang mungkin melajukan epidemik, manifestasi klinikal mula digunakan untuk diagnosis (yang tidak lagi semata-mata bergantung pada RT-PCR) di China pada 13 Februari 2020.
en-mt: However, due to the high false-negative rate, which may accelerate the epidemic, clinical manifestations began to be used for diagnosis (which no longer solely relies on RT-PCR) in China on February 13, 2020.

sourceString: A similar situation also occurred with the diagnosis of SARS.
targetString: Situasi yang serupa juga berlaku dengan diagnosis SARS.
en-mt: A similar situation also occurred with the diagnosis of SARS.

sourceString: Therefore, a combination of disease history, clinical manifestations, laboratory tests, and radiological findings is essential and imperative for making an effective diagnosis.
targetString: Oleh itu, kombinasi sejarah penyakit, manifestasi klinikal, ujian makmal dan penemuan radiologi adalah penting serta imperatif untuk membuat diagnosis yang berkesan.
en-mt: Therefore, a combination of disease history, clinical manifestations, laboratory tests and radiological findings is important and imperative to make an effective diagnosis.

sourceString: On February 14, 2020, the Feng Zhang group described a protocol of using the CRISPR-based SHERLOCK technique to detect SARS-CoV-2, which detects synthetic SARS-CoV-2 RNA fragments at 20 × 10-18 mol/L to 200 × 10-18 mol/L (10-100 copies per microliter of input) using a dipstick in less than an hour without requiring elaborate instrumentation.
targetString: Pada 14 Februari 2020, kumpulan Feng Zhang menerangkan protol penggunaan teknik SHERLOCK berasaskan CRISPR untuk mengesan SARS-CoV-2, yang mengesan fragmen SARS-CoV-2 RNA sintetik pada 20 × 10-18 mol/L hingga 200 × 10-18 mol/L (10-100 salinan setiap mikroliter input) menggunakan batang celup dalam masa kurang daripada sejam tanpa memerlukan peralatan yang rumit.
en-mt: On February 14, 2020, Feng Zhang's group described the protocol of using the CRISPR-based SHERLOCK technique to detect SARS-CoV-2, which detects SARS-CoV-2 synthetic RNA fragments at 20 × 10-18 mol/L to 200 × 10-18 mol/ L (10-100 copies per microliter of input) using dip sticks in less than an hour without the need for complicated equipment.

sourceString: Hopefully, the new technique can dramatically enhance the sensitivity and convenience if verified in clinical samples.
targetString: Semoga teknik baharu itu dapat meningkatkan kepekaan dan kemudahan dengan ketara jika disahkan dalam sampel klinikal.
en-mt: Hopefully the new technique can significantly improve sensitivity and convenience if validated in clinical samples.

sourceString: Due to the lack of experience with the novel CoV, physicians can mainly provide supportive care to COVID-19 patients, while attempting a variety of therapies that have been used or proposed before for the treatment of other CoVs such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV and other viral diseases (Table ​(Table2).2).
targetString: Akibat kekurangan pengalaman dengan novel CoV, doktor secara umumnya boleh menyediakan rawatan sokongan kepada pesakit COVID-19, sambil mencuba pelbagai terapi yang telah digunakan atau dicadangkan sebelum itu untuk rawatan CoV lain seperti SARS-CoV dan MERS-CoV serta penyakit virus yang lain (Jadual ​(Jadual2).2).
en-mt: Due to the lack of experience with novel CoVs, doctors can generally provide supportive treatment to patients with COVID-19, while trying various therapies that have been used or proposed before for the treatment of other CoVs such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV and other viral diseases (Table ​(Table2).2).

sourceString: These therapies include current and potential treatments with antiviral drugs, immunosuppressants, steroids, plasma from recovered patients, Chinese medicine, and psychological support.
targetString: Terapi ini termasuklah rawatan semasa dan berpotensi dengan dadah antivirus, imunosupresan, steroid, plasma daripada pesakit yang telah sembuh, perubatan Cina dan sokongan psikologi.
en-mt: These therapies include current and potential treatment with antiviral drugs, immunosuppressants, steroids, plasma from recovered patients, Chinese medicine and psychological support.

sourceString: Even plasma from recovered patients was proposed to be used for treatment.
targetString: Malah plasma daripada pesakit yang telah sembuh turut dicadangkan untuk digunakan bagi rawatan.
en-mt: Even plasma from recovered patients is also suggested to be used for treatment.

sourceString: Pharmaceutical companies are racing to develop antibodies and vaccines against the virus.
targetString: Syarikat farmaseutikal berlumba-lumba untuk membangunkan antibodi dan vaksin bagi virus itu.
en-mt: Pharmaceutical companies are racing to develop antibodies and vaccines for the virus.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 mainly attacks the lungs in the beginning and probably also attacks, to a lesser degree, other organs that express ACE2, such as the gastrointestinal system and the kidneys.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 biasanya menyerang paru-paru pada peringkat permulaan dan mungkin juga menyerang, pada tahap yang lebih rendah, organ lain yang menghasilkan ACE2, seperti sistem gastrousus dan buah pinggang.
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 usually attacks the lungs at an early stage and may also attack, to a lesser extent, other organs that produce ACE2, such as the gastrointestinal system and kidneys.

sourceString: Nevertheless, respiratory dysfunction and failure are the major threat to the patients and the major cause of death.
targetString: Namun begitu, disfungsi dan kegagalan pernafasan ialah ancaman besar kepada pesakit serta merupakan punca utama kematian.
en-mt: However, respiratory dysfunction and failure is a major threat to patients and is a major cause of death.

sourceString: Thus, respiratory support is critical to relieve the symptoms and save lives and includes general oxygen therapy, high-flow oxygen, noninvasive ventilation, and invasive mechanical ventilation depending on the severity of the disease.
targetString: Oleh itu, sokongan pernafasan adalah penting untuk melegakan simptom dan menyelamatkan nyawa serta termasuk terapi oksigen umum, oksigen aliran tinggi, ventilasi tak invasif dan ventilasi mekanikal invasif bergantung pada tahap keterukan penyakit itu.
en-mt: Therefore, respiratory support is essential to relieve symptoms and save lives and includes general oxygen therapy, high-flow oxygen, non-invasive ventilation and invasive mechanical ventilation depending on the severity of the disease.

sourceString: Patients with severe respiratory symptoms have to be supported by extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), a modified cardiopulmonary bypass technique used for the treatment of life-threatening cardiac or respiratory failure.
targetString: Pesakit dengan simptom pernafasan yang teruk perlu disokong oleh pengoksigenan membran ekstrakorporeum (ECMO), teknik penggrafan kardiopulmonari yang diubah suai yang digunakan untuk rawatan kegagalan kardium atau pernafasan.
en-mt: Patients with severe respiratory symptoms should be supported by extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), a modified cardiopulmonary bypass technique used for the treatment of cardiac or respiratory failure.

sourceString: In addition, the maintenance of electrolyte balance, the prevention and treatment of secondary infection and septic shock, and the protection of the functions of the vital organs are also essential for SARS-CoV-2 patients.
targetString: Selain itu, pengekalan keseimbangan elektrolit, pencegahan dan rawatan jangkitan sekunder serta kejutan sepsis, dan pelindungan fungsi organ penting juga perlu untuk pesakit SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: In addition, maintenance of electrolyte balance, prevention and treatment of secondary infections and septic shock, and protection of vital organ functions are also necessary for SARS-CoV-2 patients.

sourceString: It has been known that a cytokine storm results from an overreaction of the immune system in SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: Telah diketahui bahawa ribut sitokin terhasil daripada tindak balas berlebihan sistem imun dalam pesakit SARS dan MERS.
en-mt: It is known that a cytokine storm results from an overreaction of the immune system in SARS and MERS patients.

sourceString: Cytokine storm is a form of systemic inflammatory response featured by the release of a series of cytokines including TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, and MCP-1.
targetString: Ribut sitokin ialah sebentuk respons keradangan sistemik yang dicirikan oleh pelepasan siri sitokin termasuk TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, dan MCP-1.
en-mt: A cytokine storm is a systemic inflammatory response characterized by the release of a series of cytokines including TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, and MCP-1.

sourceString: These cytokines induce immune cells to release a vast number of free radicals which are the major cause of ARDS and multiple organ failure.
targetString: Sitokin ini mencetuskan sel imun untuk melepaskan bilangan yang besar radikal bebas yang merupakan punca utama ARDS dan kegagalan pelbagai organ.
en-mt: These cytokines trigger immune cells to release large numbers of free radicals which are the main cause of ARDS and multi-organ failure.

sourceString: Immunosuppression is essential in the treatment of cytokine storms, especially in severe patients.
targetString: Pengimunotindasan adalah penting dalam rawatan ribut sitokin, terutama bagi pesakit yang parah.
en-mt: Immunosuppression is important in the treatment of cytokine storm, especially in critically ill patients.

sourceString: Corticosteroids and tocilizumab, an anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, have been used to treat cytokine storm.
targetString: Kortikosteroid dan tocilizumab, antibodi monoklonal anti-IL6, telah digunakan untuk merawat ribut sitokin.
en-mt: Corticosteroids and tocilizumab, an anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, have been used to treat cytokine storm.

sourceString: Other immunosuppression treatments for cytokine storm include the modulation of T cell-directed immune response; the blockade of IFN-γ, IL-1, and TNF; JAK inhibition; blinatumomab; suppressor of cytokine signaling 4; and HDAC inhibitors.
targetString: Rawatan imunotindasan lain untuk ribut sitokin termasuklah modulasi respons imun terarah sel-T; sekatan IFN-γ, IL-1, dan TNF; perencatan JAK; blinatumomab; penindas isyarat sitokin 4; dan perencatan HDAC.
en-mt: Other immunosuppressive treatments for cytokine storm include modulation of T-cell-directed immune responses; blockade of IFN-γ, IL-1, and TNF; JAK inhibition; blinatumomab; suppressor of cytokine signaling 4; and HDAC inhibition.

sourceString: Steroids, as immunosuppressants, were widely used in the treatment of SARS to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: Steroid, sebagai imunosupresan, telah digunakan secara meluas dalam merawat SARS untuk mengurangi keterukan kerosakan keradangan.
en-mt: Steroids, as immunosuppressants, have been widely used in the treatment of SARS to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.

sourceString: However, steroids at high dosages were not beneficial to severe lung injury in SARS and COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Namun begitu, steroid pada dos yang tinggi tidak bermanfaat untuk kecederaan paru-paru yang teruk dalam pesakit SARS dan COVID-19.
en-mt: However, steroids at high doses are not beneficial for severe lung injury in SARS and COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: Instead, they may cause severe side effects, especially avascular osteonecrosis, dramatically affecting the prognosis.
targetString: Sebaliknya, steroid pada dos yang tinggi boleh menyebabkan kesan sampingan yang teruk, terutamanya osteonekrosis avaskular, menjejaskan prognosis secara ketara.
en-mt: On the other hand, steroids at high doses can cause severe side effects, especially avascular osteonecrosis, significantly affecting the prognosis.

sourceString: Nevertheless, short courses of corticosteroids at low-to-moderate doses have been recommended to be used prudently for critically ill COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Namun, dos rendah hingga sederhana kortikosteroid untuk tempoh yang singkat telah disyorkan untuk digunakan secara berhati-hati bagi pesakit COVID-19 yang kritikal.
en-mt: However, low to moderate doses of corticosteroids for short periods have been recommended for cautious use in critically ill COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: At the time of writing, no effective antiviral therapy has been confirmed.
targetString: Semasa artikel ini ditulis, tiada terapi antivirus yang berkesan telah disahkan.
en-mt: At the time of this writing, no effective antiviral therapy has been confirmed.

sourceString: However, intravenous administration with remdesivir, a nucleotide analog, has been found to be efficacious in an American patient with COVID-19.
targetString: Namun, penggunaan intravena dengan remdesivir, satu analog nukleotida, telah didapati berkesan terhadap seorang pesakit Amerika yang dijangkiti COVID-19.
en-mt: However, intravenous use of remdesivir, a nucleotide analogue, has been found to be effective against an American patient infected with COVID-19.

sourceString: Remdesivir is a novel antiviral drug developed by Gilead initially for the treatment of diseases caused by Ebola and Marlburg viruses.
targetString: Remdesivir ialah dadah antivirus novel yang dibangunkan oleh Gilead pada awalnya untuk rawatan bagi penyakit yang disebabkan oleh virus Ebola dan Marlburg.
en-mt: Remdesivir is a novel antiviral drug developed by Gilead initially for the treatment of diseases caused by the Ebola and Marlburg viruses.

sourceString: Later, remdesivir also demonstrated possible inhibition of other single stranded RNA viruses including MERS and SARS viruses.
targetString: Kemudian, remdesivir juga menunjukkan kemungkinan perencatan virus RNA bebenang tunggal lain termasuk virus MERS dan SARS.
en-mt: Later, remdesivir also showed possible inhibition of other single-stranded RNA viruses including MERS and SARS viruses.

sourceString: Based on these, Gilead has provided the compound to China to conduct a pair of trials on SARS-CoV-2-infected individuals, and the results are highly anticipated.
targetString: Berdasarkan pemerhatian ini, Gilead telah memberikan campuran itu kepada China untuk menjalankan sepasang percubaan terhadap individu yang dijangkiti SARS-CoV-2, dan hasilnya sangat ditunggu-tunggu.
en-mt: Based on these observations, Gilead has given the mixture to China to conduct a pair of trials on individuals infected with SARS-CoV-2, and the results are eagerly awaited.

sourceString: In addition, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, and ribavirin have been suggested as potential therapies for patients with acute respiratory symptoms.
targetString: Selain itu, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, dan ribavirin telah dicadangkan sebagai terapi berpotensi untuk pesakit dengan simptom pernafasan akut.
en-mt: Additionally, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, and ribavirin have been suggested as potential therapies for patients with acute respiratory symptoms.

sourceString: Diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, liver damage, and other adverse reactions can occur following combined therapy with lopinavir/ritonavir.
targetString: Cirit-birit, loya, muntah-muntah, kerosakan hati dan kesan buruk lain boleh berlaku selepas terapi gabungan dengan lopinavir/ritonavir.
en-mt: Diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, liver damage and other adverse effects may occur after combination therapy with lopinavir/ritonavir.

sourceString: The interaction of these treatments with other drugs used in the patients should be monitored carefully.
targetString: Interaksi rawatan ini dengan dadah lain yang digunakan kepada pesakit harus dipantau dengan teliti.
en-mt: The interaction of this treatment with other drugs used in the patient should be carefully monitored.

sourceString: Plasma from recovered patients and antibody generation
targetString: Plasma daripada pesakit yang telah sembuh dan penjanaan antibodi
en-mt: Plasma from recovered patients and antibody generation

sourceString: The collection of the blood from patients who recovered from a contagious disease to treat other patients suffering from the same disease or to protect healthy individuals from catching the disease has a long history.
targetString: Pengumpulan darah daripada pesakit yang telah sembuh daripada penyakit berjangkit untuk merawat pesakit lain yang menghidap penyakit yang sama atau untuk melindungi individu yang sihat daripada dijangkiti penyakit itu mempunyai sejarah yang panjang.
en-mt: The collection of blood from patients who have recovered from an infectious disease to treat other patients with the same disease or to protect healthy individuals from contracting the disease has a long history.

sourceString: Indeed, recovered patients often have a relatively high level of antibodies against the pathogen in their blood.
targetString: Memang benar, pesakit yang telah sembuh biasanya mempunyai tahap antibodi yang relatif tinggi terhadap patogen dalam darah mereka.
en-mt: It is true that recovered patients usually have relatively high levels of antibodies against the pathogen in their blood.

sourceString: Antibodies are an immunoglobulin (Ig) produced by B lymphocytes to fight pathogens and other foreign objects and they recognize unique molecules in the pathogens and neutralize them directly.
targetString: Antibodi ialah imunoglobulin (Ig) yang dihasilkan oleh limfosit B untuk melawan patogen dan objek asing lain serta ia mengenal pasti molekul unik dalam patogen lalu meneutralkannya secara langsung.
en-mt: Antibodies are immunoglobulins (Ig) produced by B lymphocytes to fight pathogens and other foreign objects and they recognize unique molecules in pathogens and neutralize them directly.

sourceString: Based on this, plasma was collected from the blood of a group of patients who recovered from COVID-19 and was injected into 10 seriously ill patients.
targetString: Berdasarkan ini, plasma telah dikumpulkan daripada darah sekumpulan pesakit yang telah sembuh daripada COVID-19 dan telah disuntik kepada 10 pesakit yang dalam keadaan serius.
en-mt: Based on this, plasma was collected from the blood of a group of patients who had recovered from COVID-19 and was injected into 10 patients who were in a serious condition.

sourceString: Their symptoms improved within 24 hours, accompanied by reduced inflammation and viral loads and improved oxygen saturation in the blood.
targetString: Simptom mereka bertambah baik dalam masa 24 jam, disertai dengan keradangan dan beban virus yang berkurangan serta ketepuan yang meningkat dalam darah.
en-mt: Their symptoms improved within 24 hours, accompanied by reduced inflammation and viral load and increased saturation in the blood.

sourceString: However, verification and clarification are necessary to propose the method for large-scale use before specific therapies are not yet developed.
targetString: Namun begitu, pengesahan dan penjelasan diperlukan untuk mencadangkan kaedah tersebut bagi penggunaan skala besar sebelum terapi khusus yang belum dibangunkan lagi.
en-mt: However, validation and clarification are needed to recommend the method for large-scale use before specific therapies are yet to be developed.

sourceString: In addition, given the therapeutic effects, some disadvantages associated with the plasma should be considered carefully.
targetString: Selain itu, kerana adanya kesan terapeutik, beberapa keburukan yang dikaitkan dengan plasma itu harus dipertimbangkan dengn teliti.
en-mt: In addition, due to its therapeutic effects, some of the disadvantages associated with plasma should be carefully considered.

sourceString: For example, antibodies can overstimulate the immune response and cause cytokine release syndrome, which is potentially a life-threatening toxicity.
targetString: Sebagai contoh, antibodi boleh terlebih merangsang respons imun dan menyebabkan sindrom pelepasan sitokin, yang merupakan ketoksikan yang berpotensi mengancam nyawa.
en-mt: For example, antibodies can overstimulate the immune response and cause cytokine release syndrome, which is a potentially life-threatening toxicity.

sourceString: The concentration of antibodies in the blood is usually low, and the demand for the plasma is large to treat critically ill patients.
targetString: Kepekatan antibodi dalam darah biasanya rendah dan permintaan untuk plasma adalah besar untuk merawat pesakit yang kritikal.
en-mt: The concentration of antibodies in the blood is usually low and the demand for plasma is great to treat critically ill patients.

sourceString: It is difficult to develop and produce specific antibodies rapidly enough to fight against a global epidemic.
targetString: Sukar untuk membangunkan dan menghasilkan antibodi yang khusus dengan cepat untuk melawan epidemik global.
en-mt: It is difficult to develop and produce specific antibodies quickly to fight a global epidemic.

sourceString: Thus, it is more critical and practical to isolate B cells from recovered patients and identify the genetic codes encoding effective antibodies or screen for effective antibodies against essential proteins of the virus.
targetString: Oleh itu, lebih penting dan praktikal untuk mengasingkan sel B daripada pesakit yang telah sembuh serta mengenalpasti kod genetik yang mengekod antibodi berkesan atau menyaring antibodi yang berkesan terhadap protein virus yang penting.
en-mt: Therefore, it is more important and practical to isolate B cells from recovered patients and identify the genetic code that encodes effective antibodies or screen for effective antibodies against important viral proteins.

sourceString: This way, we can readily scale up the production of the antibodies.
targetString: Dengan cara ini, kita boleh meningkatkan pengeluaran antibodi.
en-mt: In this way, we can increase the production of antibodies.

sourceString: TCM has been used to treat a variety of diseases in China for thousands of years.
targetString: TCM telah digunakan untuk merawat pelbagai penyakit di China selama beribu-ribu tahun.
en-mt: TCM has been used to treat various diseases in China for thousands of years.

sourceString: However, its effects largely rely on a combination of multiple components in a formula that varies depending on the diagnosis of a disease based on the theories of TCM.
targetString: Walau bagaimanapun, kesan itu banyak bergantung pada kombinasi pelbagai komponen dalam formula yang berbeza-beza mengikut diagnosis penyakit berdasarkan teori TCM.
en-mt: However, the effect depends a lot on the combination of various components in the formula which varies according to the diagnosis of the disease based on TCM theory.

sourceString: Most of the effective components remain unknown or are vague as it is difficult to extract and verify such components or their optimal combinations.
targetString: Kebanyakan komponen yang berkesan kekal tidak diketahui atau kabur memandangkan sukar untuk mengekstrak dan mengesahkan komponen sedemikian atau kombinasi optimumnya.
en-mt: Most of the effective components remain unknown or obscure since it is difficult to extract and verify such components or their optimal combination.

sourceString: Currently, due to the lack of effective and specific therapy for COVID-19, TCM has become one of the major alternative treatments for patients with light to moderate symptoms or for those who have recovered from severe stages.
targetString: Pada masa ini, akibat kekurangan terapi yang khusus dan berkesan untuk COVID-19, TCM telah menjadi salah satu rawatan alternatif utama untuk pesakit dengan simptom ringan hingga sederhana atau untuk mereka yang telah sembuh daripada tahap yang teruk.
en-mt: Currently, due to the lack of specific and effective therapy for COVID-19, TCM has become one of the main alternative treatments for patients with mild to moderate symptoms or for those who have recovered from severe levels.

sourceString: For example, Shu Feng Jie Du capsules and Lian Hua Qing Wen capsules were found to be effective for COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: Sebagai contoh, kapsul Shu Feng Jie Du dan kapsul Lian Hua Qing Wen didapati berkesan untuk rawatan COVID-19.
en-mt: For example, Shu Feng Jie Du capsules and Lian Hua Qing Wen capsules have been found to be effective for the treatment of COVID-19.

sourceString: Top cure rates in the treatment of COVID-19 patients were observed in several provinces in China that used TCM in 87% of their patients, including Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%), and Hunan (50%), whereas Hubei province, which used TCM in only approximately 30% of its COVID-19 patients, had the lowest cure rate (13%).
targetString: Kadar sembuh tertinggi dalam rawatan pesakit COVID-19 telah dilihat di beberapa wilayah di China yang menggunakan TCM dalam 87% pesakit mereka, termasuk Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%) dan Hunan (50%), manakala wilayah Hubei, yang menggunakan TCM dalam hanya kira-kira 30% pesakit COVID-19, mempunyai kadar sembuh yang paling rendah (13%).
en-mt: The highest cure rates in the treatment of COVID-19 patients have been seen in several provinces in China that use TCM in 87% of their patients, including Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%) and Hunan (50%), while Hubei province, which uses TCM in only about 30% of COVID-19 patients, has the lowest cure rate (13%).

sourceString: However, this is quite a rough comparison as many other impact factors such as the number and severity of the patients should be included in the evaluation.
targetString: Namun, ini merupakan perbandingan yang agak kasar kerana banyak faktor impak lain seperti bilangan dan tahap keterukan pesakit perlu disertakan dalam penilaian itu.
en-mt: However, this is a rather crude comparison as many other impact factors such as the number and severity of patients need to be included in the assessment.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, Boli Zhang and coworkers published a study to compare western medicine (WM) treatment alone with combined treatment of WM and TCM.
targetString: Pada 18 Februari 2020, Boli Zhang dan rakan sekerjanya menerbitkan kajian untuk membandingkan rawatan ubat barat (WM) sahaja dengan kombinasi rawatan WM dan TCM.
en-mt: On February 18, 2020, Boli Zhang and colleagues published a study to compare western medicine (WM) treatment alone with a combination of WM and TCM treatment.

sourceString: They found that the times needed for body temperature recovery, symptom disappearance, and hospitalization were remarkably shorter in the WM+TCM group than in the WM only group.
targetString: Mereka mendapati bahawa masa yang diperlukan untuk pemulihan suhu badan, kehilangan simptom dan rawatan di hospital ketara lebih singkat dalam kumpulan WM+TCM daripada kumpulan WM sahaja.
en-mt: They found that the time required for recovery of body temperature, disappearance of symptoms and hospitalization was significantly shorter in the WM+TCM group than in the WM alone group.

sourceString: Most impressively, the rate for symptomatic worsening (from light to severe) was remarkably lower for the WM+TCM group than for the WM only group (7.4% versus 46.2%) and the mortality was lower in the WM+TCM group than WM only group (8.8% versus 39%).
targetString: Paling mengagumkan, kadar untuk keadaan simptomatik menjadi semakin teruk (daripada ringan kepada teruk) ketara lebih rendah untuk kumpulan WM+TCM daripada kumpulan WM sahaja (7.4% berbanding 46.2%) dan kadar kematian lebih rendah dalam kumpulan WM+TCM daripada kumpulan WM sahaja (8.8% berbanding 39%).
en-mt: Most impressively, the rate for symptomatic worsening (from mild to severe) was significantly lower for the WM+TCM group than for the WM alone group (7.4% vs. 46.2%) and the mortality rate was lower in the WM+TCM group than for the WM alone group ( 8.8% compared to 39%).

sourceString: Nevertheless, the efficacy and safety of TCM still await more well-controlled trials at larger scales and in more centers.
targetString: Namun begitu, keberkesanan dan keselamatan TCM masih menunggu percubaan yang lebih terkawal pada tahap yang lebih besar dan di lebih banyak pusat.
en-mt: However, the efficacy and safety of TCM still await more controlled trials on a larger scale and in more centers.

sourceString: It would also be intriguing to characterize the mechanism of actions and clarify the effective components of TCM treatments or their combinations if possible.
targetString: Pasti menarik juga untuk menggambarkan mekanisme tindakan dan menjelaskan komponen yang berkesan dalam rawatan TCM atau kombinasi rawatan itu jika boleh.
en-mt: It would also be interesting to describe the mechanism of action and explain the effective components of a TCM treatment or a combination of those treatments if possible.

sourceString: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 mostly experience great fear of the highly contagious and even fatal disease, and quarantined people also experience boredom, loneliness, and anger.
targetString: Pesakit yang disyaki atau disahkan menghidap COVID-19 kebanyakannya mengalami rasa takut yang hebat terhadap penyakit yang sangat mudah berjangkit dan boleh menyebabkan kematian itu, manakala mereka yang dikuarantin juga mengalami kebosanan, kesunyian dan rasa marah.
en-mt: Suspected or confirmed COVID-19 patients mostly experience intense fear of the highly contagious and deadly disease, while those in quarantine also experience boredom, loneliness and anger.

sourceString: Furthermore, symptoms of the infection such as fever, hypoxia, and cough as well as adverse effects of the treatments such as insomnia caused by corticosteroids can lead to more anxiety and mental distress.
targetString: Selain itu, simptom jangkitan seperti demam, hipoksia dan batuk serta kesan buruk rawatan seperti insomnia yang disebabkan oleh kortikosteroid boleh membawa kepada kerisauan dan distres mental yang lebih tinggi.
en-mt: In addition, symptoms of infection such as fever, hypoxia and cough as well as adverse effects of treatment such as insomnia caused by corticosteroids can lead to higher anxiety and mental distress.

sourceString: In the early phase of the SARS outbreak, a range of psychiatric morbidities including persistent depression, anxiety, panic attacks, psychomotor excitement, psychotic symptoms, delirium, and even suicidality were reported.
targetString: Pada fasa awal wabak SARS, pelbagai morbiditi psikiatrik termasuk depresi berterusan, kerisauan, serangan panik, keterujaan psikomotor, simptom psikotik, delirium, malah bunuh diri turut dilaporkan.
en-mt: In the early phase of the SARS epidemic, various psychiatric morbidities including persistent depression, anxiety, panic attacks, psychomotor excitement, psychotic symptoms, delirium, and even suicide were also reported.

sourceString: Mandatory contact tracing and quarantine, as a part of the public health responses to the COVID-19 outbreak, can make people more anxious and guilty about the effects of the contagion, quarantine, and stigma on their families and friends.
targetString: Pengesanan kontak mandatori dan kuarantin, sebagai sebahagian daripada respons kesihatan awam terhadap wabak COVID-19, boleh menyebabkan orang ramai berasa lebih risau dan bersalah tentang kesan jangkitan, kuarantin serta stigma pada keluarga dan rakan mereka.
en-mt: Mandatory contact tracing and quarantine, as part of the public health response to the COVID-19 outbreak, can cause people to feel more anxious and guilty about the impact of infection, quarantine and stigma on their family and friends.

sourceString: Thus, mental health care should be provided to COVID-19 patients, suspected individuals, and people in contact with them as well as the general public who are in need.
targetString: Oleh itu, rawatan kesihatan mental perlu diberikan kepada pesakit COVID-19, individu yang disyaki dan orang yang berhubung dengan mereka serta masyarakat awam yang memerlukannya.
en-mt: Therefore, mental health treatment needs to be provided to COVID-19 patients, suspected individuals and people in contact with them as well as the general public who need it.

sourceString: The psychological support should include the establishment of multidisciplinary mental health teams, clear communications with regular and accurate updates about the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak and treatment plans and the use of professional electronic devices and applications to avoid close contact with each other.
targetString: Sokongan psikologi harus termasuk penubuhan pasukan kesihatan mental berbilang disiplin, komunikasi yang jelas dengan kemas kini tetap dan tepat tentang wabak SARS-CoV-2 dan rancangan rawatan serta penggunaan peranti dan aplikasi elektronik profesional untuk mengelakkan kontak rapat dengan satu sama lain.
en-mt: Psychological support should include the establishment of a multidisciplinary mental health team, clear communication with regular and accurate updates about the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak and treatment plans and the use of professional electronic devices and applications to avoid close contact with each other.

sourceString: Effective vaccines are essential for interrupting the chain of transmission from animal reservoirs and infected humans to susceptible hosts and are often complementary to antiviral treatment in the control of epidemics caused by emerging viruses.
targetString: Vaksin yang berkesan adalah penting untuk mengganggu rantai pemindahan daripada kawasan haiwan dan manusia yang dijangkiti kepada hos yang terdedah serta biasanya melengkapi rawatan antivirus dalam kawalan epidemik yang disebabkan oleh virus yang muncul.
en-mt: Effective vaccines are essential to disrupt the chain of transmission from infected animal and human populations to susceptible hosts and usually complement antiviral treatment in the control of epidemics caused by emerging viruses.

sourceString: Efforts have been made to develop S protein-based vaccines to generate long-term and potent neutralizing antibodies and/or protective immunity against SARS-CoV.
targetString: Usaha telah dilakukan oleh membangunkan vaksis berasaskan protein S untuk menjana antibodi peneutral jangka panjang dan berkesan dan/atau keimunan yang melindungi daripada SARS-CoV.
en-mt: Efforts have been made to develop S protein-based vaccines to generate long-lasting and effective neutralizing antibodies and/or protective immunity against SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Live-attenuated vaccines have been evaluated in animal models for SARS.
targetString: Vaksin yang melemahkan secara langsung telah diuji dalam model haiwan untuk SARS.
en-mt: Live attenuated vaccines have been tested in animal models for SARS.

sourceString: However, the in vivo efficacy of these vaccine candidates in elderly individuals and lethal-challenge models and their protection against zoonotic virus infection have yet to be determined before a clinical study is initiated.
targetString: Namun begitu, keberkesanan in vivo calon vaksin ini dalam individu yang tua dan model cabaran yang berbahaya serta perlindungan mereka terhadap jangkitan virus zoonotik perlu ditentukan sebelum kajian klinikal dimulakan.
en-mt: However, the in vivo efficacy of these vaccine candidates in elderly individuals and innocuous challenge models and their protection against zoonotic viral infections need to be determined before clinical studies are initiated.

sourceString: This is probably because SARS died down 17 years ago and no new case has been reported since.
targetString: Ini mungkin kerana SARS telah berakhir 17 tahun lalu dan tiada kes baharu telah dilaporkan sejak itu.
en-mt: This is probably because SARS ended 17 years ago and no new cases have been reported since then.

sourceString: In contrast, sporadic cases and clusters of MERS continue to occur in the Middle East and spread to other regions owing to the persistence of zoonotic sources in endemic areas.
targetString: Secara kontras, kes sporadik dan kluster MERS terus berlaku di Timur Tengah serta merebak ke wilayah lain akibat sumber zoonotik yang berterusan di kawasan endemik.
en-mt: In contrast, sporadic and clustered cases of MERS continue to occur in the Middle East and spread to other regions due to persistent zoonotic sources in endemic areas.

sourceString: Vaccination strategies have been developed for MERS by using inactivated virus, DNA plasmids, viral vectors, nanoparticles, virus-like particles and recombinant protein subunits and some have been evaluated in animal models.
targetString: Strategi pemvaksinan telah dibangunkan untuk MERS dengan menggunakan virus yang tidak diaktifkan, plasmid DNA, vektor virus, nanopartikel, partikel seperti virus dan subunit protein rekombinan serta sesetengahnya telah diuji dalam model haiwan.
en-mt: Vaccination strategies have been developed for MERS using inactivated viruses, DNA plasmids, viral vectors, nanoparticles, virus-like particles and recombinant protein subunits and some have been tested in animal models.

sourceString: The development of a safe and effective vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 for non-immune individuals is an urgent and critical task for controlling the ongoing epidemic.
targetString: Pembangunan vaksin yang selamat dan berkesan terhadap SARS-CoV-2 untuk individu yang tidak imum merupakan tugas yang diperlukan segera dan penting untuk mengawal epidemik yang sedang berlaku.
en-mt: The development of a safe and effective vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 for non-immune individuals is an urgent and important task to control the ongoing epidemic.

sourceString: However, it is challenging to overcome the difficulty because of the long period of time (averaged 18 months) needed for vaccine development and the dynamic variations of CoVs.
targetString: Walau bagaimanapun, adalah mencabar untuk mengatasi kesukaran kerana tempoh masa yang lama (purata 18 bulan) diperlukan untuk pembangunan vaksin dan variasi dinamik CoV.
en-mt: However, it is challenging to overcome the difficulties due to the long period of time (on average 18 months) required for vaccine development and the dynamic variation of CoV.

sourceString: As a novel disease, COVID-19 has just started to manifest its full clinical course throughout thousands of patients.
targetString: Sebagai penyakit baharu, COVID-19 baru sahaja menunjukkan laluan klinikal yang penuh dalam ribuan pesakit.
en-mt: As a new disease, COVID-19 has only just shown its full clinical course in thousands of patients.

sourceString: In most cases, patients can recover gradually without sequelae.
targetString: Dalam kebanyakan kes, pesakit boleh sembuh perlahan-lahan tanpa dijangkiti semula.
en-mt: In most cases, patients can recover slowly without re-infection.

sourceString: However, similar to SARS and MERS, COVID-19 is also associated with high morbidity and mortality in patients with severe cases.
targetString: Namun, serupa dengan SARS dan MERS, COVID-19 juga dikaitkan dengan kadar morbiditi dan kematian yang tinggi dalam pesakit dengan kes yang parah.
en-mt: However, similar to SARS and MERS, COVID-19 is also associated with high rates of morbidity and mortality in patients with severe cases.

sourceString: Therefore, building a prognosis model for the disease is essential for health-care agencies to prioritize their services, especially in resource-constrained areas.
targetString: Oleh itu, membina model prognosis untuk penyakit itu adalah penting untuk agensi penjagaan kesihatan untuk mengutamakan perkhidmatan mereka, terutamanya di kawasan yang kekurangan sumber.
en-mt: Therefore, building a prognosis model for the disease is important for healthcare agencies to prioritize their services, especially in under-resourced areas.

sourceString: Based on clinical studies reported thus far, the following factors may affect or be associated with the prognosis of COVID-19 patients (Table ​(Table33):
targetString: Berdasarkan pada kajian klinikal yang dilaporkan setakat ini, faktor berikut mungkin mempengaruhi atau dikaitkan dengan prognosis pesakit COVID-19 (Jadual (Jadual33):
en-mt: Based on the clinical studies reported so far, the following factors may influence or be associated with the prognosis of COVID-19 patients (Table (Table33):

sourceString: Age: Age was the most important factor for the prognosis of SARS, which is also true for COVID-19.
targetString: Umur: Umur ialah faktor paling penting untuk prognosis SARS, yang juga benar untuk COVID-19.
en-mt: Age: Age is the most important factor for the prognosis of SARS, which is also true for COVID-19.

sourceString: COVID-19 mainly happened at the age of 30-65 with 47.7% of those patients being over 50 in a study of 8,866 cases as described above.
targetString: COVID-19 biasanya berlaku pada umur 30-65 tahun dengan 47.7% pesakit tersebut berumur melebihi 50 tahun dalam kajian terhadap 8,866 kes yang dinyatakan di atas.
en-mt: COVID-19 usually occurs at the age of 30-65 years with 47.7% of those patients being over 50 years old in the study of 8,866 cases mentioned above.

sourceString: Patients who required intensive care were more likely to have underlying comorbidities and complications and were significantly older than those who did not (at the median age of 66 versus 51), suggesting age as a prognostic factor for the outcome of COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Pesakit yang memerlukan rawatan rapi lebih berkemungkinan memiliki komorbiditi dan komplikasi yang tersembunyi dan jauh lebih berumur daripada mereka yang tidak memerlukannya (pada umur median 66 berbanding 51 tahun), mencadangkan umur sebagai faktor prognosis untuk keputusan pesakit COVID-19.
en-mt: Patients who required intensive care were more likely to have hidden comorbidities and complications and were significantly older than those who did not (at a median age of 66 versus 51 years), suggesting age as a prognostic factor for the outcome of COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: Sex: SARS-CoV-2 has infected more men than women (0.31/100,000 versus 0.27/100,000), as described above.
targetString: Jantina: SARS-CoV-2 telah menjangkiti lebih ramai lelaki daripada wanita (0.31/100,000 berbanding 0.27/100,000), seperti yang dinyatakan di atas.
en-mt: Gender: SARS-CoV-2 has infected more men than women (0.31/100,000 versus 0.27/100,000), as noted above.

sourceString: Comorbidities and complications: Patients with COVID-19 who require intensive care are more likely to suffer from acute cardiac injury and arrhythmia.
targetString: Komorbidi dan komplikasi: Pesakit dengan COVID-19 yang memerlukan rawatan rapi lebih berkemungkinan mengalami kecederaan kardium akut dan aritmia.
en-mt: Comorbidities and complications: Patients with COVID-19 who require intensive care are more likely to develop acute cardiac injury and arrhythmias.

sourceString: Cardiac events were also the main reason for death in SARS patients.
targetString: Masalah kardium juga merupakan punca kematian dalam pesakit SARS.
en-mt: Cardiac problems are also the cause of death in SARS patients.

sourceString: It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 can also bind to ACE2-positive cholangiocytes, which might lead to liver dysfunctions in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Telah dilaporkan bahawa SARS-CoV-2 juga boleh terikat kepada kolangiosit positif ACE2, yang mungkin membawa kepada disfungsi hati dalam pesakit COVID-19.
en-mt: It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 can also bind to ACE2-positive cholangiocytes, which may lead to liver dysfunction in COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: It is worth noting that age and underlying disease are strongly correlated and might interfere with each other.
targetString: Wajar diberi perhatian bahawa umur dan penyakit yang tersembunyi adalah saling berkait serta boleh mengganggu satu sama lain.
en-mt: It is worth noting that age and hidden diseases are interrelated and can interfere with each other.

sourceString: Abnormal laboratory findings: The C-reactive protein (CRP) level in blood reflects the severity of inflammation or tissue injury and has been proposed to be a potential prognostic factor for disease, response to therapy, and ultimate recovery.
targetString: Penemuan makmal yang abnormal: Tahap protein C-reaktif (CRP) dalam darah menunjukkan keterukan keradangan atau kecederaan tisu dan telah dicadangkan sebagai faktor prognosis yang berpotensi untuk penyakit, respons kepada terapi dan penyembuhan akhir.
en-mt: Abnormal laboratory findings: C-reactive protein (CRP) levels in the blood indicate the severity of inflammation or tissue injury and have been suggested as potential prognostic factors for disease, response to therapy and eventual healing.

sourceString: The correlation of CRP level to the severity and prognosis of COVID-19 has also been proposed.
targetString: Hubung kait tahap CRP kepada keterukan dan prognosis COVID-19 juga telah dicadangkan.
en-mt: Linking CRP levels to the severity and prognosis of COVID-19 has also been suggested.

sourceString: In addition, elevated lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), and creatine kinase (CK) may also help predict the outcome.
targetString: Selain itu, laktat dehidrogenase (LDH), aspartat aminotransferase (AST), alanina aminotransferase (ALT), dan kreatina kinase (CK) yang meningkat juga boleh membantu meramalkan keputusan.
en-mt: Additionally, elevated lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), and creatine kinase (CK) may also help predict outcome.

sourceString: These enzymes are expressed extensively in multiple organs, especially in the heart and liver, and are released during tissue damage.
targetString: Enzim ini dirembeskan dengan banyak dalam pelbagai organ, terutamanya jantung dan hati, serta dikeluarkan sewaktu kerosakan tisu.
en-mt: This enzyme is secreted in abundance in various organs, especially the heart and liver, and is released during tissue damage.

sourceString: Thus, they are traditional markers for heart or liver dysfunctions.
targetString: Oleh itu, ia menjadi penanda tradisional untuk disfungsi jantung atau hati.
en-mt: Therefore, it becomes a traditional marker for heart or liver dysfunction.

sourceString: Major clinical symptoms: Chest radiography and temporal progression of clinical symptoms should be considered together with the other issues for the prediction of outcomes and complications of COVID-19.
targetString: Simptom klinikal utama: Radiografi dada dan kemajuan simptom klinikal mengikut masa harus dipertimbangkan bersama-sama dengan isu lain untuk meramal akibat serta komplikasi COVID-19.
en-mt: Key clinical symptoms: Chest radiographs and the progression of clinical symptoms over time should be considered along with other issues to predict the consequences and complications of COVID-19.

sourceString: Use of steroids: As described above, steroids are immunosuppressant commonly used as an adjunctive therapy for infectious diseases to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: Penggunaan steroid: Seperti yang diterangkan di atas, steroid ialah imunotindasan yang biasa digunakan sebagai terapi adjung untuk penyakit berjangkit bagi mengurangi keterukan kerosakan keradangan.
en-mt: Use of steroids: As described above, steroids are immunosuppressants commonly used as adjunctive therapy for infectious diseases to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.

sourceString: Since a high dosage of corticosteroids was widely used in severe SARS patients, many survivors suffered from avascular osteonecrosis with life-long disability and poor life quality.
targetString: Memandangan dos tinggi kortikosteroid telah digunakan secara meluas dalam pesakit SARS yang teruk, ramai bekas pesakit menderitai avaskular osteonekrosis dengan kecacatan sepanjang hayat dan kualiti hidup yang buruk.
en-mt: Since high doses of corticosteroids have been widely used in severe SARS patients, many former patients suffer from avascular osteonecrosis with lifelong disability and poor quality of life.

sourceString: Thus, if needed, steroids should be used at low dosage and for a short time in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Oleh itu, jika perlu, steroid harus digunakan pada dos yang rendah dan untuk tempoh yang singkat dalam pesakit COVID-19.
en-mt: Therefore, if necessary, steroids should be used at low doses and for a short period of time in patients with COVID-19.

sourceString: Mental stress: As described above, during the COVID-19 outbreak many patients have suffered from extraordinary stress as they often endured long periods of quarantine and extreme uncertainty and witnessed the death of close family members and fellow patients.
targetString: Tekanan mental: Seperti yang dinyatakan di atas, semasa wabak COVID-19 ramai pesakit telah menderita akibat tekanan luar biasa kerana mereka kerap menghadapi tempoh kuarantin yang lama dan ketidakpastian yang ekstrem serta menyaksikan kematian ahli keluarga yang rapat dan rakan pesakit.
en-mt: Mental stress: As mentioned above, during the COVID-19 outbreak many patients have suffered from extraordinary stress as they often face long periods of quarantine and extreme uncertainty and witness the death of close family members and friends of the patient.

sourceString: It is imperative to provide psychological counseling and long-term support to help these patients recover from the stress and return to normal life.
targetString: Adalah penting untuk menyediakan kaunseling psikologi dan sokongan jangka panjang untuk membantu pesakit ini pulih daripada tekanan serta kembali ke kehidupan normal.
en-mt: It is important to provide psychological counseling and long-term support to help these patients recover from stress and return to normal life.

sourceString: According to demographic studies so far, COVID-19 seems to have different epidemiological features from SARS.
targetString: Menurut kajian demografi setakat in, COVID-19 kelihatan seperti memiliki ciri epidemiologi yang berbeza daripada SARS.
en-mt: According to demographic studies so far, COVID-19 appears to have different epidemiological characteristics than SARS.

sourceString: In addition to replicating in the lower respiratory tract, SARS-CoV-2 can efficiently replicate in the upper respiratory tract and causes mild or no symptoms in the early phase of infection, similar to other CoVs that cause common colds.
targetString: Selain daripada berganda dalam salur pernafasan bawah, SARS-CoV-2 boleh berganda dengan efisien dalam salur pernafasan atas dan menyebabkan simptom ringan atau tiada simptom dalam fasa awal jangkitan, sama dengan CoV lain yang menyebabkan selesema biasa.
en-mt: In addition to multiplying in the lower respiratory tract, SARS-CoV-2 can multiply efficiently in the upper respiratory tract and cause mild or no symptoms in the early phase of infection, similar to other CoVs that cause the common cold.

sourceString: Therefore, infected patients at the early phase or incubation period can produce a large amount of virus during daily activities, causing great difficulty for the control of the epidemic.
targetString: Oleh itu, pesakit yang dijangkiti pada fasa awal atau tempoh pengeraman boleh menghasilkan jumlah besar virus semasa melakukan aktiviti harian, menyebabkan sangat sukar untuk mengawal epidemik.
en-mt: Therefore, patients infected in the early phase or incubation period can produce large amounts of virus during daily activities, making it very difficult to control the epidemic.

sourceString: However, the transmission of SARS-CoV was considered to occur when the patients are severely ill, while most transmission did not happen at the early phase.
targetString: Namun begitu, penularan SARS-CoV dianggap berlaku semasa pesakit sakit teruk, manakala kebanyakan penularan tidak berlaku pada fasa awal.
en-mt: However, transmission of SARS-CoV is thought to occur during acutely ill patients, while most transmissions do not occur in the early phase.

sourceString: Thus, the current outbreak of COVID-19 is much more severe and difficult to control than the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: Oleh itu, wabak COVID-19 semasa adalah jauh lebih teruk dan sukar dikawal berbanding wabak SARS.
en-mt: Therefore, the current COVID-19 outbreak is much more severe and difficult to control than the SARS outbreak.

sourceString: Great efforts are currently underway in China including the lockdown of Wuhan and surrounding cities and continuous quarantine of almost the entire population in hopes of interrupting the transmission of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Usaha yang hebat sedang dijalan di China termasuk perintah berkurung di Wuhan dan kota di sekelilingnya serta kuarantin berterusan hampir seluruh populasi dengan harapan untuk memutuskan penularan SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: A massive effort is underway in China including a curfew in Wuhan and surrounding cities and ongoing quarantine of almost the entire population in hopes of stopping the spread of SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Although these actions have been dramatically damaging the economy and other sectors of the country, the number of new patients is declining, indicating the slowdown of the epidemic.
targetString: Walaupun tindakan ini merosakkan ekonomi dan sektor lain dalam negara secara ketara, bilangan pesakit baharu menurun, menandakan keperlahanan epidemik.
en-mt: Although these actions significantly damaged the economy and other sectors of the country, the number of new patients decreased, indicating a slowing of the epidemic.

sourceString: The most optimistic estimate is that the outbreak will end by March and the downswing phase will last for 3-4 months.
targetString: Anggaran paling optimis ialah wabak akan berakhir pada penghujung Mac dan fasa penurunan akan berjalan selama 3-4 bulan.
en-mt: The most optimistic estimate is that the epidemic will end at the end of March and the decline phase will last for 3-4 months.

sourceString: However, some other experts are not that optimistic.
targetString: Namun, beberapa pakar lain tidak begitu optimis.
en-mt: However, some other experts are not so optimistic.

sourceString: Paul Hunter, et al., estimated that COVID-19, which seems substantially more infectious than SARS, will not end in 2020.
targetString: Paul Hunter, et al., menganggarkan bahawa COVID-19, yang kelihatan jauh lebih mudah berjangkit daripada SARS, tidak akan berakhir dalam tahun 2020.
en-mt: Paul Hunter, et al., estimate that COVID-19, which appears to be far more contagious than SARS, will not end in 2020.

sourceString: Ira Longini, et al., established a model to predict the outcome of the epidemic and suggested that SARS-CoV-2 could infect two-thirds of the global population.
targetString: Ira Longini, et al., membuat model untuk meramal akibat epidemik itu dan mencadangkan bahawa SARS-CoV-2 boleh menjangkiti dua pertiga populasi dunia.
en-mt: Ira Longini, et al., created a model to predict the consequences of the epidemic and suggested that SARS-CoV-2 could infect two-thirds of the world's population.

sourceString: A Canadian group reported that SARS-CoV-2 was detected in both mid-turbinate and throat swabs of patients who recovered and left the hospital 2 weeks earlier, which indicates that the newly identified virus could become a cyclical episode similar to influenza.
targetString: Satu kumpulan Kanada melaporkan bahawa SARS-CoV-2 telah dikesan dalam kedua-dua swab turbinat tengah dan kerongkong pesakit yang telah sembuh serta meninggalkan hospital 2 minggu sebelum itu, yang menandakan bahawa virus yang baru dikenal pasti itu boleh menjadi episod yang berulang-ulang seperti influenza.
en-mt: A Canadian group reported that SARS-CoV-2 was detected in both middle turbinate and throat swabs of patients who had recovered and left the hospital 2 weeks earlier, indicating that the newly identified virus could be a recurrent episode such as influenza.

sourceString: However, promising signs have occurred in China based on the declining number of new cases, indicating the current strategies might have been working.
targetString: Namun, isyarat yang meyakinkan telah berlaku di China berdasarkan bilangan kes baharu yang semakin menurun, menunjukkan bahawa strategi semasa mungkin berkesan.
en-mt: However, reassuring signals have emerged in China based on the declining number of new cases, suggesting that the current strategy may be working.

sourceString: Ebola was originally predicted to cause up to a million cases with half a million deaths.
targetString: Ebola pada awalnya diramalkan akan menyebabkan sehingga sejuta kes dengan setengah juta kematian.
en-mt: Ebola was initially predicted to cause up to a million cases with half a million deaths.

sourceString: However, via strict quarantine and isolation, the disease has eventually been put under control.
targetString: Namun, dengan kuarantin dan pengasingan yang ketat, penyakit itu akhirnya berjaya dikawal.
en-mt: However, with strict quarantine and isolation, the disease was eventually brought under control.

sourceString: It is possible, similar to SARS-CoV, that SARS-CoV-2 might become weaker in infectivity and eventually die down or become a less pathogenic virus co-existent with humans.
targetString: Oleh itu, sama seperti SARS-CoV, mungkin keberjangkitan SARS-CoV-2 menjadi lebih lemah dan akhirnya berakhir atau menjadi virus yang kurang patogen yang wujud bersama-sama manusia.
en-mt: Therefore, similar to SARS-CoV, it is possible that the infectivity of SARS-CoV-2 becomes weaker and eventually dies out or becomes a less pathogenic virus that coexists with humans.

sourceString: A comparison of the epidemic of COVID-19 with that of SARS and MERS is provided below (Fig. ​(Fig.55).
targetString: Perbandingan antara epidemik COVID-19 dengan SARS dan MERS disediakan di bawah (Rajah ​(Rajah55).
en-mt: A comparison between the epidemic of COVID-19 with SARS and MERS is provided below (Figure ​(Figure55).

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is highly transmittable through coughing or sneezing, and possibly also through direct contact with materials contaminated by the virus.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 sangat mudah berjangkit melalui batuk atau bersin, dan boleh juga berjangkit melalui kontak langsung dengan bahan yang telah dicemari virus itu.
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 is highly contagious through coughing or sneezing, and can also be transmitted through direct contact with materials that have been contaminated with the virus.

sourceString: The virus was also found in feces, which raises a new possibility of feces-to-mouth transmission.
targetString: Virus itu juga ditemui dalam najis, yang menimbulkan kemungkinan baharu tentang penularan dari najis ke mulut.
en-mt: The virus was also found in faeces, raising new possibilities of faecal-to-mouth transmission.

sourceString: A recent study on 138 cases reported that 41% of the cases were possibly caused by nosocomial infections, including 17 patients with other prior diseases and 40 health-care providers.
targetString: Kajian baru-baru ini ke atas 138 kes melaporkan bahawa 41% kes mungkin disebabkan oleh infeksi nosokomial, termasuk 17 pesakit dengan penyakit lain dan 40 petugas kesihatan.
en-mt: A recent study of 138 cases reported that 41% of cases may be due to nosocomial infections, including 17 patients with other diseases and 40 health workers.

sourceString: Thus, great precaution should be used to protect humans, especially health-care providers, social workers, family members, colleagues, and even bystanders in contact with patients or infected people.
targetString: Oleh itu, langkah berjaga-jaga yang teliti harus digunakan untuk melindungi manusia, terutamanya petugas kesihatan, pekerja sosial, ahli keluarga, rakan, malah orang di tepi jalan yang berhubung dengan pesakit atau orang yang dijangkiti.
en-mt: Therefore, careful precautions should be used to protect people, especially health workers, social workers, family members, friends, even people on the street who come into contact with patients or infected people.

sourceString: The first line of defense that could be used to lower the risk of infection is through wearing face masks; both the use of surgical masks and N95 respirator masks (series # 1860s) helps control the spread of viruses.
targetString: Baris pertahanan pertama yang boleh digunakan untuk mengurangi risiko jangkita ialah dengan memakai topeng muka; kedua-dua penggunaan topeng surgeri dan topeng pernafasan N95 (siri # 1860) membantu mengawal penyebaran virus.
en-mt: The first line of defense that can be used to reduce the risk of infection is to wear a face mask; both the use of surgical masks and N95 respirator masks (series # 1860) help control the spread of the virus.

sourceString: Surgical face masks prevent liquid droplets from a potentially infected individual from traveling through the air or sticking onto surfaces of materials, where they could be passed on to others.
targetString: Topeng muka pembedahan mencegah titisan cecair daripada individu yang berkemungkinan dijangkiti daripada tersebar melalui pengudaraan atau melekat pada permukaan bahan, yang seterusnya boleh disebarkan kepada orang lain.
en-mt: Surgical face masks prevent fluid droplets from potentially infected individuals from spreading through ventilation or sticking to material surfaces, which in turn can be spread to others.

sourceString: However, only N95 (series # 1860s) masks can protect against the inhalation of virions as small as 10 to 80 nm, with only 5% of the virions being able to penetrate completely; SARS-CoV-2 is similar to SARS-CoV in size and both are approximately 85 nm.
targetString: Walau bagaimanapun, hanya topeng jenis N95 (siri #1860s) yang boleh melindungi daripada penyedutan virion sekecil 10 hingga 80 nm, dengan hanya 5% virion sahaja yang boleh menembusi topeng jenis N95; SARS-CoV-2 adalah hampir sama dengan SARS-CoV dari segi saiz di mana kedua-duanya bersaiz lebih kurang 85 nm.
en-mt: However, only N95-type masks (series #1860s) can protect against inhalation of virions as small as 10 to 80 nm, with only 5% of virions able to penetrate N95-type masks; SARS-CoV-2 is almost identical to SARS-CoV in terms of size where both are approximately 85 nm in size.

sourceString: Since particles can penetrate even five surgical masks stacked together, health-care providers in direct contact with patients must wear N95 (series # 1860s) masks but not surgical masks.
targetString: Memandangkan partikel virus boleh menembusi lima topeng muka pembedahan yang dipakai bersama-sama, petugas kesihatan yang mempunyai kontak secara langsung dengan pesakit perlu memakai topeng N95 (siri #1860s) bukan topeng muka pembedahan.
en-mt: Since virus particles can penetrate five surgical face masks that are worn together, healthcare workers who have direct contact with patients should wear N95 masks (series #1860s) instead of surgical face masks.

sourceString: In addition to masks, health-care providers should wear fitted isolation gowns in order to further reduce contact with viruses.
targetString: Sebagai tambahan kepada topeng muka, petugas kesihatan perlu memakai peralatan perlindungan diri bagi mengurangi kontak dengan virus.
en-mt: In addition to face masks, health workers need to wear personal protective equipment to reduce contact with the virus.

sourceString: Viruses can also infect an individual through the eyes.
targetString: Virus juga boleh menjangkiti individu melalui mata.
en-mt: Viruses can also infect individuals through the eyes.

sourceString: On January 22, 2020, a doctor was infected with SARS-CoV-2 although he wore an N95 mask; the virus might have entered his body through his inflammatory eyes.
targetString: Pada 22 Januari 2020, seorang doktor telah dijangkiti SARS-CoV-2 walaupun telah memakai topeng muka N95; virus mungkin telah memasuki tubuh beliau melalui mata yang mengalami keradangan.
en-mt: On January 22, 2020, a doctor was infected with SARS-CoV-2 despite wearing an N95 face mask; The virus may have entered his body through an inflamed eye.

sourceString: Thus, health-care providers should also wear transparent face shields or goggles while working with patients.
targetString: Sehubungan itu, petugas kesihatan juga perlu memakai pelindung muka lutsinar atau cermin mata keselamatan ketika berhadapan dengan pesakit.
en-mt: Accordingly, health workers also need to wear transparent face shields or safety glasses when dealing with patients.

sourceString: For the general public in affected or potentially affected areas, it is highly suggested that everybody wash their hands with disinfectant soaps more often than usual, try to stay indoors for self-quarantine and limit contact with potentially infected individuals.
targetString: Bagi orang awam di kawasan yang terjejas atau berkemungkinan terjejas, adalah dinasihatkan agar semua penduduk mencuci tangan dengan sabun pembasmi kuman dengan kerap, kekal di rumah dan mengurangkan kontak dengan individu yang berkemungkinan dijangkiti.
en-mt: For members of the public in affected or potentially affected areas, it is advised that all residents wash their hands with disinfectant soap frequently, stay at home and reduce contact with individuals who may be infected.

sourceString: Three feet is considered an appropriate distance for people to stay away from a patient.
targetString: Jarak tiga kaki dianggap sebagai jarak yang sesuai untuk menjauhkan diri daripada pesakit.
en-mt: A distance of three feet is considered an appropriate distance to distance oneself from the patient.

sourceString: These actions are effective methods to lower the risk of infection as well as prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: Langkah-langkah ini merupakan kaedah berkesan dalam mengurangkan risiko jangkitan selain menghalang penularan virus.
en-mt: These measures are an effective method in reducing the risk of infection in addition to preventing the spread of the virus.

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV-2 came as a new virus to the human world, its high homology to SARS-CoV as reported on 7 January 2020 should have caused high alert to China based on her deep memory of the SARS outbreak in 2003.
targetString: Walaupun SARS-CoV-2 merupakan virus baharu, homologi yang tinggi kepada SARS-CoV seperti yang dilaporkan pada 7 Januari 2020 memberikan amaran kepada China sebagaimana wabak SARS yang melanda pada 2003.
en-mt: Although SARS-CoV-2 is a new virus, the high homology to SARS-CoV as reported on January 7, 2020 provides a warning to China as the SARS epidemic hit in 2003.

sourceString: However, not until 19 January 2020 did the director of the Center of Disease Control of Wuhan comfort the citizens by saying that the novel virus has low contagiousness and limited reproductivity from human to human and that it is not a problem to prevent and contain the disease.
targetString: Walau bagaimanapun, hanya pada 19 Januari 2020 Pengarah Pusat Kawalan dan Pencegahan Penyakit Wuhan cuba mengurangi kebimbangan warganya dengan berkata bahawa virus novel ini mempunyai kadar jangkitan yang rendah dan pembiakan yang terhad pada manusia serta pencegahan serta pembendungan penyakit tidak menjadi masalah.
en-mt: However, it was only on January 19, 2020 that the Director of the Wuhan Center for Disease Control and Prevention tried to reduce the concerns of his citizens by saying that this novel virus has a low infection rate and limited reproduction in humans and prevention and containment of the disease is not a problem.

sourceString: This message remarkably relaxed the alarm of the public, especially when the entire country was preparing for the Spring Festival, and the critical time was missed to contain the disease at its minimal scale in Wuhan.
targetString: Mesej tersebut berjaya meredakan kerisauan orang awam, terutamanya apabila seluruh negara sedang membuat persiapan Festival Musim Luruh, dan ianya tidak dapat disambut bagi membendung penularan wabak pada skala minimum di Wuhan.
en-mt: The message succeeded in allaying public anxiety, especially when the whole country was preparing for the Autumn Festival, and it could not be welcomed to contain the spread of the epidemic on a minimal scale in Wuhan.

sourceString: The disease control agencies in China may take this hard lesson and make critical improvements in the future.
targetString: Agensi kawalan penyakit di China boleh mengambil iktibar daripada perkara ini dan membuat penambahbaikan pada masa akan datang.
en-mt: Disease control agencies in China can learn from this and make improvements in the future.

sourceString: For example, these agencies should be (1) more careful when making public announcements as every word counts to citizens and can change their attitude and decisions; (2) more sensitive and reactive to unusual information from clinics rather than waiting for formal reports from doctors or officials; (3) more restrictive to contain a potential epidemic at its early stage rather than attempting to comfort the public; and (4) more often to issue targeted and effective drills to increase the public's awareness about epidemic diseases and to test and improve the response system of the society periodically.
targetString: Sebagai contoh, agensi sewajarnya (1) lebih berhati-hati dalam membuat pengumuman kepada orang awam memandangkan setiap butiran yang disampaikan memberi kesan terhadap sikap dan keputusan rakyat; (2) lebih sensitif dan reaktif terhadap maklumat luar biasa yang diterima dari klinik berbanding menunggu laporan formal daripada doktor atau pegawai; (3) lebih tegas dalam membendung wabak berbanding mententeramkan orang awam; dan (4) lebih kerap mengadakan latihan bagi meningkatkan kesedaran awam berkenaan penyakit epidemik dan menguji serta memperbaiki sistem tindak balas masyarakat secara berkala.
en-mt: For example, agencies should (1) be more careful in making announcements to the public since every detail conveyed affects the attitude and decisions of the people; (2) more sensitive and reactive to unusual information received from the clinic than waiting for a formal report from a doctor or official; (3) more strict in curbing the epidemic than calming the public; and (4) conduct more frequent training to increase public awareness of epidemic diseases and periodically test and improve community response systems.

sourceString: The outbreak of COVID-19 caused by the novel virus SARS-CoV-2 started in the end of December 2019.
targetString: Penularan COVID-19 adalah disebabkan oleh virus novel SARS-CoV-2 yang bermula pada hujung Disember 2019.
en-mt: The transmission of COVID-19 is caused by the novel virus SARS-CoV-2 which started at the end of December 2019.

sourceString: In less than two months, it has spread all over China and near 50 other countries globally at the time of this writing.
targetString: Dalam tempoh masa kurang daripada 2 bulan, ia telah merebak ke seluruh China dan hampir 50 negara di seluruh dunia ketika penulisan ini dibuat.
en-mt: In less than 2 months, it has spread across China and nearly 50 countries around the world as of this writing.

sourceString: Since the virus is very similar to SARS-CoV and the symptoms are also similar between COVID-19 and SARS, the outbreak of COVID-19 has created a sense of SARS recurring.
targetString: Memandangkan virus ini hampir sama dengan SARS-CoV dan simptom juga adalah hampir sama dengan SARS, penularan COVID-19 telah mewujudkan sentimen bahawa wabak SARS telah berulang.
en-mt: Since this virus is very similar to SARS-CoV and the symptoms are also very similar to SARS, the spread of COVID-19 has created a sentiment that the SARS epidemic has recurred.

sourceString: However, there are some remarkable differences between COVID-19 and SARS, which are essential for containing the epidemic and treating the patients.
targetString: Walau bagaimanapun, terdapat perbezaan ketara di antara COVID-19 dan SARS, yang penting dalam membendung epidemik serta merawat pesakit.
en-mt: However, there are significant differences between COVID-19 and SARS, which are important in containing the epidemic and treating patients.

sourceString: COVID-19 affects more elderly individuals than youth and more men than women, and the severity and death rate are also higher in elderly individual than in youth.
targetString: COVID-19 memberi kesan kepada individu berusia berbanding golongan muda serta lebih memberi kesan kepada lelaki berbanding wanita, keterukan dan kadar kematian juga adalah lebih tinggi kepada warga tua berbanding belia.
en-mt: COVID-19 affects the elderly compared to the young and affects men more than women, the severity and death rate is also higher for the elderly than the young.

sourceString: SARS has higher mortality than COVID-19 (10.91% versus 1.44%).
targetString: SARS mempunyai kadar kematian yang lebih tinggi berbanding COVID-19 (10.91% berbanding 1.44%).
en-mt: SARS has a higher death rate than COVID-19 (10.91% versus 1.44%).

sourceString: COVID-19 patients transmit the virus even when they are symptomless whereas SARS patients do so usually when they are severely ill, which causes much greater difficulty to contain the spread of COVID-19 than SARS.
targetString: Pesakit COVID-19 boleh menyebarkan virus tanpa mengalami sebarang simptom manakala pesakit SARS meyebarkan virus dalam keadaan sakit, yang mengakibatkan kesukaran dalam membendung penularan COVID-19 berbanding SARS.
en-mt: COVID-19 patients can spread the virus without experiencing any symptoms while SARS patients spread the virus in a sick state, which results in difficulties in containing the spread of COVID-19 compared to SARS.

sourceString: This partially explains why SARS-CoV-2 spread much faster and broader than SARS-CoV.
targetString: Ini menjelaskan punca SARS-CoV-2 tersebar lebih pantas dan luas berbanding SARS-CoV.
en-mt: This explains why SARS-CoV-2 spread faster and more widely than SARS-CoV.

sourceString: The regular RNA assay for SARS-CoV-2 can be negative in some COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Hasil ujian RNA bagi SARS-CoV-2 mungkin negatif bagi pesakit COVID-19.
en-mt: RNA test results for SARS-CoV-2 may be negative for COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: On the other hand, cured patients can be positive for the virus again.
targetString: Walau bagaimanapun, pesakit yang telah sembuh boleh didapati positif virus semula.
en-mt: However, patients who have recovered can be found to be positive for the virus again.

sourceString: These findings dramatically increase the risk of virus spreading.
targetString: Penemuan ini secara tidak langsung meningkatkan risiko penularan virus.
en-mt: This discovery indirectly increases the risk of transmission of the virus.

sourceString: Given such rapid progress in research on COVID-19, several critical issues remain to be solved, as follows:
targetString: Berdasarkan kemajuan pesat dalam kajian terhadap COVID-19, beberapa isu kritikal masih perlu dirungkai, antaranya:
en-mt: Based on the rapid progress in the study of COVID-19, several critical issues still need to be resolved, among them:

sourceString: Where did SARS-CoV-2 come from?
targetString: Dari mana SARS-CoV-2 berasal?
en-mt: Where did SARS-CoV-2 come from?

sourceString: Although 96% genetic homolog was found between SARS-CoV-2 and two bat SARS-like CoVs, we still cannot conclude that SARS-CoV-2 is from bats.
