sourceString: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on 3 April.
targetString: Sumbangan 100,000 topeng muka daripada Jack Ma kepada Cuba telah dihalang oleh sekatan AS pada 3 April.
en-mt: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 face masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on April 3.

sourceString: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
targetString: Pihak berkuasa AS juga telah dituduh melencongkan bantuan untuk negara lain ke negara mereka sendiri.
en-mt: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other countries to their own.

sourceString: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.
targetString: Dan terdapat pertikaian berkaitan topeng dilaporkan antara negara lain, seperti Jerman, Austria dan Switzerland; dan Republik Czech dan Itali.
en-mt: And there are mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.

sourceString: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.
targetString: Selain itu, Turki merampas beratus-ratus ventilator yang menuju ke Sepanyol.
en-mt: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators headed for Spain.

sourceString: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected Italy.
targetString: Pada awal Mac, kerajaan Itali mengkritik kekurangan solidariti Kesatuan Eropah dengan Itali yang terjejas akibat koronavirus.
en-mt: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with Italy affected by the coronavirus.

sourceString: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "Only China responded bilaterally.
targetString: Maurizio Massari, duta Itali ke EU, berkata "Hanya China yang memberikan jawapan secara dua pihak.
en-mt: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said "Only China gave a bilateral answer.

sourceString: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."
targetString: Sudah pasti, ini bukanlah isyarat yang baik tentang solidariti Eropah."
en-mt: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: Pada 22 Mac, selepas panggilan telefon dengan Perdana Menteri Itali Giuseppe Conte, Presiden Rusia Vladimir Putin mengarahkan tentera Rusia untuk menghantar pasukan perubatan tentera, kenderaan penyahkuman khas dan peralatan perubatan lain ke Itali.
en-mt: On March 22, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered the Russian military to send military medical teams, special disinfection vehicles and other medical equipment to Italy.

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: Akhbar Itali La Stampa memetik "sumber politik peringkat tinggi" tanpa nama mengatakan bahawa 80 peratus bantuan Rusia "tidak berguna atau berguna sedikit kepada Itali".
en-mt: Italian newspaper La Stampa quoted an unnamed "high-level political source" as saying that 80 percent of Russian aid was "of little or no use to Italy".

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: Sumber itu menuduh Rusia melakukan kesalahan pesona "geopolitik dan diplomatik".
en-mt: The source accused Russia of committing "geopolitical and diplomatic" charms.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: Presiden Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, dan Menteri Luar Itali Luigi Di Maio menolak laporan media itu serta menyatakan penghargaan mereka.
en-mt: Lombardy President Attilio Fontana and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media report and expressed their appreciation.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: Rusia juga menghantar pesawat kargo dengan bantuan perubatan ke Amerika Syarikat.
en-mt: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: Jurucakap Kremlin Dmitry Peskov berkata bahawa "semasa menawarkan bantuan kepada rakan di AS, [Putin] menganggap bahawa apabila pengeluar peralatan dan bahan perubatan AS mendapat momentum, mereka juga akan dapat membalas jika perlu."
en-mt: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "while offering assistance to friends in the US, [Putin] considers that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to respond if necessary."

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: Latihan ketenteraan "Defender 2020" NATO yang dirancang di Jerman, Poland dan negara-negara Balkan, latihan peperangan NATO yang terbesar sejak tamatnya Perang Dingin, akan diadakan pada skala yang lebih kecil.
en-mt: NATO's "Defender 2020" military exercise planned in Germany, Poland and the Balkan countries, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a smaller scale.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: Setiausaha Am untuk Kempen Pelucutan Senjata Nuklear Kate Hudson mengkritik latihan Defender 2020: "Dalam krisis kesihatan awam semasa ini, ia membahayakan kehidupan bukan sahaja askar dari AS dan banyak negara Eropah lain yang mengambil bahagian tetapi juga penduduk negara tempat mereka beroperasi."Kerajaan Iran telah terjejas teruk oleh virus itu, dengan kira-kira dua dozen ahli parlimen serta lima belas figura politik semasa atau mantan yang lain.
en-mt: Secretary General for the Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In this current public health crisis, it endangers the lives of not only soldiers from the US and many other European countries participating but also the people of the countries where they operate." The Iranian government has hit hard by the virus, with about two dozen members of parliament as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: Presiden Iran Hassan Rouhani menulis surat terbuka kepada pemimpin dunia untuk meminta bantuan pada 14 Mac 2020, berkata bahawa negara beliau bergelut untuk melawan wabak itu akibat kekurangan akses kepada pasaran antarabangsa sebagai akibat daripada sekatan Amerika Syarikat ke atas Iran. Wabak itu telah menggesa seruan kepada Amerika Syarikat untuk mengamalkan dasar sosial yang biasa di negara kaya lain, termasuk penjagaan kesihatan universal, penjagaan kanak-kanak universal, cuti keluarga berbayar, dan tahap pembiayaan yang lebih tinggi untuk kesihatan awam.
en-mt: Iranian President Hassan Rouhani wrote an open letter to world leaders asking for help on March 14, 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the epidemic due to lack of access to international markets as a result of US sanctions on Iran. The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy nations, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: Penganalisis politik menjangkakan keadaan itu akan memberi kesan negatif pada peluang Donald Trump untuk dipilih semula pada pilihan raya presiden 2020. Hubungan diplomatik antara Jepun dan Korea Selatan bertambah buruk akibat pandemik itu.
en-mt: Political analysts expect the situation to have a negative impact on Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election. Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea have worsened due to the pandemic.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: Korea Selatan mengkritik "usaha kuarantin yang tidak jelas dan pasif" selepas Jepun mengumumkan sesiapa yang datang dari Korea Selatan akan diletakkan dalam kuarantin selama dua minggu di tapak yang ditentukan oleh kerajaan.
en-mt: South Korea criticized the "vague and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced that anyone arriving from South Korea would be quarantined for two weeks at a government-specified site.

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Masyarakat Korea Selatan pada mulanya tidak jelas dengan respons Presiden Moon Jae-in kepada krisis itu.
en-mt: South Korean society was initially confused by President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: Ramai rakyat Korea menandatangani petisyen yang meminta pemecatan Moon atas perkara yang dianggap sebagai salah kendalian kerajaan terhadap wabak itu, atau memuji respons beliau. Pandemik itu telah membenarkan negara untuk meluluskan undang-undang kecemasan sebagai balasan.
en-mt: Many Koreans signed petitions calling for Moon's impeachment over what they perceived as the government's mishandling of the epidemic, or praised his response. The pandemic has allowed the country to pass emergency laws in response.

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: Sesetengah pengulas telah menyuarakan kebimbangan bahawa tindakan itu akan membolehkan kerajaan mengukuhkan cengkaman kuasa mereka.
en-mt: Some commentators have voiced concerns that the move will allow the government to strengthen its grip on power.

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: Di Hungary, parlimennya mengundi untuk membenarkan perdana menteri, Viktor Orbán, untuk memerintah mengikut dekri secara berkekalan, menggantung parlimen serta pilihan raya dan menghukum mereka yang dianggap telah menyebarkan maklumat yang salah tentang virus dan pengendalian krisis itu oleh kerajaan.
en-mt: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspending parliament and elections and punishing those deemed to have spread misinformation about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: Wabak koronavirus telah dipersalahkan untuk beberapa kejadian kekurangan bekalan, berpunca daripada penggunaan peralatan untuk melawan wabak yang meningkat di seluruh dunia, pembelian panik, dan gangguan terhadap kilang serta operasi logistik.
en-mt: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from increased use of equipment to fight the outbreak worldwide, panic buying, and disruptions to factories and logistics operations.

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: Pentadbiran Makanan dan Ubatan Amerika Syarikat telah mengeluarkan amaran tentang kekurangan ubatan dan peralatan perubatan akibat permintaan pengguna yang meningkat serta gangguan pembekal.
en-mt: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about drug and medical equipment shortages due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruptions.

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: Beberapa kawasan turut menyaksikan pembelian panik yang menyebabkan rak licin daripada barangan keperluan seperti makanan, tisu tandas, dan air botol, menyebabkan kekurangan bekalan.
en-mt: Some areas also saw panic buying that left shelves bare of essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, causing shortages.

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: Industri teknologi terutamanya telah memberi amaran tentang kelewatan penghantaran barangan elektronik.
en-mt: The technology industry in particular has warned of delays in the delivery of electronic goods.

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: Menurut ketua pengarah WHO Tedros Adhanom, permintaan untuk peralatan perlindungan peribadi telah meningkat 100 kali ganda.
en-mt: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, demand for personal protective equipment has increased 100-fold.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: Permintaan ini telah menyebabkan peningkatan harga sehingga dua puluh kali ganda harga biasa dan juga menyebabkan kelewatan bekalan item perubatan selama empat hingga enam bulan.
en-mt: This demand has caused the price to increase up to twenty times the normal price and also caused a delay in the supply of medical items for four to six months.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: Ia turut menyebabkan kekurangan peralatan perlindungan peribadi di seluruh dunia, dengan WHO memberi amaran bahawa ini akan membahayakan kesihatan pekerja.
en-mt: It has also led to a worldwide shortage of personal protective equipment, with the WHO warning that this will endanger the health of workers.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: Di Australia, pandemik itu memberikan peluang baharu untuk pembeli daigou menjual produk Australia ke China.
en-mt: In Australia, the pandemic has provided new opportunities for daigou buyers to sell Australian products to China.

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: Aktiviti itu telah menyebabkan kekurangan formula bayi di beberapa pasar raya dan telah diharamkan oleh kerajaan Australia sebelum ini. Di sebalik prevalens kes COVID-19 yang tinggi di Itali Utara dan wilayah Wuhan, serta permintaan tinggi yang berterusan untuk produk makanan, kedua-dua kawasan telah terselamat daripada kekurangan makanan yang teruk.
en-mt: The activity has led to shortages of baby formula in some supermarkets and was previously banned by the Australian government. Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, as well as the continued high demand for food products, both areas have survived severe food shortages.

sourceString: Measures by China and Italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in Europe as well as in North America.
targetString: Langkah yang diambil oleh China dan Itali untuk melawan pengumpulan barangan dan jualan haram produk penting telah berjaya, mengelakkan kekurangan makanan yang teruk yang telah dijangka di Eropah serta di Amerika Utara.
en-mt: Measures taken by China and Italy to fight the hoarding and illegal sale of essential products have been successful, averting severe food shortages that had been expected in Europe as well as in North America.

sourceString: Northern Italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
targetString: Itali Utara dengan pengeluaran pertanian yang signifikan tidak menyaksikan pengurangan yang besar, tetapi harga mungkin meningkat menurut wakil industri.
en-mt: Northern Italy with significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.

sourceString: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in Wuhan city, while Chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
targetString: Rak makanan yang kosong hanya berlaku buat sementara, walaupun di kota Wuhan, manakala pegawai kerajaan China melepaskan simpanan khinzir untuk memastikan khasiat yang mencukupi untuk populasi.
en-mt: Empty food shelves are only temporary, even in the city of Wuhan, while Chinese government officials release pig stocks to ensure adequate nutrition for the population.

sourceString: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
targetString: Undang-undang yang sama wujud di Itali memerlukan pengeluar makanan untuk menyimpan rizab bagi kecemasan sedemikian.
en-mt: A similar law exists in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.

sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: Kerosakan kepada ekonomi global telah dirasai di China: menurut laporan media pada 16 Mac, ekonomi di China telah terjejas teruk dalam dua bulan pertama tahun 2020 akibat langkah yang diambil oleh kerajaan untuk mengawal penularan virus, dan jualan runcit menjunam sebanyak 20.5%.
en-mt: The damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to media reports on March 16, the economy in China has been hit hard in the first two months of 2020 by measures taken by the government to control the spread of the virus, and retail sales plunged by 20.5%.

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: Memandangkan tanah besar China ialah hub ekonomi dan pengeluaran yang utama, wabak virus telah dilihat membawa ancaman yang menganggu kestabilan besar kepada ekonomi global.
en-mt: As mainland China is a major economic and production hub, the virus outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: Agathe Demarais dari Unit Risikan Ekonomi telah meramalkan bahawa pasaran akan kekal turun-naik sehingga imej yang lebih jelas muncul tentang hasil yang berpotensi.
en-mt: Agathe Demarais of the Economic Intelligence Unit has predicted that markets will remain volatile until a clearer picture emerges of potential outcomes.

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: Pada Januari 2020, beberapa penganalisis menganggar bahawa keruntuhan ekonomi akibat epidemik pada pertumbuhan dunia boleh melepasi keadaan wabak SARS pada 2002-2004.
en-mt: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic collapse due to the epidemic on world growth could surpass the situation of the SARS epidemic in 2002-2004.

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: Satu anggaran daripada pakar di Universiti Washington di St. Louis memberikan kesan $300+ bilion pada rantaian bekalan dunia yang boleh bertahan sehingga dua tahun.
en-mt: An estimate from experts at Washington University in St. Louis had a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: Organisasi Negara Pengeksport Petroleum (OPEC) dilaporkan "huru-hara" selepas penurunan menjunam harga minyak akibat permintaan yang lebih rendah daripada China.
en-mt: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) is reportedly in "chaos" after a plunge in oil prices due to lower demand from China.

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: Pasaran saham global jatuh pada 24 Februari akibat peningkatan yang ketara dalam bilangan kes COVID-19 di luar tanah besar China.
en-mt: Global stock markets fell on February 24 due to a sharp increase in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: Pada 27 Februari, akibat kerisauan meningkat tentang penularan koronavirus, beberapa indeks saham A.S. termasuk NASDAQ-100, Indeks S&P 500, Purata Industri Dow Jones melaporkan kejatuhan paling teruk sejak 2008, dengan kajatuhan Dow 1,191 mata, kejatuhan paling besar dalam sehari sejak krisis kewangan pada 2007-08.
en-mt: On February 27, due to growing concerns about the spread of the coronavirus, several US stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, the Dow Jones Industrial Average reported their worst decline since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the biggest one-day drop since the financial crisis on 2007-08.

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: Semua ketiga-tiga indeks mengakhiri minggu itu dengan penurunan lebih daripada 10%.
en-mt: All three indices ended the week down more than 10%.

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: Pada 28 Februari, Penilaian Skop GmbH mengesahkan keupayaan kadar nilai kredit China, tetapi mengekalkan Tinjauan Negatif.
en-mt: On February 28, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed the strength of China's credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.

sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: Saham merudum akibat ketakutan pada koronavirus, kejatuhan paling besar pada 16 Mac.
en-mt: Stocks tumbled on coronavirus fears, the biggest fall on March 16.

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: Ramai menganggap akan berlaku kemelesetan ekonomi.
en-mt: Many think there will be an economic recession.

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: Ahli ekonomi Mohamed El-Erian memuji langkah kecemasan bank pusat dan negeri yang tepat pada masanya.
en-mt: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised the timely emergency measures of the central and state banks.

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: Bank pusat bertindak balas lebih cepat daripada yang mereka lakukan ketika kegawatan kewangan 2008.
en-mt: Central banks are responding more quickly than they did during the 2008 financial crisis.

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: Pelancongan ialah sektor yang paling teruk terjejas akibat larangan perjalanan, penutupan tempat awam termasuk tarikan pelancong, dan saranan kerajaan agar tidak melakukan perjalanan di serata dunia.
en-mt: Tourism is the sector worst affected by travel bans, closures of public places including tourist attractions, and government advisories against travel around the world.

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: Akibatnya, banyak syarikat penerbangan telah membatalkan penerbangan disebabkan permintaan yang rendah, termasuk British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, dan Qantas, manakala syarikat penerbangan wilayah di British Flybe telah berkubur.
en-mt: As a result, many airlines have canceled flights due to low demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while regional airlines in British Flybe have ground to a halt.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: Kesan kepada industri kapal persiaran berada pada tahap yang tidak pernah dilihat sebelum ini.
en-mt: The impact on the cruise ship industry is at a level never seen before.

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: Beberapa stesen keretapi dan pelabuhan feri juga telah ditutup.
en-mt: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: Epidemik berlaku secara kebetulan ketika Chunyun, musim perjalanan besar-besaran yang dikaitkan dengan cuti Tahun Baharu Cina.
en-mt: The epidemic occurred coincidentally during Chunyun, the mass travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.

sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: Beberapa acara melibatkan orang ramai telah dibatalkan oleh negara dan kerajaan wilayah, termasuk festival Tahun Baharu tahunan, dengan syarikat swasta juga secara bebas menutup kedai mereka dan tarikan pelancong seperti Disneyland Hong Kong dan Disneyland Shanghai.
en-mt: Several public events have been canceled by national and regional governments, including the annual New Year festival, with private companies also freely closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: Banyak acara Tahun Baharu Lunar dan tarikan pelancong telah ditutup untuk mengelakkan perhimpunan besar-besaran, termasuk Kota Larangan di Beijing dan pesta di kuil tradisional.
en-mt: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to avoid mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and parties at traditional temples.

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: Dalam 24 daripada 31 wilayah China, perbandaran dan wilayah, pihak berkuasa memanjangkan cuti Tahun Baharu hingga 10 Februari, mengarahkan semua tempat kerja untuk tidak dibuka semula sehingga tarikh berkenaan.
en-mt: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and provinces, authorities extended the New Year holiday to February 10, ordering all workplaces not to reopen until that date.

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: Wilayah ini mewakili 80% daripada KDNK negara dan 90% eksport.
en-mt: This region represents 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: Hong Kong menaikkan tahap tindak balas jangkitan penyakit ke tahap tertinggi dan mengisytiharkan kecemasan, menutup sekolah sehingga Mac dan membatalkan sambutan Tahun Baharu. Sektor peruncitan telah terkesan secara global, dengan pengurangan waktu perniagaan atau penutupan sementara.
en-mt: Hong Kong raised its infection response level to the highest level and declared a state of emergency, closing schools until March and canceling New Year's celebrations. The retail sector has been affected globally, with reduced business hours or temporary closures.

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: Kunjungan ke peruncit di Eropah dan Amerika Latin menurun sebanyak 40%.
en-mt: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America dropped by 40%.

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: Peruncit Amerika Utara dan Timur Tengah menyaksikan kejatuhan sebanyak 50-60%.
en-mt: North American and Middle Eastern retailers saw a drop of 50-60%.

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: Ini juga menyebabkan kejatuhan sebanyak 33-43% dalam trafik berjalan kaki ke pusat beli-belah pada bulan Mac berbanding Februari.
en-mt: This also led to a 33-43% drop in foot traffic to the mall in March compared to February.

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: Pengendali pusat membeli-belah di seluruh dunia melaksanakan langkah-langkah tambahan, contohnya meningkatkan kebersihan, memasang pengimbas haba untuk memeriksa suhu pengunjung, dan membatalkan acara. Menurut Suruhanjaya Ekonomi Bangsa-Bangsa Bersatu untuk Amerika Latin, kemelesetan yang didorong pandemik boleh menyebabkan tambahan antara 14 hingga 22 juta orang mengalami kemiskinan melampau di Amerika Latin berbanding mereka yang berada dalam situasi itu tanpa pandemik.
en-mt: Mall operators around the world are implementing additional measures, for example improving cleanliness, installing thermal scanners to check visitors' temperatures, and canceling events. According to the United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America, a recession driven by the pandemic could cause an additional 14 to 22 million people to experience extreme poverty in Latin America compared to those who would have been in that situation without the pandemic.

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: Pada Januari dan Februari 2020, ketika kemuncak epidemik di Wuhan, kira-kira 5 juta orang di China kehilangan pekerjaan mereka.
en-mt: In January and February 2020, at the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: Kebanyakan daripada hampir 300 juta pekerja migran dari luar bandar China telah terkandas di rumah di kawasan pedalaman atau terperangkap di Wilayah Hubei. Pada bulan Mac 2020, lebih daripada 10 juta rakyat Amerika hilang pekerjaan dan memohon bantuan kerajaan.
en-mt: Most of the nearly 300 million migrant workers from rural China have been stranded at home in the countryside or stuck in Hubei Province. In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government assistance.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: Penularan koronavirus boleh melenyapkan 47 juta pekerjaan di Amerika Syarikat dan kadar pengangguran boleh mencecah 32%, menurut yang dianggarkan oleh Bank Rizab Persekutuan St. Louis. Darurat di India telah menyebabkan puluhan juta pekerja asing di India (yang dibayar melalui gaji harian) tidak bekerja. Tinjauan dari Institut Angus Reid mendapati yang 44% isi rumah Kanada mengalami sejenis pengangguran. Hampir 900,000 pekerja hilang pekerjaan di Sepanyol sejak ia menjalani darurat pada pertengahan Mac 2020.
en-mt: The spread of the coronavirus could wipe out 47 million jobs in the United States and the unemployment rate could reach 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis. The Emergency in India has put tens of millions of migrant workers in India (who are paid through daily wages) out of work. A survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households experience some form of unemployment. Almost 900,000 workers have lost their jobs in Spain since it went into state of emergency in mid-March 2020.

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: Ketika pertengahan Mac, 4 juta pekerja Perancis memohon faedah tidak bekerja sementara dan 1 juta pekerja British memohon untuk skim kredit sejagat. Hampir separuh juta syarikat di Jerman telah menghantar pekerja mereka ke skim pekerja jangka pendek yang disubsidi kerajaan dikenali sebagai Kurzarbeit.
en-mt: In mid-March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for the universal credit scheme. Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers to a state-subsidized short-term worker scheme known as Kurzarbeit.

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: Skim pampasan kerja jangka masa pendek telah dilaksanakan oleh Perancis dan Britain.
en-mt: Short-term work compensation schemes have been implemented by France and Britain.

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: Sektor persembahan seni dan warisan kebudayaan telah terkesan secara mendalam dengan pandemik, memberi kesan kepada operasi organisasi begitu juga kepada individu-kedua-duanya berkerja makan gaji dan kerja bebas-di seluruh dunia.
en-mt: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been deeply affected by the pandemic, impacting the operations of organizations as well as individuals—both employed and freelance—all over the world.

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: Organisasi sektor seni dan kebudayaan mencuba untuk meningkatkan misi (selalunya dibiayai umum) mereka untuk menyediakan akses kepada warisan kebudayaan kepada masyarakat, mengekalkan keselamatan pekerja mereka dan masyarakat, serta menyokong artis apabila termampu.
en-mt: Arts and culture sector organizations try to enhance their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the public, maintain the safety of their workers and the community, and support artists where possible.

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: Sehingga Mac 202, di seluruh dunia dan pada tahap yang berbeza-beza, muzium, perpustakaan, tempat pertunjukan, dan institusi kebudayaan lain telah menutup pameran, penganjuran acara dan pertunjukan dibatalkan serta ditangguhkan sehingga masa yang tidak dapat dipastikan.
en-mt: As of March 2020, all over the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions have closed exhibitions, events and shows have been canceled and postponed until an undetermined time.

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: Dalam maklum balas, terdapat langkah-langkah intensif untuk menyediakan perkhidmatan alternatif melalui platfom digital. Satu lagi kejatuhan yang terbaru dan semakin menjunam akibat wabak itu ialah pembatalan perkhidmatan agama, acara besar dalam sukan, dan acara sosial lain, seperti festival muzik dan konsert, seminar teknologi, dan pertunjukan fesyen.
en-mt: In response, there are intensive measures to provide alternative services through digital platforms. Another recent and deepening fallout from the pandemic has been the cancellation of religious services, major sporting events, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology seminars, and fashion shows.

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: Industri perfileman turut juga terjejas. Vatican mengumumkan bahawa sambutan Minggu Suci di Rome, yang berlaku ketika minggu terakhir Lent musim bertaubat Kristian, telah dibatalkan.
en-mt: The film industry was also affected. The Vatican announced that the celebration of Holy Week in Rome, which takes place during the last week of Lent, the Christian penitential season, has been cancelled.

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: Banyak uskup telah mencadangkan penganut Kristian yang tua untuk duduk di rumah daripada menghadiri Upacara Gereja pada hari Ahad; beberapa gereja telah mengadakan perkhidmatan gereja melalui radio, strim secara langsung dalam talian atau televisyen manakala yang lain-lain menawarkan pemujaan pandu lalu.
en-mt: Many bishops have suggested elderly Christians to stay at home rather than attend Church Services on Sundays; some churches have held church services via radio, live stream online or television while others offer drive-thru worship.

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: Dengan Uskup Roman Katolik Rome menutup gereja dan gereja kecil serta dataran St. Peter dikosongkan daripada jemaah Kristian, badan-badan agama lain juga membatalkan perkhidmatan dan menghadkan perhimpunan awam di gereja, masjid, sinagog, kuil dan gudwara.
en-mt: With the Roman Catholic Bishops of Rome closing the churches and chapels and the square of St. Peter was emptied of Christian congregations, other religious bodies also canceled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gudwaras.

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: Menteri Kesihatan Iran mengumumkan pembatalan sembahyang Jumaat di kawasan yang terjejas dengan wabak dan makam kemudiannya ditutup, manakala Arab Saudi menghalang kemasukan jemaah asing serta penduduknya ke tempat suci di Mekah dan Madinah.
en-mt: Iran's Health Minister announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and the subsequent closure of tombs, while Saudi Arabia barred the entry of foreign pilgrims and its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: Pandemik itu telah mengakibatkan gangguan yang sangat ketara pada kalendar sukan di seluruh dunia sejak Perang Dunia Kedua.
en-mt: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the sporting calendar around the world since the Second World War.

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: Kebanyakan acara sukan utama telah sama ada dibatalkan atau ditangguhkan, termasuk Liga Juara-juara UEFA 2019–20, Liga Perdana 2019–20, Euro UEFA 2020, musim NBA 2019–20 dan musim NHL 2019–20.
en-mt: Most major sporting events have been either canceled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, the 2019–20 NBA season and the 2019–20 NHL season.

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: Wabak itu menjejaskan rancangan untuk Sukan Olimpik Musim Panas 2020, yang pada mulanya dijadualkan untuk bermula pada hujung bulan Julai; Jawatankuasa Olimpik Antarabangsa mengumumkan pada 24 Mac bahawa acara itu akan "dijadualkan semula ke tarikh selepas 2020 tetapi tidak melebihi musim panas 2021". Kasino dan lokasi perjudian di seluruh dunia telah ditutup serta perlawanan poker secara langsung telah sama ada ditangguhkan atau dibatalkan.
en-mt: The outbreak affected plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were initially scheduled to begin at the end of July; The International Olympic Committee announced on March 24 that the event would be "rescheduled to a date after 2020 but no later than summer 2021". Casinos and gambling locations around the world have been closed and live poker matches have either been postponed or canceled.

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: Ini telah menyebabkan ramai kaki judi beralih ke dalam talian, dengan banyak tapak perjudian dalam talian melaporkan peningkatan yang ketara dalam kadar pendaftaran baharu mereka. Dunia hiburan juga telah terjejas, dengan pelbagai kumpulan muzik menggantung atau membatalkan konsert jelajah.
en-mt: This has led to many gamblers turning online, with many online gambling sites reporting a significant increase in their new registration rates. The entertainment world has also been affected, with various bands suspending or canceling concert tours.

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: Banyak teater besar seperti teater di Broadway turut menggantung semua persembahan.
en-mt: Many large theaters such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: Beberapa artis telah menerokai cara untuk terus menghasilkan dan berkongsi karya melalui internet sebagai alternatif kepada persembahan secara langsung tradisional, seperti konsert penstriman secara langsung atau membuat "festival" berasaskan web untuk artis mempersembahkan, mengedarkan dan memperkenalkan karya mereka.
en-mt: Some artists have explored ways to continue producing and sharing work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performances, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute and promote their work.

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: Dalam talian, banyak meme Internet bertemakan koronavirus telah merebak apabila ramai yang beralih ke jenaka dan hiburan di sebalik ketidakpastian.
en-mt: Online, many coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humor and entertainment amid the uncertainty.

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: Sejak tercetusnya COVID-19, prejudis, xenofobia dan rasisme yang meningkat telah diperhatikan terhadap orang berketurunan Cina dan Asia Timur, dan terhadap orang dari lokasi panas di Eropah, Amerika Syarikat dan negara lain.
en-mt: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, increased prejudice, xenophobia and racism have been observed against people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: Insiden ketakutan, syak wasangka, dan kekasaran telah diperhatikan di banyak negara, terutamanya di Eropah, Asia Timur, Amerika Utara dan kawasan Asia-Pasifik.
en-mt: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and rudeness have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America and the Asia-Pacific region.

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: Laporan dari Februari (apabila majoriti kes masih terbatas di China) telah merakamkan sentimen rasis yang digambarkan dalam pelbagai kumpulan di seluruh dunia mengatakan orang China layak mendapat virus itu atau menerima perkara yang didakwa sebagai pembalasan yang adil.
en-mt: Reports from February (when the majority of cases were still confined to China) have recorded racist sentiments being expressed in various groups around the world saying the Chinese deserved the virus or receiving what they claimed was just retribution.

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: Sesetengah negara di Afrika juga telah melihat peningkatan dalam sentimen Anti-China.
en-mt: Some countries in Africa have also seen an increase in Anti-China sentiment.

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: Kebanyakan penduduk Wuhan dan Hubei telah melaporkan diskrimasi berdasarkan wilayah asal mereka.
en-mt: Most residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their region of origin.

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: Terdapat sokongan untuk China, kedua-dua dalam dan luar talian, serta terhadap mereka di kawasan yang teruk dilanda virus.
en-mt: There is support for China, both online and offline, as well as for those in areas hit hard by the virus.

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
targetString: Susulan perkembangan wabak ke negara kawasan panas baharu, orang dari Itali, negara pertama di Eropah yang mengalami wabak serius COVID-19, juga boleh menjadi mangsa syak wasangka dan xenophobaia. Rakyat di negara termasuk Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapura dan Korea Selatan pada mulanya menandatangani petisyen melobi untuk melarang rakyat China memasuki negara meeka sebagai usaha untuk menghentikan penyakit itu.
en-mt: Following the spread of the epidemic to new hot-spot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, can also become victims of suspicion and xenophobia. People in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore and South Korea initially signed a petition lobbying to ban Chinese nationals from entering the country in an effort to stop the disease.

sourceString: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
targetString: Di Jepun, tanda pagar #ChineseDontComeToJapan tular di Twitter.
en-mt: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan went viral on Twitter.

sourceString: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
targetString: Rakyat China serta rakyat Asia lain di United Kingdom dan Amerika Syarikat telah melaporkan tahap gangguan rasis, serta serangan yang meningkat.
en-mt: Chinese as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increased levels of racist harassment, as well as attacks.

sourceString: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
targetString: Presiden A.S. Donald Trump telah berdepan kritikan kerana merujuk pada koronavirus sebagai "Virus China", istilah yang dianggap oleh pengkritik sebagai rasis dan anti-China.
en-mt: US President Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term critics consider racist and anti-Chinese.

sourceString: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
targetString: Pembantah di Ukraine menyerang bas yang membawa rakyat Ukraine dan pemindah asing dari Wuhan ke Novi Sanzhary.
en-mt: Protesters in Ukraine attacked a bus carrying Ukrainians and migrants from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.

sourceString: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Pelajar dari Timur Laut India, yang berkongsi sempadan dengan China, dan belajar di kota utama India telah melaporkan mengalami gangguan yang berkaitan dengan wabak koronavirus.
en-mt: Students from India's Northeast, which shares a border with China, and studying in India's major cities have reported experiencing disruptions related to the coronavirus outbreak.

sourceString: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
targetString: Presiden unit Negeri Parti Bharatiya Janata di Bengal Barat Dilip Ghosh mengatakan bahawa rakyat China telah memusnahkan alam sekitar dan "itulah sebabnya Tuhan membalas perbuatan mereka."
en-mt: Bharatiya Janata Party State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh said that Chinese people have destroyed the environment and "that's why God is punishing them."

sourceString: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
targetString: Kenyataan itu kemudian dikecam oleh konsulat China di Kolkata, menggelarnya "salah". Di China, xenofobia dan rasisme terhadap penduduk bukan rakyat China telah dimarakkan oleh pandemik itu, dengan orang asing digambarkan sebagai "sampah asing" dan disasarkan untuk "pembuangan".
en-mt: The statement was later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "wrong". In China, xenophobia and racism against non-Chinese residents have been fueled by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign trash" and targeted for "deportation".

sourceString: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
targetString: Banyak akhbar dengan iklan berbayar telah mengeluarkannya untuk beberapa atau semua liputan koronavirus mereka.
en-mt: Many newspapers with paid ads have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.

sourceString: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
targetString: Banyak penerbit saintifik membuat kertas saintifik berkaitan wabak yang tersedia dengan akses terbuka.
en-mt: Many scientific publishers make epidemic-related scientific papers available with open access.

sourceString: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
targetString: Sesetengah saintis memilih untuk berkongsi hasil mereka dengan segera pada pelayan pracetak seperti bioRxiv.
en-mt: Some scientists choose to share their results immediately on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.

sourceString: Emerging infectious disease – Infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
targetString: Penyakit berjangkit yang muncul – Penyakit berjangkit dengan patogen memuncul, biasanya novel dalam julat wabak atau mod penularannya
en-mt: Emerging infectious disease – An infectious disease with an emerging pathogen, usually novel in its epidemic range or mode of transmission

sourceString: Globalization and disease – Overview of globalization and disease transmission
targetString: Globalisasi dan penyakit – Gambaran keseluruhan globalisasi dan penularan penyakit
en-mt: Globalization and disease – An overview of globalization and disease transmission

sourceString: List of epidemics and pandemics – A list of death tolls due to infectious disease
targetString: Senarai epidemik dan pandemik - Senarai jumlah kematian akibat penyakit berjangkit
en-mt: List of epidemics and pandemics - List of total deaths from infectious diseases

sourceString: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
targetString: Penyeludupan hidupan liar dan zoonosis - Risiko kesihatan yang dikaitkan dengan perdagangan hidupan liar eksotik
en-mt: Wildlife trafficking and zoonoses - Health risks associated with the exotic wildlife trade

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: Ujian makmal untuk penyakit koronavirus pernafasan 2019 (COVID-19) dan virus SARS-CoV-2 yang dikaitkan termasuk kaedah untuk mengesan kehadiran virus serta kaedah yang mengesan antibodi yang dihasilkan sebagai tindak balas kepada jangkitan.
en-mt: Laboratory tests for respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus include methods to detect the presence of the virus as well as methods that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: Kehadiran virus dalam sampel disahkan oleh RT-PCR, yang mengesan RNA koronavirus.
en-mt: The presence of the virus in the sample is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects coronavirus RNA.

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: Ujian ini khusus dan direka hanya untuk mengesan RNA virus SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: This test is specific and designed only to detect RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: Ujian itu digunakan untuk mengesahkan jangkitan yang sangat baharu atau aktif.
en-mt: The test is used to confirm a very new or active infection.

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: Pengesanan antibodi (serologi) boleh digunakan untuk kedua-dua diagnosis dan pengawasan populasi.
en-mt: Antibody detection (serology) can be used for both diagnosis and population surveillance.

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: Ujian antibodi menunjukkan bilangan pesakit yang telah menghidap penyakit itu, termasuk mereka yang simptomnya terlalu ringan untuk dilaporkan atau yang asimptomatik.
en-mt: The antibody test shows the number of patients who have had the disease, including those whose symptoms are too mild to report or who are asymptomatic.

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
targetString: Kadar kematian akibat penyakit yang tepat dan tahap imuniti kelompok dalam populasi boleh ditentukan dari keputusan ujian ini.
en-mt: Accurate disease mortality rates and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of these tests.

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
targetString: Akibat ujian yang terhad, setakat Mac 2020 tiada negara memiliki data yang boleh diharapkan tentang prevalens virus dalam populasi mereka.
en-mt: As a result of limited testing, as of March 2020 no country has reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.

sourceString: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
targetString: Sehingga 23 Mac, tiada negara telah menguji lebih daripada 3% populasi mereka, dan terdapat kepelbagaian yang banyak dalam jumlah ujian yang telah dilakukan di seluruh negara-negara.
en-mt: As of March 23, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there was considerable variation in the amount of testing that had been done across countries.

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: Kepelbagaian ini juga berkemungkin akan menjejaskan kadar kematian kes yang dilaporkan dengan ketara, yang mungkin dianggarkan secara berlebihan dengan ketara di beberapa negara.
en-mt: This variability is also likely to significantly affect reported case fatality rates, which may be significantly overestimated in some countries.

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
targetString: Menggunakan transkripsi berbalik tindak balas rantaian polimerase (rRT-PCR) masa nyata ujian boleh dilakukan pada sampel respiratori yang diperolehi melalui pelbagai kaedah, termasuk swab nasofaringeal dan sampel sputum.
en-mt: Using reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) real-time testing can be performed on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swabs and sputum samples.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
targetString: Keputusannya biasanya tersedia dalam masa beberapa jam hingga 2 hari.
en-mt: The results are usually available within a few hours to 2 days.

sourceString: The RT-PCR test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
targetString: Ujian RT-PCR yang dilakukan dengan swab kerongkong hanya boleh dipercayai pada minggu pertama penyakit.
en-mt: RT-PCR tests performed with throat swabs are only reliable in the first week of illness.

sourceString: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
targetString: Kemudian virus itu boleh hilang di tekak sambil terus berganda dalam paru-paru.
en-mt: Then the virus can disappear in the throat while continuing to multiply in the lungs.

sourceString: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
targetString: Bagi mereka yang dijangkiti yang diuji dalam minngu kedua, secara alternatif bahan sampel kemudiannya boleh diambil dari dalam laluan udara yag dalam menggunakan kateter penyedutan atau bahan menyebabkan batuk (sputum) boleh digunakan.
en-mt: For those infected who are tested in the second week, alternatively the sample material can then be taken from the deep airways using an inhalation catheter or cough-inducing material (sputum) can be used.

sourceString: One of the early PCR tests was developed at Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).
targetString: Salah satu ujian PCR terawal telah dibangunkan di Charité di Berlin pada Januari 2020 menggunakan transkripsi berbalik tindak balas polyemerase (rRT-PCR) masa nyata, dan menjadi asas untuk 250,000 kit untuk diedarkan oleh Pertubuhan Kesihatan Dunia (WHO).
en-mt: One of the earliest PCR tests was developed at the Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and became the basis for 250,000 kits to be distributed by the World Health Organization (WHO).

sourceString: The United Kingdom had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.
targetString: United Kingdom juga telah membangunkan ujian menjelang 23 Januari 2020. Syarikat Korea Selatan Kogenebiotech membangunkan kid pengesanan SARS-CoV-2 berasaskan PCR, gred kilinikal (PowerChek Coronavirus) pada 28 Januari 2020.
en-mt: The United Kingdom has also developed a test by January 23, 2020. The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a PCR-based, clinical-grade SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on January 28, 2020.

sourceString: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
targetString: Ia mencari gen "E" yang dikongsi oleh semua beta koronaviruses, dan gen RdRp yang khusus kepada SARS-CoV-2. Di China, BGI Group adalah salah satu syarikat pertama yang menerima kelulusan penggunaan kecemasan daripada Pentadbiran Produk Perubatan Kebangsaan China untuk kit pengesanan SARS-CoV-2 berasaskan PCR. Di Amerika Syarikat, Pusat untuk Kawalan dan Pencegahan Penyakit (CDC) mengedarkan Panel Diagnostik RT-PCR 2019-Novel Koronavirus (2019-nCoV) Masa Nyata kepada makmal kesihatan awam melalui International Reagent Resource.
en-mt: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2. In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from the National Medical Products Administration of China for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit. In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) distributes the Real-Time 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health laboratories through the International Reagent Resource.

sourceString: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020.
targetString: Satu daripada tiga ujian genetik dalam versi lama kit ujian itu menyebabkan keputusan yang tidak pasti akibat reagen yang rosak, dan ujian leher botol di CDC di Atlanta; ini menghasikan secara purata kurang daripada 100 sampel sehari ini berjaya diproses sepanjang bulan Februari 2020;
en-mt: One of the three genetic tests in the older version of the test kit produced inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and the test bottlenecked at the CDC in Atlanta; this results in an average of less than 100 samples per day successfully processed throughout the month of February 2020;

sourceString: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
targetString: Ujian menggunakan dua komponen tidak dapat dipastikan boleh dipercayai sehingga 28 Februari 2020, dan sebelum itu makmal negeri dan tempatan tiak dibenarkan untuk memulakan ujian.
en-mt: Testing using the two components cannot be confirmed to be reliable until February 28, 2020, and before then state and local laboratories are not allowed to begin testing.

sourceString: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020.
targetString: Ujian itu telah diluluskan oleh Pentadbiran Makanan dan Dadah di bawah Kebenaran Penggunaan Kecemasan. Makmal komersial A.S. memulakan ujian pada awal Mac 2020.
en-mt: The test has been approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization. US commercial laboratories began testing in early March 2020.

sourceString: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR.
targetString: Setakat 5 Mac 2020 LabCorp mengumumkan ketersediaan ujian COVID-19 berdasarkan RT-PCR di seluruh negara.
en-mt: As of March 5, 2020 LabCorp announced the availability of RT-PCR-based COVID-19 tests nationwide.

sourceString: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020.
targetString: Quest Diagnostics juga sama menjadikan ujian COVID-19 tersedia di seluruh negara mulai 9 Mac 2020.
en-mt: Quest Diagnostics is also making the COVID-19 test available nationwide from March 9, 2020.

sourceString: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements.
targetString: Tiada had kuantiti telah diumumkan; pengumpulan spesimen dan pemprosesan mesti dilaksanakan mengikut keperluan CDC.
en-mt: No quantity limit has been announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed in accordance with CDC requirements.

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: Di Rusia, ujian COVID-19 telah dibangunkan dan dihasilkan oleh Pusat Penyelidikan Virologi dan Bioteknologi Negara VECTOR.
en-mt: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the VECTOR National Research Center for Virology and Biotechnology.

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: Pada 11 Februari 2020 ujian itu telah didaftarkan oleh Perkhidmatan Persekutuan untuk Pengawasan dalam Kesihatan. Pada 12 March 2020, Klinik Mayo dilaporkan telah membangunkan ujian untuk mengesan jangkitan COVID-19. Pada 13 Mac 2020, Roche Diagnostics menerima kelulusan FDA untuk ujian yang boleh dilakukan dalam masa 3.5 jam dalam bilangan yang tinggi, sekaligus membenarkan satu mesin untuk melakukan kira-kira 4,128 ujian dalam masa 24 jam.
en-mt: On February 11, 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Health. On March 12, 2020, the Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection. On March 13, 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test that can be performed in 3.5 hours in high numbers, allowing one machine to perform approximately 4,128 tests in 24 hours.

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: Pada 19 Mac 2020, FDA mengeluarkan kebenaran penggunaan kecemasan (EUA) kepada Abbott Laboratories untuk ujian ke atas sistem m2000 Abbott; FDA sebelum itu telah mengeluarkan kebenaran yang serupa kepada Hologic, LabCorp, dan Thermo Fisher Scientific.
en-mt: On March 19, 2020, the FDA issued an emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for testing on Abbott's m2000 system; The FDA previously issued similar authorizations to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: Pada 21 Mac 2020, Cepheid sama juga menerima EUA daripada FDA untuk ujian yang mengambi masa kira-kira 45 minit.
en-mt: On March 21, 2020, Cepheid also received an EUA from the FDA for a test that took about 45 minutes.

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: FDA telah meluluskan ujian yang menggunakan teknologi pembesaran asid nukleik isotermal bukannya PCR.
en-mt: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: Memandangkan ujian ini tidak memerlukan siri kitaran suhu yang berubah-ubah kaedah ini boleh memberikan keputusan positif dalam masa secepat lima minit dan keputusan negatif dalam masa 13 minit.
en-mt: Since this test does not require a series of variable temperature cycles the method can provide a positive result in as little as five minutes and a negative result in 13 minutes.

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: Pada masa ini terdapat kira-kira 18,000 mesin ini di A.S. dan Abbott menjangkakan untuk mempercepatkan pengeluaran untuk menghantar 50,000 ujian sehari. Ujian yang menggunakan antibodi monoklon yang secara khusus mengikat kepada proteon nukleokapsid (N protein) novel koronavirus sedang dibangunkan di Taiwan, dengan harapan ujian itu boleh memberikan keputusan dalam masa 15 ke 20 minit sama seperti ujian influenza pantas.
en-mt: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the US and Abbott expects to ramp up production to deliver 50,000 tests a day. A test that uses a monoclonal antibody that specifically binds to the nucleocapsid proteon (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that the test could provide results in 15 to 20 minutes similar to a rapid influenza test.

sourceString: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
targetString: Pada Mac 2020 satu ulasan tulisan menyimpulkan bahawa "radiograf dada mempunyai nilai diagnostik yang kecil pada peringkat awal, manakala penemuan CT [tomografi berkomputer] mungkin telah hadir walaupun sebelum simptom bermula."
en-mt: In March 2020 a written review concluded that "chest radiographs have little diagnostic value in the early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may have been present even before the onset of symptoms."

sourceString: Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution.
targetString: Ciri tipikal CT termasuklah kelegapan kaca tanah multilobar dwisis dengan taburan persisian, asimetrik dan posterior.
en-mt: Typical CT features include bilateral multilobar ground glass opacities with peripheral, asymmetric, and posterior distribution.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves.
targetString: Dominasi subpleura, pembukaan menggila dan penggabungan terbentuk apabila penyakit berevolusi.
en-mt: Predominance of the subpleura, the opening of the freckles and fusions are formed as the disease evolves.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: Satu kajian yang membandingkan PCR kepada CT di Wuhan di titik asal pandemik semasa telah mencadangkan bahawa CT adalah secara signifikan lebih sensitif daripada PCR, walaupun kurang khusus, dengan banyak ciri pengimejannya bertindak dengan proses pneumonia dan penyakit lain.
en-mt: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, although less specific, with many of its imaging features acting on pneumonia and other disease processes.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.
targetString: Setakat Mac 2020, Kolej Radiologi Amerika mengesyorkan bahawa "CT tidak seharusnya digunakan untuk menyaring atau sebagai ujian garisan pertama untuk mendiagnosis COVID-19". Setakat Mac 2020, CDC mengesyorkan PCR untuk saringan awal.
en-mt: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19". As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.

sourceString: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
targetString: Sebahagian daripada respons imun kepada jangkitan ialah penghasilan antibodi termasuk IgM dan IgG.
en-mt: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
