en-mt: This reminds me of how much it means to the world now to be able to refer to Wikipedia, and how powerful a symbol it is because this critical resource remains online and available to all.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: Kerja anda menjadikan semua ini boleh, sama ada anda memastikan tapak web kekal aktif atau rakan sekerja anda dibayar atau komuniti kita selamat.
en-mt: Your work makes all of this possible, whether it's keeping the website up or your colleagues paid or our community safe.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: Dunia memerlukan maklumat yang disediakan oleh Wikipedia, lebih-lebih lagi pada masa sekarang.
en-mt: The world needs the information Wikipedia provides, more so than ever.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: Ini merupakan momen yang bukan sahaja apa kita lakukan tetapi cara kita melakukannya, akan memberi impak bermakna kepada dunia.
en-mt: This is a moment when not only what we do but how we do it, will have a meaningful impact on the world.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: Disebabkan pentingnya misi ini dan peranan anda di dalamnya, kita akan membuat beberapa penyesuaian signifikan terhadap cara kita bekerjasama, mulai minggu depan.
en-mt: Due to the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to the way we work together, starting next week.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: Penyelarasan kepada kerja dan jadual kita
en-mt: Coordination to our work and schedule

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: Seperti yang Robyn sebut sebelumnya, pasukan c bertemu malam tadi untuk membincangkan pendekatan kita dan jadual untuk hari dan bulan akan datang.
en-mt: As Robyn mentioned earlier, the c team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: Dalam perbincangan itu, kami menganggap apa yang kami fikirkan akan menjadi respons sesuai dengan apa yang kita hadapi dan cara terbaik untuk memastikan organisasi ini dapat bertahan pada masa ini.
en-mt: In that discussion, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we are facing and the best way to ensure that this organization survives at this time.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: Secara bersama, kami mahu menghilangkan stres dan menyokong misi kita untuk jangka masa panjang.
en-mt: Together, we want to relieve stress and support our mission for the long term.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: Jika anda perlu memperlahankan sedikit, tidak mengapa.
en-mt: If you need to slow down a bit, that's fine.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: Kepada semua staf, kontraktor dan pekerja kontrak:
en-mt: To all staff, contractors and contract workers:

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: jangkaan kerja harian kita akan menjadi lebih kurang 4 jam sehari atau 20 jam seminggu sehingga diberitahu kelak.
en-mt: Our daily work expectations will be approximately 4 hours a day or 20 hours a week until further notice.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: Kami tidak mengumumkan cuti - jika anda dapat bekerja pada waktu biasa, misi boleh menggunakan anda.
en-mt: We don't announce holidays - if you can work normal hours, the mission can use you.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: Walau bagaimanapun, dunia sekarang tidak dapat diramal. Sama ada anda perlu menjaga orang tersayang, membeli barang dapur atau berjumpa doktor, kesejahteraan anda keutamaan kami.
en-mt: However, today's world is unpredictable. Whether you need to care for a loved one, buy kitchen items or see a doctor, your well-being is our priority.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: Kami tidak akan mencatat masa anda.
en-mt: We will not record your time.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: Jika anda sakit, jangan bekerja.
en-mt: If you are sick, don't work.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: Hal ini sepatutnya tidak diberitahu, tapi kami memberitahunya.
en-mt: This should not be told, but we told it.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: Tidak perlu hari sakit atau PTO - cuma beritahu pengurus anda dan bantu pasukan anda menyemak semula kalendar dan jadual untuk memastikan bidang utama kerja diliputi.
en-mt: No need for sick days or PTO - just let your manager know and help your team review calendars and schedules to ensure key areas of work are covered.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (Sekiranya anda didiagnosis positif COVID-19, maklumkan Bryan dalam T&C Ops supaya T&C dapat membantu dengan sokongan dan memastikan keadaan anda mendapat perhatian sewajarnya daripada pihak pengurusan).
en-mt: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, notify Bryan in T&C Ops so that T&C can assist with support and ensure your condition receives the appropriate attention from management).

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: Mereka yang dibayar mengikut jam akan dibayar penuh.
en-mt: Those paid by the hour will be paid in full.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: Kami sudah memberitahu dan menegaskan komitmen untuk menghormati komitmen kontraktor kami dan rakan sekerja staf yang dibayar mengikut jam.
en-mt: We have communicated and reaffirmed our commitment to honor the commitments of our contractors and hourly paid staff colleagues.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: Setiap orang akan dibayar berdasarkan jam kerja biasa mereka dalam keadaan biasa.
en-mt: Everyone will be paid based on their normal working hours under normal circumstances.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: Ini termasuk jika anda sakit dan tidak dapat bekerja.
en-mt: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: Jika anda mahu bekerja, kami menyokong anda.
en-mt: If you want to work, we support you.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: Ramai orang menggunakan kerja sebagai cara menyalurkan stres mereka dengan dunia di sekeliling kita.
en-mt: Many people use work as a way to channel their stress with the world around us.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: Apa yang kita buat boleh menjadi begitu memuaskan kita, terutamanya dalam masa-masa seperti ini.
en-mt: What we do can be so fulfilling to us, especially in times like these.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: Sekali lagi, ini tentang penjagaan diri anda.
en-mt: Again, it's about taking care of yourself.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: Kami cuma minta anda berkomunikasi dengan pengurus anda agar kami tahu apa untuk dijangka dan dapat menyesuaikannya dengan sewajarnya.
en-mt: We just ask that you communicate with your manager so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: Sesetengah kerja dianggap penting.
en-mt: Some work is considered important.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: Terdapat sesetengah perkara yang kita mesti teruskan berjalan.
en-mt: There are some things we must keep going.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: Pasukan SRE, HR Ops, Amanah & Keselamatan, dan Pengumpulan Dana (antaranya) melakukan kerja kritikal yang mungkin memerlukan bantuan tambahan.
en-mt: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Security, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may require additional assistance.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: Kita akan memulakan proses dengan semua jabatan untuk menilai objektif semasa dan mengalihkan fokus kita kepada menyokong apa yang penting untuk misi kita.
en-mt: We will begin a process with all departments to evaluate current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what is important to our mission.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: Banyak yang perlu dibuat untuk kita semua, kita hanya akan fokus pada projek yang paling penting.
en-mt: There is a lot to do for all of us, we will only focus on the most important projects.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: Melambatkan sekarang tidak akan memudaratkan kemudian.
en-mt: Slowing down now won't hurt later.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: Kita tidak merancang untuk bergerak "dua kali ganda untuk mengejar apa yang tertinggal" sebaik sahaja pandemik ini berlalu.
en-mt: We do not plan to move "double to catch up" once this pandemic is over.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: Anda tidak diharap untuk bekerja lebih masa untuk memenuhi tarikh akhir yang kini tidak realistik.
en-mt: You are not expected to work overtime to meet the now unrealistic deadline.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: Kami mengakui bahawa keadaan sudah berubah, dan akan berusaha untuk menetapkan sasaran dan garis masa baharu sekiranya perlu.
en-mt: We recognize that things have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines if necessary.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: Apakah yang terjadi dengan APP (Rancangan Tahunan)?
en-mt: What happened to the APP (Annual Plan)?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: Untuk menyesuaikan dengan realiti sebenar dan jangkaan jam bekerja harian kita, kami ingin melaraskan garis masa penyampaian Rancangan Tahunan 2020-2021 kami.
en-mt: To adjust to the actual reality and expectations of our daily working hours, we would like to adjust the delivery timeline of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: Hasrat kami untuk mengesyorkan lanjutan rancangan 2019-2020 yang membenarkan lebih masa untuk belanjawan bagi membenarkan pekerja untuk memberi keutamaan pada kerja kritikal, penjagaan diri sendiri dan penjagaan mereka yang tersayang sementara membantu mereka yang perlu atau ingin bekerja dengan tempoh kerja yang dikurangkan untuk beberapa minggu akan datang.
en-mt: It is our intention to recommend an extension of the 2019-2020 plan that allows more time to budget to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care and care for their loved ones while assisting those who need or want to work reduced hours for several weeks. come

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: Lanjutan garis masa sangat mengurangkan beban kerja dan tekanan rancangan semasa di seluruh organisasi.
en-mt: Timeline extensions greatly reduce the workload and pressure of current plans across the organization.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: Kami akan memperkenalkan cadangan kami kepada Lembaga pada minggu hadapan dan akan memaklumkan para wakil dan pasukan tentang langkah-langkah seterusnya sebaik sahaja kami mendapat pengesahan.
en-mt: We will present our proposal to the Board next week and will inform representatives and teams of next steps once we have confirmation.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: Terima kasih kepada pasukan APP di atas kepimpinan anda dalam hal ini.
en-mt: Thanks to the APP team for your leadership on this.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: Status pejabat, pendedahan dan pembersihan
en-mt: Office status, exposure and cleaning

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: Minggu lepas, kami dimaklumkan bahawa salah seorang rakan sekerja SF kami mungkin terdedah pada virus COVID-19.
en-mt: Last week, we were notified that one of our SF colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: Bagaimanapun, sebagai langkah berhati-hati, kami telah mengupah pasukan pembersihan antivirus untuk menyahjangkit semua permukaan di pejabat San Francisco.
en-mt: However, as a precaution, we have hired an antivirus cleaning team to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: Mereka menggunakan larutan antivirus gred hospital untuk menyahjangkit setiap permukaan serta lobi dan sistem elevator yang mencapai tingkat kami.
en-mt: They used a hospital grade antiviral solution to disinfect every surface as well as the lobby and elevator system that reached our floor.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: Bangunan ini menerima pakai protokol tugas penjagaan tersendiri dalam menggunakan produk yang menyokong keselamatan para penyewanya.
en-mt: The building adopts its own duty of care protocol in using products that support the safety of its tenants.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: Kami berasa selesa bahawa pejabat akan tersedia dengan baik apabila kami memutuskan untuk kembali.
en-mt: We feel comfortable that the office will be well available when we decide to return.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: Pejabat DC kami terletak di WeWork, yang berkongsi protokol COVID-19 dengan kami dan semua ahli kakitangan berpangkalan di DC.
en-mt: Our DC office is located at WeWork, which shares the COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: Setakat minggu lepas, pejabat DC kami beralih kepada persediaan jauh sepenuhnya sejajar dengan panduan yang dikongsikan dengan San Francisco.
en-mt: As of last week, our DC office transitioned to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: Seperti mana yang diketahui oleh beberapa rakan sekerja berpangkalan di NYC, kami juga berbincang tentang pemajakan satu lokasi di Brooklyn.
en-mt: As some NYC-based colleagues know, we are also discussing leasing a location in Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: Perbincangan ini berterusan tetapi mungkin akan ditangguhkan.
en-mt: These discussions are ongoing but may be delayed.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: Beberapa rakan sekerja kami bekerja secara jauh untuk kali pertama.
en-mt: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: Rakan sekerja secara jauh sekian lama kami tahu bahawa ia boleh menjadi suatu penyesuaian dan mahu memberikan beberapa nasihat kepada anda:
en-mt: Long time remote colleagues we know it can be an adjustment and want to give you some advice:

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: Hadkan tempoh mesyuarat untuk paling lama tambahan satu atau dua jam.
en-mt: Limit the length of the meeting to an extra hour or two at most.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: Jika sesi lebih panjang diperlukan, pertimbangkan cara untuk dibahagikan untuk beberapa hari.
en-mt: If longer sessions are needed, consider splitting them up over several days.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: Menentukan mesyuarat secara jelas, mempunyai agenda dan menghantar bahan bacaan terlebih dahulu.
en-mt: Determine the meeting clearly, have an agenda and send reading materials in advance.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: Membuatkan video lalai, dengan alatan seperti Google Docs dan Zoom untuk memudahkan kolaborasi dan sambungan langsung.
en-mt: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate collaboration and live connection.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: Mempunyai seorang ketua untuk mengendalikan setiap mesyuarat, seseorang untuk memantau bual untuk soalan dan menjejak senarai pengucap, dan seseorang membantu untuk mengambil nota (atau melakukan pengambilan nota secara kolaboratif).
en-mt: Have a leader to moderate each meeting, someone to monitor the conversation for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: Hantarkan e-mel kepada sokongan teknikal jika anda memerlukan fon kepala yang selesa.
en-mt: Email technical support if you need comfortable headphones.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: Gunakan pembayaran ganti kesejahteraan anda untuk makanan ringan.
en-mt: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: Sertai saluran #remoties dalam Slack untuk berbual dengan rakan sekerja anda tentang tugas yang diagihkan
en-mt: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to chat with your colleagues about delegated tasks

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: Pasukan Operasi HR sedang melihat pada panduan webinar ergonomik untuk menyokong peningkatan dalam tugas yang diagihkan ke seluruh Yayasan.
en-mt: The HR Operations team is looking at ergonomics webinar guidance to support improvements in distributed tasks across the Foundation.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: Sejak beberapa minggu kebelakangan ini kami bertanya semua penerima geran komuniti untuk membatalkan acara awam yang dibiayai oleh Wikimedia, seperti editaton sehingga WHO mengumumkan pengakhiran pandemik.
en-mt: Over the last few weeks we have asked all community grantees to cancel public events funded by Wikimedia, such as editathons until the WHO announces the end of the pandemic.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: Kami memberitahu mereka bahawa kami memahami permintaan kami untuk pembatalan dan sekatan yang lain boleh menjadi sesuatu yang mustahil dalam menyiapkan aktiviti geran yang dipersetujui mereka dan tiada yang akan dikenakan tindakan kerana kelewatan atau mengubah suai matlamat tersebut.
en-mt: We inform them that we understand our requests for cancellations and other restrictions may make it impossible to complete their agreed upon grant activities and that no action will be taken for delay or modification of such goals.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: Pada minggu akan datang kami akan membuat susulan dengan panduan tambahan tentang Wikimania dan persidangan komuniti wilayah dan tematik yang lain.
en-mt: In the coming weeks we will follow up with additional guides on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: Sentimen umum dari seluruh komuniti global nampaknya ialah kesedihan pada gangguan tetapi berasa lega pada kejelasan dan kemampuan untuk menumpukan pada komuniti mereka sendiri, Wikimedia dan sebaliknya.
en-mt: The general sentiment from the entire global community seems to be sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own community, Wikimedia and otherwise.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: Maju ke hadapan, CRT berusaha untuk membangunkan satu halaman tentang Meta-Wiki untuk menyediakan ruang kepada komuniti untuk memantau impak dan menuruti komunikasi kami dengan mereka.
en-mt: Moving forward, CRT is working to develop a page about the Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: Kekal berhubungan mengenai isu-isu berkaitan COVID-19
en-mt: Stay connected on issues related to COVID-19

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Kami akan menghantar satu jemputan ke kalendar anda untuk Khamis akan datang, pada 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT untuk mesyuarat khas kakitangan.
en-mt: We will send an invitation to your calendar for next Thursday, at 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Kami akan menggunakan masa ini untuk berkongsi kemas kini tambahan, menjawab soalan anda dan meluangkan sedikit masa untuk berhubung dengan satu sama lain.
en-mt: We will use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Kita bersama-sama dalam perkara ini dan berada di sini untuk membantu setakat yang kami mampu.
en-mt: We are in this together and are here to help as much as we can.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: Buat masa ini, anda boleh terus mencari maklumat dari e-mel ini, dan semua maklumat berkaitan COVID-19 penting yang lain pada Office Wiki.
en-mt: For now, you can continue to find information from this email, and all other important COVID-19 related information on the Office Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT akan memastikan semua halaman ini dikemaskinikan dan semua maklumat berada pada satu tempat.
en-mt: CRT will keep all these pages updated and all information in one place.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: Kami juga berusaha untuk memastikan komunikasi biasa dengan kakitangan yang berada di negara yang sangat terkesan pada masa ini.
en-mt: We are also working to ensure regular communication with staff who are currently in the most affected countries.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Jika anda mempunyai sebarang soalan tentang perjalanan, acara, satu aliran kerja utama, atau cabaran liputan, atau apa-apa sahaja bantuan yang anda perlukan, jangan segan untuk memaklum dan bekerjasama dengan CRT.
en-mt: If you have any questions about a trip, event, a major workflow, or coverage challenge, or anything else you need help with, don't hesitate to reach out and work with CRT.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Kami berada di sini untuk membantu dalam menyediakan sokongan dan menjadi penghubung sekiranya diperlukan.
en-mt: We are here to help provide support and be a liaison if needed.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Jika anda mempunyai perkara sulit atau sensitif, sila e-melkan kepada Bryan Judan - Pengarah Operasi Global Antarabangsa HR.
en-mt: If you have confidential or sensitive matters, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: Tiada mana-mana perubahan ini patut dilihat sebagai pengabaian kerja dan tanggungjawab kami.
en-mt: None of these changes should be seen as an abdication of our work and responsibilities.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: Namun, semua ini adalah pengiktirafan pada ketika ini, kerja dan tanggungjawab kami berkemungkinan perlu disesuaikan dengan cara yang tidak seperti masa lalu.
en-mt: All of this, however, is a recognition that at this point, our work and responsibilities may need to be adapted in a way that has not been the case in the past.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: Ini adalah langkah-langkah yang kami percaya sebagai perlu untuk menyokong antara satu sama lain agar kita boleh terus bekerja, menyediakan pergerakan kita dengan sokongan yang mereka perlukan, dan perkhidmatan dunia yang boleh diharapkan oleh mereka.
en-mt: These are steps that we believe are necessary to support each other so that we can continue to work, providing our movement with the support they need, and the world service they can count on.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: Tugas terancang kita akan berada di situ untuk menunggu kita apabila masanya tiba.
en-mt: Our planned tasks will be there waiting for us when the time comes.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: Buat masa ini, inilah ketikanya untuk menyokong antara satu sama lain dan mencipta ruang untuk tugas yang penting bakal tiba dalam minggu-minggu dan berkemungkinan bulan-bulan yang akan datang.
en-mt: For now, this is a time to support each other and create space for important tasks to come in the coming weeks and possibly months.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: Kami perlukan anda semua menjadikannya kenyataan, dan kami perlukan anda semua menjaga diri sendiri dan keluarga agar anda akan bersedia pada tahap terbaik apabila keperluan itu tiba.
en-mt: We need you all to make it happen, and we need you all to take care of yourselves and your families so that you will be at your best when the need arises.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: Sekarang, sila -- basuh tangan anda dan jangan sentuh muka anda!
en-mt: Now, please -- wash your hands and don't touch your face!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M dan Tony S) dan mereka yang lain dalam Pasukan Kepimpinan (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M dan Toby N).
en-mt: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M and Tony S) and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V , Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M and Toby N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: Enzim penukar angiotensin 2 (ACE2) ialah enzim bersambung pada permukaan luar (membran sel) sel dalam paru-paru, arteri, jantung, buah pinggang dan usus.
en-mt: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membrane) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidneys and intestines.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: ACE2 berhadapan aktiviti enzim penukar angiotensin (ACE) yang berkaitan dengan mengurangkan jumlah angiotensin-II dan meningkatkan Ang(1-7) membuatkannya ubat yang boleh diharapkan disasarkan untuk merawat penyakit kardiovaskular. ACE2 juga bertindak sebagai pusat kemasukan ke dalam sel untuk beberapa koronavirus.
en-mt: ACE2 counteracts the activity of angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) associated with reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug to target to treat cardiovascular disease. ACE2 also acts as a cellular entry point for some coronaviruses.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: Versi manusia untuk enzim kerap dirujuk sebagai hACE2.
en-mt: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: Enzim penukar angiotensin 2 ialah zink yang mengandungi metaloenzim terletak pada permukaan endotelium dan sel yang lain.
en-mt: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of the endothelium and other cells.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: Protein ACE2 mengandungi domain M2 peptidase N-terminal dan domain pengangkut asid amino renal kolektrin C-terminal.
en-mt: The ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal M2 peptidase domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: ACE2 ialah protein membran jenis 1 laluan tunggal, dengan domain enzimnya aktif didedahkan pada permukaan sel dalam paru-paru dan tisu yang lain.
en-mt: ACE2 is a single-pass type 1 membrane protein, with its active enzyme domain exposed on the surface of cells in the lung and other tissues.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: Domain luar sel ACE2 melekat dari domain transmembran oleh enzim lain yang dikenali sebagai sheddase, dan hasil protein terlarut dibebaskan ke dalam aliran darah dan akhirnya dikumuhkan menjadi urin.
en-mt: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the bloodstream and eventually excreted as urine.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: ACE2 hadir dalam kebanyakan organ: ACE2 berkembar pada membran sel kebanyakan sel alveolus jenis II paru-paru, entrosit usus kecil, arteri dan sel endothelium vena dan sel otot lembut arteri dalam kebanyakan organ.
en-mt: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is localized on the cell membrane of most type II alveolar cells of the lung, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: Ekspresi mRNA ACE2 juga ditemui dalam korteks serebrum, striatum, hipotalamus dan batang otak.
en-mt: ACE2 mRNA expression was also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus and brainstem.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: Fungsi utama ACE2 ialah untuk bertindak sebagai pengimbang kepada ACE.
en-mt: The main function of ACE2 is to act as a counterbalance to ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: ACE melekatkan hormon I angiotensin ke dalam penyempitan vaso angiotensin II.
en-mt: ACE binds the hormone angiotensin I to the vasoconstriction of angiotensin II.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: ACE2 sebaliknya melekat fenilalanina asid amino karboksil-terminal dari angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) dan hidrolisisnya ke dalam angiotensin vasodilator (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
en-mt: ACE2 instead attaches the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyzes it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val- Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 boleh juga melekatkan sejumlah peptida lain termasuk [des-Arg9]- bradikinin, apelin, neurotensin, dinorfin A dan ghrelin.
en-mt: ACE2 can also bind a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]- bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A and ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: ACE2 juga mengawal selia pengedaran membran pengangkut asid amino neutral SLC6A19 dan ditunjukkan dalam penyakit Hartnup.
en-mt: ACE2 also regulates the membrane distribution of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and is shown in Hartnup's disease.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: Sebagai protein transmembran, ACE2 bertindak sebagai pusat kemasukan utama ke dalam sel untuk sesetengah koronavirus termasuk HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (virus penyebab SARS); dan SARS-CoV-2 (virus penyebab COVID-19).
en-mt: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 acts as a major entry point into the cell for some coronaviruses including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: Secara khususnya, pengikatan untuk protein S1 pepaku untuk SARS-CoV dan SARS-CoV2 pada domain berenzim pada ACE2 atas pemukaan sel mengakibatkan endositosis dan translokasi virus dan enzim ke dalam endosom terletak antara sel.
en-mt: Specifically, binding of the spike S1 protein for SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the cell surface results in endocytosis and translocation of the virus and enzymes into endosomes located between cells.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: Proses kemasukan juga memerlukan penyebuan protein S oleh protese serin hos TMPRSS2, perencat di bawah kajian semasa sebagai terapeutik yang berpotensi. Ini telah menyebabkan sesetengahnya membuat hipotesis bahawa mengurangkan tahap ACE2 dalam sel mungkin membantu dalam melawan jangkitan.
en-mt: The entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, an inhibitor under current study as a potential therapeutic. This has led some to hypothesize that reducing the level of ACE2 in cells may help in fighting infection.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: Bagaimanapun, pelbagai persatuan profesional dan badan pengawal selia mengesyorkan agar meneruskan perencat ACE standard dan terapi ARB.
en-mt: However, various professional associations and regulatory bodies recommend continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: Semakan sistematik dan analisis meta diterbitkan pada 11 Julai 2012 mendapati bahawa "penggunaan perencat ACE dikaitkan dengan penurunan 34% yang besar dalam risiko pneumonia dibandingkan dengan kawalan."
en-mt: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012 found that "ACE inhibitor use was associated with a significant 34% reduction in the risk of pneumonia compared with controls."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: Tambahan lagi, "risiko pneumonia juga berkurangan untuk pesakit yang dirawat dengan perencat ACE yang mempunyai risiko lebih tinggi untuk pneumonia, khususnya mereka dengan strok dan kegagalan jantung.
en-mt: Furthermore, "the risk of pneumonia is also reduced for patients treated with ACE inhibitors who are at higher risk for pneumonia, particularly those with stroke and heart failure.

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: Penggunaan perencat ACE juga dikaitkan dengan pengurangan dalam kadar kematian berkaitan pneumonia, walaupun keputusannya kurang mantap berbanding keseluruhan risiko pneumonia."
en-mt: The use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia-related mortality, although the results were less robust relative to the overall risk of pneumonia."

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Penggabungan semula ACE2 (rhACE2) manusia dianggap sebagai terapi novel untuk kecederaan paru-paru akut, dan nampaknya meningkatkan hemodinamik pulmonari dan penepuan oksigen dalam anak babi dengan sindrom distres respirasi akut lipopolisakarida teraruh.
en-mt: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is considered a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appears to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: Separuh hayat rhACE2 dalam manusia ialah 10 jam dan permulaan tindakan ialah 30 minit sebagai tambahan pada tindakan kesan (tempoh) selama 24 jam.
en-mt: The half-life of rhACE2 in humans is 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the effect (duration) of 24 hours.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Beberapa penemuan mengesyorkan bahawa rhACE2 boleh menjadi ubat yang boleh diharapkan untuk mereka dengan intolerans pada perencat sistem angiotensin renin klasik (perencat RAS) atau dalam penyakit yang mengelilingi angiotensin II dipertingkatkan. rhACE2 infusi telah dinilai dalam kajian klinikal untuk rawatan sindrom distres respirasi akut.
en-mt: Several findings recommend that rhACE2 can be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases that surround angiotensin II is enhanced. Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical studies for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: Aplikasi b'COVID-19 ialah aplikasi perisian mudah alih direka untuk membantu penjejakan hubungan sebagai respons kepada pandemik koronavirus 2019-20, iaitu proses mengenal pasti orang ("hubungan") mereka yang mungkin berhubung dengan individu yang dijangkiti.
en-mt: The b'COVID-19 app is a mobile software application designed to assist contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, which is the process of identifying people ("contacts") of those who may have been in contact with an infected individual.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: Banyak aplikasi dibangunkan atau dicadangkan dengan pegawai kerajaan menyokong di beberapa wilayah dan bidang kuasa.
en-mt: Many applications are developed or proposed with the support of government officials in several regions and jurisdictions.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: Beberapa rangka kerja untuk membina aplikasi penjejakan hubungan sudah dibangunkan.
en-mt: Several frameworks for building contact tracking applications are already developed.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: Kebimbangan privasi ditimbulkan, terutamanya tentang sistem yang berdasarkan penjejakan lokasi geografi aplikasi pengguna.
en-mt: Privacy concerns are raised, especially about systems based on tracking the geographic location of user applications.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Alternatif kurang mengganggu termasuk penggunaan isyarat Bluetooth untuk mencatat log proksimiti pengguna pada telefon sel yang lain.
en-mt: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log the user's proximity to other cell phones.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: Pada 10 April 2020, Google dan Apple bersama mengumumkan bahawa mereka akan menyepadukan kefungsian untuk menyokong aplikasi berdasarkan Bluetooth secara langsung ke dalam sistem operasi Android dan iOS mereka.
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they will integrate functionality to support Bluetooth-based applications directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: Di China, kerajaan China, bersempena kerjasama dengan Alipay, telah melancarkan satu aplikasi yang membenarkan warganegara untuk periksa jika mereka pernah mempunyai hubungan dengan mereka yang dijangkiti COVID-19.
en-mt: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has launched an application that allows citizens to check if they have had contact with those infected with COVID-19.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: Ia digunakan di seluruh lebih 200 bandar di China. Di Singapura, satu aplikasi dipanggil TraceTogether sedang digunakan.
en-mt: It is used across more than 200 cities in China. In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: Aplikasi dibangunkan oleh komuniti IT setempat, dilancarkan sebagai sumber terbuka dan akan diserahkan kepada kerajaan. Macedonia Utara melancarkan "StopKorona!", satu aplikasi berdasarkan Bluetooth untuk menjejak pendedahan dengan orang yang berpotensi dijangkiti dan memberikan maklum balas pantas kepada pihak berkuasa penjagaan kesihatan.
en-mt: Applications are developed by the local IT community, launched as open source and will be submitted to the government. North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based application to track exposure to potentially infected people and provide rapid feedback to healthcare authorities.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: Aplikasi dibangunkan oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Teknologi dan Kementerian Kesihatan.
en-mt: The application is developed by the Ministry of Communications and Technology and the Ministry of Health.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: Setakat 14 April 2020, aplikasi sedang menunggu kelulusan oleh Google Play Store dan Apple App Store.
en-mt: As of April 14, 2020, the app is awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and the Apple App Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: Pada 12 April, kerajaan menyatakan bahawa aplikasi penjejakan hubungan berada pada tahap pembangunan lanjutan, dan akan tersedia untuk dilancarkan dalam beberapa minggu. Satu aplikasi yang sama dirancang di Ireland dan Perancis ("StopCovid").
en-mt: On April 12, the government stated that the contact tracing app was at an advanced stage of development, and would be available for launch in a few weeks. A similar application is planned in Ireland and France ("StopCovid").

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: Australia dan New Zealand mempertimbangkan aplikasi berdasarkan aplikasi TraceTogether Singapura dan protokol BlueTrace. Rusia berhasrat untuk memperkenalkan aplikasi geobatas untuk pesakit yang didiagnosis dengan COVID-19 yang tinggal di Moscow, direka untuk memastikan mereka tidak meninggalkan rumah.
en-mt: Australia and New Zealand are considering applications based on Singapore's TraceTogether application and the BlueTrace protocol. Russia intends to introduce a geofencing application for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: Ross Anderson, profesor kejuruteraan keselamatan di Cambridge University, menyenaraikan sejumlah masalah praktikal yang berpotensi dengan sistem berdasarkan aplikasi, termasuk positif salah dan potensi kekurangan keberkesanan jika pelaksanaan aplikasi terhad pada hanya sebahagian kecil penduduk.
en-mt: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, lists a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and a potential lack of effectiveness if app implementation is limited to only a small portion of the population.

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: Menangani kebimbangan tentang penularan aplikasi "koronavirus" yang mengelirukan atau berbahaya, Apple menetapkan had untuk jenis organisasi yang boleh menambah aplikasi berkaitan koronavirus pada Apps Store miliknya, mengehadkannya pada pihak "berkuasa" sahaja atau organisasi yang ternama.
en-mt: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or dangerous "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on the types of organizations that can add coronavirus-related apps to its Apps Store, limiting them to only "authorized" parties or reputable organizations.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: Google dan Amazon telah melaksanakan sekatan yang sama.
en-mt: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: Juru kempen privasi meluahkan kebimbangan mereka mengenai kesan pengawasan massa menggunakan aplikasi koronavirus, khususnya tentang sama ada infrastruktur pengawasan dicipta untuk menangani pandemik koronavirus akan dihentikan sebaik sahaja ancaman itu berlalu.
en-mt: Privacy campaigners have expressed their concerns about the effects of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, particularly about whether the surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be stopped once the threat has passed.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: Amnesty International dan lebih daripada 100 organisasi lain mengeluarkan kenyataan meminta untuk had ke atas pengawasan seperti ini.
en-mt: Amnesty International and more than 100 other organizations issued statements calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: Organisasi mengisytiharkan lapan syarat ke atas projek-projek kerajaan:
en-mt: The organization declares eight conditions on government projects:

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: pengawasan hendaklah "sah dari segi undang-undang, jika perlu dan berkadaran";
en-mt: surveillance must be "lawful, if necessary and proportionate";

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: lanjutan pemantauan dan pengawasan hendaklah mempunyai klausa terbenam;
en-mt: monitoring and surveillance extensions should have an embedded clause;

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: penggunaan data hendaklah terhad kepada tujuan COVID-19;
en-mt: the use of data shall be limited to the purpose of COVID-19;

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: keselamatan data dan ketanpanamaan hendaklah dilindungi dan ditunjukkan sebagai dilindungi berdasarkan bukti;
en-mt: data security and anonymity must be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: pengawasan digital hendaklah mengelak daripada memburukkan lagi diskriminasi dan marginalisasi;
en-mt: digital surveillance should avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalization;

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: sebarang perkongsian data dengan pihak ketiga hendaklah ditakrifkan dalam undang-undang;
en-mt: any sharing of data with third parties shall be defined in law;

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: hendaklah dilindungi terhadap penyalahgunaan dan hak warganegara untuk memberi maklum balas pada penyalahgunaan;
en-mt: shall be protected against abuse and the right of citizens to respond to abuse;

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: penglibatan bermakna oleh semua "pihak berkepentingan yang relevan" hendaklah diperlukan, termasuklah pakar kesihatan awam dan kumpulan terpinggir. German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) dan Reporters Without Borders (RSF) juga mengeluarkan senarai semak.
en-mt: meaningful involvement by all "relevant stakeholders" should be required, including public health experts and marginalized groups. The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (RSF) also issue checklists.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: Cadangan rancangan Google/Apple berhasrat untuk menangani masalah pengawasan berterusan dengan mengeluarkan mekanisme penjejakan daripada sistem operasi peranti mereka sebaik sahaja tidak diperlukan lagi.
en-mt: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of continuous surveillance by removing the tracking mechanism from their device's operating system as soon as it is no longer needed.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: Beberapa negara menggunakan penjejakan lokasi berdasarkan rangkaian berbanding aplikasi, menyingkirkan kedua-dua keperluan untuk memuat turun aplikasi dan keupayaan untuk mengelakkan penjejakan.
en-mt: Some countries use network-based location tracking instead of apps, removing both the need to download apps and the ability to avoid tracking.

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: Di Israel, penjejakan berdasarkan rangkaian diluluskan.
en-mt: In Israel, network-based tracking is approved.

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: Penyelesaian berdasarkan rangkaian yang mempunyai akses pada data lokasi mentah mempunyai masalah privasi berpotensi yang besar.
en-mt: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have huge potential privacy problems.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: Bagaimanapun, bukan semua sistem dengan pelayan berpusat perlu mempunyai akses pada data lokasi peribadi; sejumlah sistem pemeliharaan privasi sudah dicipta yang menggunakan pelayan berpusat hanya untuk saling komunikasi (lihat seksyen di bawah).
en-mt: However, not all systems with centralized servers need to have access to private location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use centralized servers only for mutual communication (see section below).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: Di Korea Selatan, satu sistem berdasarkan aplikasi digunakan untuk melakukan penjejakan hubungan.
en-mt: In South Korea, an app-based system is used to track contacts.

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: Berbanding menggunakan aplikasi khusus, sistem mengumpul maklumat penjejakan daripada pelbagai sumber termasuk data penjejakan peranti mudah alih dan data transaksi kad, dan penggabungan semua ini menjana notis menerusi mesej teks kepada individu yang berpotensi dijangkiti.
en-mt: Rather than using a dedicated app, the system collects tracking information from multiple sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combining all of this generates text message notifications to potentially infected individuals.

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: Selain menggunakan maklumat ini untuk memberikan amaran kepada kenalan berpotensi, kerajaan juga menjadikan maklumat lokasi tersedia untuk awam, sesuatu yang dibenarkan kerana perubahan besar pada undang-undang privasi maklumat selepas wabak MERS di negara tersebut.
en-mt: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government also made location information publicly available, something that was allowed because of major changes to information privacy laws in the wake of the MERS outbreak in the country.

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: Maklumat ini tersedia kepada orang awam menerusi sejumlah apliksi dan laman web. Negara-negara termasuk Jerman mempertimbangkan untuk menggunakan sistem berpusat dan pemeliharaan privasi.
en-mt: This information is available to the public through a number of applications and websites. Countries including Germany are considering using centralized and privacy-preserving systems.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: Setakat 6 April 2020, perincian belum disiarkan lagi.
en-mt: As of April 6, 2020, details have not been released yet.

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Penjejakan hubungan dengan pemeliharaan privasi ialah konsep yang dianjurkan dengan literatur kajian badan penting bermula sejak tahun 2013. Setakat 7 April 2020, lebih daripada sedozen kumpulan pakar bekerja untuk penyelesaian mesra privasi seperti menggunakan Tenaga Rendah Bluetooth (BLE) untuk log proksimiti pengguna pada telefon selular lain.
en-mt: Privacy-preserving contact tracking is a concept advocated with a significant body of research literature dating back to 2013. As of April 7, 2020, more than a dozen expert groups are working on privacy-friendly solutions such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log user proximity on other cellular phones. .

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: Bagaimanapun, PEPP-PT ialah usaha koordinasi yang mengandungi pendekatan berpusat dan ternyahpusat, dan bukan protokol tunggal. Protokol ternyahpusat termasuk Penjejakan Proksimiti Pemeliharaan Privasi Ternyahpusat (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Nombor Kenalan Sementara (TCN, Nombor Acara Kenalan fka, CEN), Protokol Sensitif Privasi dan Mekanisme untuk Penjejakan Hubungan Mudah Alih (PACT) dan lain-lain.
en-mt: However, PEPP-PT is a coordinated effort containing centralized and decentralized approaches, and not a single protocol. Decentralized protocols include Decentralized Privacy Preserving Proximity Tracking (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Number (TCN, fka Contact Event Number, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocol and Mechanism for Mobile Contact Tracking (PACT) and others.

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: Dalam protokol ini, data peribadi yang dikenal pasti tidak pernah meninggalkan peranti, dan semua pemadanan berlaku pada peranti.
en-mt: In this protocol, personally identifiable data never leaves the device, and all matching takes place on the device.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: Kumpulan Privasi MIT Media Lab sedang membangunkan SafePaths,satu platform untuk menggunakan teknik pemeliharaan privasi apabila mengumpul dan menggunakan lokasi atau data saling seksyen haluan untuk menjejak penularan COVID-19.
en-mt: The MIT Media Lab's Privacy Group is developing SafePaths, a platform to use privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path cross-section data to track the spread of COVID-19.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: Ini berdasarkan penyelidikan daripada kertas putih "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" diterbitkan pada bulan Mac 2020. Usaha yang sama lain ialah platform SafeTrace oleh Enigma MPC, sebuah syarikat membangunkan teknologi privasi yang juga diasaskan pada asalnya di MIT Media Lab.
en-mt: This is based on research from the white paper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" published in March 2020. Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technology that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: SafeTrace menggunakan teknologi perkakasan selamat untuk membenarkan pengguna untuk berkongsi lokasi sensitif dan data kesihatan dengan pengguna lain dan pihak berkuasa, tanpa menjejaskan privasi data.
en-mt: SafeTrace uses secure hardware technology to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and authorities, without compromising data privacy.

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: Pada 5 April 2020, TCN Coalition global diasaskan oleh beberapa kumpulan yang bersatu mengenai kaedah sama yang penting dan protokol bertindih yang besar, dengan matlamat untuk mengurangkan fragmentasi, dan mendayakan kebolehoperasi global utuk aplikasi penjejakan dan pemberi amaran, aspek penting untuk mencapai penggunaan yang meluas.
en-mt: On April 5, 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by several groups united on important common methods and large overlapping protocols, with the goal of reducing fragmentation, and enabling global interoperability for tracking and warning applications, an important aspect to achieve widespread adoption.

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: Pada 9 April 2020, kerajaan Singapura mengumumkan bahawa ia sudah menjadikan sumber terbuka untuk protokol BlueTrace yang digunakan oleh aplikasi kerajaan yang rasmi.
en-mt: On April 9, 2020, the government of Singapore announced that it has made open source the BlueTrace protocol used by official government applications.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: Pada 10 April 2020, Google dan Apple, syarikat yang mengawal platform mudah alih Android dan iOS, mengumumkan satu inisiatif untuk penjejakan hubungan yang didakwa mereka akan memelihara privasi, berdasarkan satu kombinasi teknologi Tenaga Rendah Bluetooth dan kriptografi pemeliharaan privasi.
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracking that they claim will preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: Mereka juga menerbitkan spesifikasi teknologi teras yang digunakan dalam sistem.
en-mt: They also publish specifications of the core technology used in the system.

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: Menurut Apple dan Google, sistem berhasrat untuk dilancarkan dalam tiga peringkat:
en-mt: According to Apple and Google, the system intends to be rolled out in three stages:

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: pelancaran alatan bagi membolehkan kerajaan untuk mencipta aplikasi penjejakan koronavirus pemeliharaan privasi
en-mt: the launch of tools to enable governments to create privacy-preserving coronavirus tracking applications

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: integrasi kefungsian ini secara langsung ke dalam iOS dan Android rancangan Google dan Apple untuk menangani masalah pelaksanaan dan pengawasan berterusan dengan terlebih dahulu mengagihkan sistem menerusi kemas kini sistem operasi, dan kemudian mengeluarkannya dengan cara sama sebaik sahaja ancaman berlalu.
en-mt: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and Android Google and Apple plan to address implementation and ongoing monitoring issues by first distributing systems through operating system updates, and then releasing them in the same way once the threat has passed.

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: Memposisi semula ubat (juga dikenali sebagai mengubah tujuan ubat, profil semula, penugasan semula atau penukaran terapeutik) ialah mengubah tujuan satu ubat yang diluluskan untuk rawatan penyakit berbeza atau keadaan kesihatan dari sebab ia dibangunkan pada asalnya.
en-mt: Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, reprofiling, reassignment or therapeutic switching) is changing the purpose of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or health condition from the reason it was originally developed.

sourceString: This is one line of scientific research which is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.
targetString: Ini ialah satu usaha penyelidikan saintifik yang sedang dilaksanakan untuk membangunkan rawatan COVID-19 yang selamat dan berkesan.
en-mt: This is an ongoing scientific research effort to develop a safe and effective treatment for COVID-19.

sourceString: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion.SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.
targetString: Arah tuju penyelidikan lain termasuk pembangunan vaksin COVID-19 dan pemindahan plasma pemulihan. SARS-CoV-2 mempunyai lebih kurang 66 protein berubat, setiap darinya mempunyai berbilang tapak pengikat ligan.
en-mt: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusions. SARS-CoV-2 has approximately 66 medicinal proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.

sourceString: Analyzing those binding sites provide the reasonable project of developing effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 proteins.
targetString: Menganalisis tapak pengikat itu menyediakan projek yang berpatutan untuk membangunkan ubat antivirus berkesan terhadap protein COVID-19.
en-mt: Analyzing the binding site provides an affordable project to develop effective antiviral drugs against the COVID-19 protein.

sourceString: Of the most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are papain-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.
targetString: Dari kebanyakan protein sasaran SARS-CoV-2 paling penting ialah protease seperti papain, polimerase bergantung RNA, helikase, protein S dan ribofosfatase ADP.
en-mt: Of the many target proteins of SARS-CoV-2 the most important are proteases such as papain, RNA-dependent polymerase, helicases, protein S and ADP ribophosphatase.

sourceString: Hussein A A, et al studied several candidate compounds which then optimized and analyzed for their skeleton similarity with the highest similar approved drugs in order to accelerate a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development in his preclinical study to be recommended in a clinical study design.
targetString: Hussein A A, et al mengkaji beberapa sebatian calon yang kemudiannya dioptimumkan dan dianalisis untuk kesamaan rangka dengan ubat diluluskan sama tertinggi untuk mempercepatkan pembangunan ubat anti SARS-CoV-2 yang kuat dalam kajian praklinikalnya untuk disyorkan dalam reka bentuk kajian klinikal.
en-mt: Hussein AA, et al studied several candidate compounds that were then optimized and analyzed for skeletal similarity with the highest approved drugs to accelerate the development of potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drugs in their preclinical studies to be recommended in clinical study designs.

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: Chloroquine ialah pengubatan antimalaria yang juga digunakan melawan beberapa penyakit autoimun.
en-mt: Chloroquine is an antimalarial medication that is also used against some autoimmune diseases.

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: Pada 18 Mac, WHO mengumumkan bahawa chloroquine dan hidroksichloroquine berkaitan akan menjadi antara empat ubat dikaji sebagai sebahagian dari percubaan klinikal Solidarity.
en-mt: On March 18, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among four drugs being studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: Gabenor New York Andrew Cuomo mengumumkan bahawa percubaan negeri New York ke atas chloroquine dan hidroksichloroquine akan bermula pada 24 Mac. Pada 28 Mac, FDA membenarkan penggunaan hidroksichloroquine sulfat dan chloroquine fosfat di bawah Kebenaran Penggunaan Kecemasan (EUA).
en-mt: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York state trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine will begin on March 24. On March 28, the FDA approved the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: Rawatan tidak diluluskan oleh proses percubaan klinikal FDA dan dibenarkan di bawah EUA hanya sebagai satu rawatan eksperimen untuk kegunaan kecemasan dalam pesakit yang dimasukkan ke hospital tetapi tidak boleh menerima rawatan dalam kajian klinikal.
en-mt: The treatment is not approved by the FDA's clinical trial process and is permitted under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but cannot receive treatment in a clinical study.

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: CDC telah berkata bahawa "penggunaan, dos, atau tempoh hidroksichloroquine untuk profilaksis atau rawatan jangkitan SARS-CoV-2" belum lagi diwujudkan.
en-mt: The CDC has said that "the use, dose, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for the prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" has not yet been established.

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: Doktor telah berkata bahawa mereka menggunakan ubat tersebut apabila "tiada lagi pilihan lain".
en-mt: Doctors have said that they use the drug when "there is no other option".

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: Satu pasukan penyelidik Turki di Istanbul sedang menjalankan kajian kecil tentang penggunaan chloroquine dengan kombinasi zink, vitamin A, vitamin C dan vitamin D.
