en-mt: A team of Turkish researchers in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: Kajian yang besar sedang dijalankan di Duke University dan University of Oxford.
en-mt: Major studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: NYU Langone Medical School sedang melaksanakan satu percubaan tentang keselamatan dan keberkesanan penggunaan pencegahan hidroksichloroquine.
en-mt: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and effectiveness of the prophylactic use of hydroxychloroquine.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: Percubaan klinikal China di Wuhan dan Shenzhen mendakwa menunjukkan favipiravir "jelas berkesan".
en-mt: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claim to show favipiravir is "clearly effective".

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: 35 pesakit di Shenzhen diuji negatif dalam median selama 4 hari, sementara tempoh sakit ialah 11 hari untuk 45 pesakit yang tidak menerimanya.
en-mt: The 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative for a median of 4 days, while the duration of illness was 11 days for the 45 patients who did not receive it.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: Dalam satu kajian yang dilaksanakan di Wuhan ke atas 240 pesakit dengan pneumonia, separuh darinya diberikan favipiravir dan separuh lagi menerima umifenovir.
en-mt: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and the other half received umifenovir.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: Agensi Farmaseutikal Itali mengingatkan orang awam bahawa bukti semasa dalam menyokong ubat itu masih kurang dan awal.
en-mt: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminds the public that the current evidence in support of the drug is still lacking and preliminary.

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Pada 2 April, Jerman mengumumkan bahawa akan membeli ubat daripada Jepun untuk simpanannya dan menggunakan pihak tentera untuk menghantar ubat ke hospital universiti, yang akan menggunakan ubat tersebut untuk merawat pesakit COVID-19.
en-mt: On April 2, Germany announced that it would buy medicine from Japan for its stockpile and use the military to deliver the medicine to university hospitals, which will use the medicine to treat COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: Menurut South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe menukar pendirian terhadap pentadbiran Trump mengenai pembelian ubat. Ubat itu mungkin kurang berkesan dalam kes penyakit teruk apabila virus sudah berganda.
en-mt: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe changed his stance on the Trump administration on drug purchases. The drug may be less effective in cases of severe disease when the virus has already multiplied.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: Ia mungkin tidak selamat untuk digunakan oleh wanita yang mengandung atau mereka yang cuba untuk hamil.
en-mt: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: Satu kajian lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), satu kombinasi antivirus lopinavir dan ritonavir, merumuskan bahawa "tiada kelebihan dapat diperhatikan".
en-mt: A study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), an antiviral combination of lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no advantage could be observed".

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: Dadah direka untuk merencatkan HIV daripada meniru dengan mengikat pada protease.
en-mt: The drug is designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to proteases.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: Satu pasukan penyelidik di University of Colorado sedang mencuba untuk mengubah suai ubat untuk menemui sebatian yang akan mengikat dengan protease SARS-CoV-2. Terdapat kritikan dalam komuniti saintifik tentang menghalakan sumber untuk mengubah tujuan ubat dibangunkan khusus untuk HIV/AIDS.
en-mt: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado is trying to modify the drug to find a compound that will bind to the SARS-CoV-2 protease. There is criticism in the scientific community about diverting resources to repurpose drugs developed specifically for HIV/AIDS.

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: WHO memasukkan lopinavir/ritonavir dalam percubaan antarabangsa Solidarity.
en-mt: WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the Solidarity international trial.

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: Remdesivir dicipta dan dibangunkan oleh Gilead Sciences sebagai rawatan untuk penyakit virus Ebola dan jangkitan virus Marburg. Gilead Sciences seterusnya menemui bahawa Remdesivir mempunyai aktiviti antivirus in vitro terhadap pelbagai filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo- dan korona-virus.
en-mt: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infection. Gilead Sciences further discovered that Remdesivir has in vitro antiviral activity against various filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo- and corona-viruses.

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: Satu isu dengan rawatan antivirus ialah penunjukan rintangan menerusi mutasi yang boleh menyebabkan penyakit dan pemindahan yang lebih teruk.
en-mt: One issue with antiviral treatment is the emergence of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transplants.

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
targetString: Beberapa kajian prapercubaan awal mencadangkan remdesivir mungkin mempunyai penghalang bergenetik tinggi terhadap rintangan. Terdapat beberapa percubaan klinikal sedang dilaksanakan termasuk dua yang dijalankan oleh Hospital Cleveland University; satu untuk orang ramai dengan penyakit sederhana dan satu lagi untuk mereka dengan penyakit yang lebih teruk.
en-mt: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance. There are several clinical trials underway including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospital; one for people with moderate illnesses and another for those with more severe illnesses.

sourceString: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19; two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one with no control (Italy).
targetString: Terdapat tiga percubaan klinikal sedang dilaksanakan bagi vitamin C intravena untuk mereka yang dimasukkan ke hospital dan sangat sakit dengan COVID-19, dua plasebo terkawal (China, Kanada) dan satu tanpa kawalan (Itali).
en-mt: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for those hospitalized and very ill with COVID-19, two placebo-controlled (China, Canada) and one uncontrolled (Italy).

sourceString: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on 24 March 2020.
targetString: Negeri New York memulakan percubaan untuk antibiotik azithromycin pada 24 Mac 2020.
en-mt: New York State began a trial for the antibiotic azithromycin on March 24, 2020.

sourceString: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of pre-symptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.
targetString: Pusat Kebangsaan Jepun untuk Kesihatan Global dan Perubatan (NCGM) sedang merancang satu percubaan klinikal untuk Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), satu kortikosteroid sedut untuk asma, untuk rawatan pesakit prasimptomatik dijangkiti dengan novel koronavirus.
en-mt: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of presymptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.

sourceString: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe, hospitalized cases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.
targetString: Satu bentuk enzim penukar angiotensin 2, satu percubaan Fasa II sedang dijalankan ke atas 200 pesakit dipilih dari kes kemasukan hospital dan teruk di Denmark, Jerman dan Austria bagi menentukan keberkesanan rawatan.
en-mt: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is being conducted on 200 patients selected from hospitalized and severe cases in Denmark, Germany and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.

sourceString: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.
targetString: Penyelidik dari Montreal Heart Institute di Kanada sedang mengkaji peranan colchicine dalam mengurangkan komplikasi keradangan dan pulmonari dalam pesakit yang mengalami gejala ringan COVID-19.
en-mt: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammatory and pulmonary complications in patients with mild symptoms of COVID-19.

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.
targetString: Kajian dinamakan COLCORONA, mengambil 6000 orang dewasa berumur 40 dan ke atas yang didiagnosis dengan COVID-19 dan mengalami gejala ringan yang tidak memerlukan kemasukan hospital.
en-mt: The study, called COLCORONA, recruited 6,000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and had mild symptoms that did not require hospitalization.

sourceString: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.
targetString: Wanita yang hamil atau sedang menyusu atau tidak mempunyai kaedah kontraseptif berkesan adalah tidak layak.
en-mt: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.

sourceString: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.
targetString: Beberapa antikoagulan sedang diuji di Itali.
en-mt: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.

sourceString: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.
targetString: Heparin dengan berat molekul rendah digunakan secara meluas untuk merawat pesakit, mendorong Agensi Pengubatan Itali untuk menerbitkan garis panduan pada penggunaannya.
en-mt: Low molecular weight heparin is widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.

sourceString: A multicenter study on 300 patients researching the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis and therapeutic dosages was announced in Italy on April 14.
targetString: Satu kajian berbilang terpusat ke atas 300 pesakit menyelidik penggunaan enoxaparin sodium pada dos profilaksis dan terapeutik diumumkan di Itali pada 14 April.
en-mt: A multicenter study of 300 patients investigating the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylactic and therapeutic doses was announced in Italy on April 14.

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.
targetString: Memandangkan SARS-CoV-2 ialah virus, perhatian saintifik yang mencukupi telah ditumpukan pada pengubahan tujuan ubat antivirus yang diluluskan dibangunkan untuk tujuan wabak seperti MERS, SARS dan virus Nil Barat.
en-mt: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on the repurposing of approved antiviral drugs developed for outbreaks such as MERS, SARS and West Nile virus.

sourceString: Ribavirin: ribavirin was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Ribavirin: ribavirin disyorkan untuk rawatan COVID-19 mengikut garis panduan China ke-7
en-mt: Ribavirin: ribavirin is recommended for the treatment of COVID-19 according to the 7th Chinese guidelines

sourceString: Umifenovir: umifenovir was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Umifenovir: umifenovir disyorkan untuk rawatan COVID-19 mengikut garis panduan China ke-7
en-mt: Umifenovir: umifenovir is recommended for the treatment of COVID-19 according to the 7th Chinese guidelines

sourceString: Some antibiotics that have been identified as potentially repurposable as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: Beberapa antibiotik dikenal pasti sebagai pengubah tujuan berpotensi sebagai rawatan COVID-19:
en-mt: Several antibiotics were identified as potential modifiers as a treatment for COVID-19:

sourceString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.
targetString: Tocilizumab (Reseptor anti-IL-6 ): Diluluskan oleh China.
en-mt: Tocilizumab (anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.

sourceString: Also trials in Italy and China. and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
targetString: Juga percubaan di Itali dan China, dan lihat Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
en-mt: Also trials in Italy and China, and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.

sourceString: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: Vaksin COVID-19 ialah vaksin hipotesis terhadap penyakit koronavirus 2019 (COVID-2019).
en-mt: The COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-2019).

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: Walaupun tiada vaksin menyelesaikan percubaan klinikal, terdapat banyak cubaan dalam kemajuan bagi membangunkan vaksin berkenaan.
en-mt: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are many attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: Pada hujung Februari 2020, Pertubuhan Kesihatan Sedunia (WHO) berkata ia tidak menjangkakan vaksin melawan SARS-CoV-2, virus penyebab, untuk tersedia kurang daripada 18 bulan.
en-mt: At the end of February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to be available for less than 18 months.

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: Lima calon vaksin berada dalam kajian keselamatan Fasa 1 pada bulan April.
en-mt: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase 1 safety studies in April.

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: COVID-19 dikenal pasti pada bulan Disember 2019.
en-mt: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Penularan wabak utama seluruh dunia pada tahun 2020, memberikan pelaburan dan aktiviti penyelidikan berkadaran untuk membangunkan vaksin.
en-mt: The transmission of a major epidemic worldwide in 2020, warrants proportionate investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Banyak organisasi sedang menggunakan genom diterbitkan untuk membangunkan vaksin mungkin melawan SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: Many organizations are using the published genome to develop a possible vaccine against SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: Dinyatakan pada bulan April, imperatif inisiatif CEPI untuk pembangunan vaksin dipercepatkan, kapasiti pengilangan, pelaksanaan berskala dan akses global.
en-mt: Stated in April, the CEPI initiative imperatives for accelerated vaccine development, manufacturing capacity, scaled implementation and global access.

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: Pada bulan April, ahli sains CEPI melaporkan bahawa 10 platform teknologi berlainan di bawah penyelidikan dan pembangunan semasa awal 2020 bagi mencipta vaksin berkesan melawan COVID-19.
en-mt: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms are under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:
targetString: Platform utama menyasarkan untuk maju ke dalam kajian keselamatan Fasa I termasuk:
en-mt: Key platforms aiming to advance into Phase I safety studies include:

sourceString: nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
targetString: asid nukleik (DNA dan RNA) (Pembangun Fasa 1 dan calon vaksin: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
en-mt: nucleic acids (DNA and RNA) (Phase 1 developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)

sourceString: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)
targetString: vektor virus (Pembangun Fasa I dan calon vaksin: CanSino Biologics, vektor adenovirus jenis 5)
en-mt: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)

sourceString: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (presumed to be in planning or being designed).
targetString: Seperti yang dilaporkan oleh ahli sains CEPI pada bulan April, sejumlah 115 calon vaksin berada dalam peringkat awal pembangunan, dengan 78 disahkan sebagai projek aktif (79, mengikut Milken Institute), dan 37 yang lain diumumkan, tetapi dengan sedikit maklumat awam tersedia (dianggap sebagai dalam perancangan atau sedang direka bentuk).
en-mt: As CEPI scientists reported in April, a total of 115 vaccine candidates are in the early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (considered as in planning or being designed).

sourceString: A Phase I-II trial conducts preliminary safety and immunogenicity testing, is typically randomized, placebo-controlled, and at multiple sites, while determining more precise, effective doses.
targetString: Percubaan Fasa I-II melaksanakan ujian keselamatan awal dan keimunogenan , biasanya secara rawak, plasebo terkawal dan berbilang tapak, sementara menentukan dos berkesan dengan lebih tepat.
en-mt: Phase I-II trials perform initial safety and immunogenicity testing, usually randomized, placebo-controlled and multisite, while determining the effective dose more precisely.

sourceString: Phase III trials typically involve more participants, including a control group, and test effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.
targetString: Percubaan Tahap III biasanya melibatkan lebih penyertaan termasuk kumpulan kawalan dan keberkesanan ujian pada vaksin untuk mencegah penyakit, sementara memantau untuk kesan buruk pada dos yang optimum.
en-mt: Phase III trials usually involve more participants including a control group and testing the effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at optimal doses.

sourceString: Of 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 were not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).
targetString: Dari 79 calon vaksin dalam pembangunan aktif (disahkan setakat awal April 2020), 74 masih belum dalam penilaian manusia) masih dalam penyelidikan "praklinikal").
en-mt: Of the 79 vaccine candidates in active development (approved as of early April 2020), 74 are not yet in human evaluation) still in "preclinical" research.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins in order to stimulate an immune reaction.
targetString: Pada 24 Januari 2020 di Australia, University of Queensland mengumumkan bahawa ia menyiasat potensi vaksin pengapit molekul yang akan mengubah suai protein virus secara genetik untuk merangsang tindakan balas imun.
en-mt: On January 24, 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins to stimulate an immune response.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Centre (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the commencement of work on a vaccine, aiming to start human testing in 2021.
targetString: Pada 24 Januari 2020 di Kanada, Pusat Vaksin Antarabangsa (VIDO-InterVac) di University of Saskatchewan mengumumkan penerusan usaha ke atas vaksin, menyasarkan untuk memulakan ujian ke atas manusia pada tahun 2021.
en-mt: On January 24, 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Center (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the continuation of efforts on the vaccine, aiming to begin human trials in 2021.

sourceString: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.
targetString: Projek pembangunan vaksin diumumkan di Pusat Kawalan dan Pencegahan Penyakit China pada 26 Januari 2020 dan University of Hong Kong pada 28 Januari.
en-mt: The vaccine development project was announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on January 26, 2020 and the University of Hong Kong on January 28.

sourceString: Around 29 January 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.
targetString: Pada 29 Januari 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, diterajui oleh Hanneke Schuitemaker, mengumumkan bahawa ia sudah memulakan usaha dalam membangunkan vaksin.
en-mt: On January 29, 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.

sourceString: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.
targetString: Janssen sedang membangunkan bersama vaksin oral dengan Vaxart yang merupakan rakan kongsi bioteknologinya.
en-mt: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotech partner Vaxart.

sourceString: On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.
targetString: Pada 18 Mac 2020, Emergent BioSolutions mengumumkan perkongsian dengan Vaxart untuk membangunkan vaksin.
en-mt: On March 18, 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a partnership with Vaxart to develop a vaccine.

sourceString: On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.
targetString: Pada 8 Februari 2020, makmal OncoGen di Romania menerbitkan kertas tentang reka bentuk vaksin dengan teknologi sama seperti yang digunakan untuk terapi pemvaksinan neoantigen kanser.
en-mt: On February 8, 2020, the OncoGen laboratory in Romania published a paper on vaccine design with technology similar to that used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.

sourceString: On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.
targetString: Pada 25 Mac, ketua institut penyelidikan itu mengumumkan mereka telah memuktamadkan sistesis vaksin dan mereka telah memulakan ujian.
en-mt: On March 25, the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the vaccine synthesis and that they had started testing.

sourceString: On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: Pada 27 Februari 2020, sebuah syarikat subsidiari Generex, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, mengumumkan bahawa mereka telah memulakan projek vaksin untuk mencipta vaksin peptid li-Key terhadap COVID-19.
en-mt: On February 27, 2020, a subsidiary of Generex, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced that they had started a vaccine project to create a li-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.

sourceString: They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."
targetString: Mereka mahu menghasilkan calon vaksin yang boleh diuji pada manusia "dalam masa 90 hari."
en-mt: They want to produce a vaccine candidate that can be tested on humans "within 90 days."

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Pada 5 Mac 2020, Washington University di St. Louis mengumumkan projeknya untuk membangunkan vaksin.
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced his project to develop a vaccine.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on a vaccine.
targetString: Pada 5 Mac 2020, Pusat Penyelidikan dan Bahan Perubatan Tentera Amerika Syarikat di Fort Detrick dan Institut Penyelidikan Tentera Walter Reed di Silver Spring, kedua-duanya di Maryland barat, mengumumkan bahawa mereka sedang mengusahakan vaksin.
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, the United States Army Medical Materiel and Research Center at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Institute of Military Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced that they were working on a vaccine.

sourceString: Around 10 March 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had teamed with Novavax Inc.
targetString: Antara 10 Mac 2020, Emergent Biosolutions mengumumkan bahawa mereka telah bekerjasama dengan Novavax Inc.
en-mt: Between March 10, 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that they have partnered with Novavax Inc.

sourceString: in the development and manufacture of a vaccine.
targetString: dalam pembangunan dan pembuatan vaksin.
en-mt: in the development and manufacture of vaccines.

sourceString: The partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial by July 2020.
targetString: Rakan-rakan kongsi ini selanjutnya mengumumkan rancangan untuk pengujian praklinikal dan Fasa I percubaan klinikal menjelang Julai 2020.
en-mt: These partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and Phase I clinical trials by July 2020.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, India's Health Ministry announced they are working with 11 isolates, and that even on a fast track it would take at least around one-and-a-half to two years to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Pada 12 Mac 2020, Kementerian Kesihatan India mengumumkan mereka sedang bekerja dengan 11 isolat yang meskipun pada landasan yang pantas ia akan mengambil masa sekurang-kurangnya satu setengah hingga dua tahun untuk membangunkan vaksin.
en-mt: On March 12, 2020, the Indian Ministry of Health announced they were working with 11 isolates that even on a fast track it would take at least one and a half to two years to develop a vaccine.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported development of a coronavirus-like particle under partial funding from the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.
targetString: Pada 12 Mac 2020, Medicago, sebuah syarikat bioteknologi di Quebec City, Quebec, melaporkan pembangunan partikel seperti virus koronavirus di bawah sebahagian dana Institut Penyelidikan Kesihatan Kanada.
en-mt: On March 12, 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported the development of coronavirus-like particles under partial funding from the Canadian Institutes of Health Research.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate is in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.
targetString: Calon vaksin berada dalam penyelidikan makmal, dengan pengujian manusia dirancang pada bulan Julai atau Ogos 2020.
en-mt: The vaccine candidate is in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.

sourceString: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that the US President Donald Trump had offered CureVac "'large sums of money' for exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine", against which the German government protested.
targetString: Awal minggu itu, The Guardian melaporkan Presiden AS Donald Trump menawarkan CureVac "banyak wang untuk mendapatkan akses eksklusif kepada vaksin Covid-19", dan perkara ini ditentang oleh kerajaan Jerman.
en-mt: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported US President Donald Trump offered CureVac "a lot of money to get exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine", and this was opposed by the German government.

sourceString: On 17 March 2020, American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop a mRNA-based vaccine.
targetString: Pada 17 Mac 2020, syarikat farmasi Amerika Pfizer mengumumkan kerjasama dengan syarikat Jerman BioNTech untuk bersama-sama membangunkan vaksin berasaskan mRNA.
en-mt: On March 17, 2020, the American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a collaboration with the German company BioNTech to jointly develop an mRNA-based vaccine.

sourceString: mRNA-based vaccine candidate BNT162, currently in pre-clinical testing with clinical trials expected to begin in April 2020.
targetString: Calon vaksin berasaskan mRNA BNT162, kini dalam ujian praklinikal sementara ujian klinikal dijangka bermula pada April 2020.
en-mt: The mRNA-based vaccine candidate BNT162, is currently in preclinical testing while clinical trials are expected to begin in April 2020.

sourceString: In Italy on 17 March 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotech company announced they will have pre-clinical testing results in April 2020 and their final vaccine candidate could begin human testing by fall.
targetString: Pada 17 Mac 2020 di Itali, Takis Biotech, sebuah syarikat bioteknologi Itali mengumumkan mereka akan mendapat keputusan pengujian praklinikal pada April 2020 dan calon vaksin terakhir mereka boleh memulakan pengujian manusia menjelang musim luruh.
en-mt: On March 17, 2020 in Italy, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotech company announced they will have preclinical testing results in April 2020 and their final vaccine candidate can begin human testing by fall.

sourceString: In France on 19 March 2020, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment in COVID-19 vaccine development to US$29 million.
targetString: Pada 19 Mac 2020 di Perancis, Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) mengumumkan pelaburan bernilai AS$4.9 juta untuk satu konsortium penyelidikan vaksin COVID-19 yang melibatkan Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria) dan University of Pittsburgh, membawa jumlah pelaburan CEPI dalam pembangunan vaksin COVID-19 kepada AS$29 juta.
en-mt: On March 19, 2020 in France, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced an investment worth US$4.9 million for a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Pasteur Institute, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria) and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment in the development of the COVID-19 vaccine to US$29 million.

sourceString: CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford, and the University of Queensland.
targetString: Rakan kongsi pelaburan CEPI yang lain untuk pembangunan vaksin COVID-19 ialah Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, Universiti Hong Kong, University of Oxford dan University of Queensland.
en-mt: CEPI's other investment partners for the development of the COVID-19 vaccine are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford and the University of Queensland.

sourceString: On 20 March 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists have begun animal testing of six different vaccine candidates.
targetString: Pada 20 Mac 2020, pegawai kesihatan Rusia mengumumkan bahawa saintis telah memulakan pengujian haiwan bagi enam calon vaksin yang berbeza.
en-mt: On March 20, 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists had begun animal testing of six different vaccine candidates.

sourceString: Imperial College London researchers announced on 20 March 2020 that they are developing a self-amplifying RNA vaccine for COVID-19.
targetString: Penyelidik Imperial College London mengumumkan pada 20 Mac 2020 bahawa mereka sedang membangunkan vaksin RNA yang diperkuat sendiri untuk COVID-19.
en-mt: Imperial College London researchers announced on March 20, 2020 that they are developing a self-amplified RNA vaccine for COVID-19.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.
targetString: Calon vaksin ini dibangunkan dalam 14 hari selepas menerima jujukan dari China.
en-mt: This vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.

sourceString: In late March, the Canadian government announced C$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities, such as the Medicago and University of Saskatchewan initiatives.
targetString: Pada akhir bulan Mac, kerajaan Kanada mengumumkan pembiayaan C$275 juta untuk projek penyelidikan mengenai langkah pencegahan perubatan terhadap COVID-19, termasuk banyak calon vaksin di syarikat dan universiti Kanada seperti Medicago dan inisiatif University of Saskatchewan.
en-mt: In late March, the Canadian government announced C$275 million in funding for research projects on medical preventative measures against COVID-19, including many vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities such as Medicago and the University of Saskatchewan initiative.

sourceString: Around the same time, the Canadian government announced C$192 million specifically for developing a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: Pada masa yang sama, kerajaan Kanada mengumumkan C$192 juta khusus untuk membangunkan vaksin COVID-19, dengan rancangan untuk menubuhkan "bank vaksin" kebangsaan daripada beberapa vaksin baharu yang boleh digunakan jika satu lagi wabak koronavirus berlaku.
en-mt: At the same time, the Canadian government announced C$192 million dedicated to developing a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used in the event of another coronavirus outbreak.

sourceString: On 2 April 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported on testing of PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccines elicited potent antigen-specific antibody responses [in the mice] that were evident beginning 2 weeks after immunization."
targetString: Pada 2 April 2020, penyelidik di University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine melaporkan mengenai ujian PittCoVacc, vaksin COVID-19 yang berkemungkinan dalam tikus, dengan menyatakan bahawa "MNA memberikan vaksin subunit SARS-CoV-2 S1 yang menimbulkan respons antibodi khusus antigen yang kuat [dalam tikus] yang terbukti bermula 2 minggu selepas imunisasi."
en-mt: On April 2, 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported on trials of PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA delivered a SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccine that elicited a strong antigen-specific antibody response [ in mice] that was evident starting 2 weeks after immunization."

sourceString: In Canada on 16 April 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a possible nasal spray.
targetString: Di Kanada pada 16 April 2020, University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy mengumumkan reka bentuk calon vaksin berasaskan DNA sebagai kemungkinan penyembur hidung.
en-mt: In Canada on April 16, 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced the design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a possible nasal spray.

sourceString: Using bacteriophages, the DNA will be designed to replicate inside human bacteria to produce harmless virus-like particles, which may stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: Dengan menggunakan bakteriofaj, DNA akan direka untuk meniru bakteria manusia untuk menghasilkan zarah seperti virus yang tidak berbahaya, yang boleh merangsangkan sistem imun untuk menghasilkan antibodi melawan virus SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: Using bacteriophages, DNA will be engineered to mimic human bacteria to produce harmless virus-like particles, which can stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.

sourceString: In March 2020, the US government, industry, and three universities pooled resources to access supercomputers from IBM, combined with cloud computing resources from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.
targetString: Pada bulan Mac 2020, kerajaan AS, industri dan tiga universiti mengumpulkan sumber untuk akses superkomputer daripada IBM, digabungkan dengan sumber pengkomputeran awan daripada Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft dan Google.
en-mt: In March 2020, the US government, industry and three universities pooled resources for supercomputer access from IBM, combined with cloud computing resources from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft and Google.

sourceString: Some vaccines have heterologous effects, also called non-specific effects.
targetString: Sesetengah vaksin mempunyai kesan heterolog, juga dipanggil kesan tidak spesifik.
en-mt: Some vaccines have heterologous effects, also called non-specific effects.

sourceString: That means they can have benefits beyond the disease they prevent.
targetString: Perkara ini bermakna mereka boleh mempunyai manfaat selain daripada penyakit yang dicegah mereka.
en-mt: This means they can have benefits other than the diseases they prevent.

sourceString: A further randomized trial in Australia is seeking to enrol 4,170 healthcare workers.
targetString: Percubaan rawak di Australia bertujuan untuk mendaftarkan 4,170 pekerja penjagaan kesihatan.
en-mt: A randomized trial in Australia aimed to enroll 4,170 healthcare workers.

sourceString: It is possible vaccines in development will not be safe or effective.
targetString: Terdapat kemungkinan vaksin yang dalam pembangunan tidak selamat atau berkesan.
en-mt: There is a possibility that vaccines in development are not safe or effective.

sourceString: Early research to assess vaccine efficacy using COVID-19-specific animal models, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and non-human primates, indicate a need for biosafety-level 3 containment measures for handling live viruses, and international coordination to ensure standardized safety procedures.
targetString: Penyelidikan awal untuk menilai keberkesanan vaksin menggunakan model haiwan spesifik COVID-19 seperti tikus transgenik ACE2, haiwan makmal lain dan primat bukan manusia, menunjukkan perlunya langkah-langkah pengekangan keselamatan bio tahap 3 untuk mengendalikan virus hidup, dan koordinasi antarabangsa untuk memastikan prosedur keselamatan standard.
en-mt: Preliminary research to evaluate vaccine efficacy using specific animal models of COVID-19 such as ACE2 transgenic mice, other laboratory animals and non-human primates, shows the need for level 3 biosafety containment measures to handle live virus, and international coordination to ensure standard safety procedures.

sourceString: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.
targetString: Vaksin terhadap SARS dan MERS telah diuji dalam model haiwan bukan manusia.
en-mt: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.

sourceString: As of 2020, there is no cure or protective vaccine for SARS that has been shown to be both safe and effective in humans.
targetString: Pada tahun 2020, tidak ada vaksin penawar atau pelindung untuk SARS yang telah terbukti selamat dan berkesan pada manusia.
en-mt: As of 2020, there is no cure or protective vaccine for SARS that has been proven safe and effective in humans.

sourceString: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of novel vaccines and medicines to treat SARS was a priority for governments and public health agencies around the world.There is also no proven vaccine against MERS.
targetString: Menurut kertas penyelidikan yang diterbitkan pada tahun 2005 dan 2006, pengenalpastian dan pembangunan vaksin dan ubat baharu untuk merawat SARS adalah keutamaan bagi kerajaan dan agensi kesihatan awam di seluruh dunia. Selain itu, tiada vaksin yang terbukti melawan MERS.
en-mt: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of new vaccines and drugs to treat SARS is a priority for governments and public health agencies worldwide. Additionally, there is no proven vaccine against MERS.

sourceString: When MERS became prevalent, it was believed that existing SARS research may provide a useful template for developing vaccines and therapeutics against a MERS-CoV infection.
targetString: Apabila MERS tersebar meluas, penyelidikan SARS yang sedia ada dipercayai dapat menjadi templat berguna untuk membangunkan vaksin dan terapi terhadap jangkitan MERS-CoV.
en-mt: As MERS spreads widely, existing SARS research is believed to be a useful template for developing vaccines and therapies against MERS-CoV infection.

sourceString: As of March 2020, there was one (DNA based) MERS vaccine which completed phase I clinical trials in humans, and three others in progress, all of which are viral-vectored vaccines, two adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac), and one MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).
targetString: Pada Mac 2020, terdapat satu vaksin MERS (berasaskan DNA) yang telah selesai fasa I ujian klinikal pada manusia, dan tiga yang lain sedang berjalan, semuanya dalah vaksin vektor virus, dua vektor adenoviral (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac), dan satu vektor MVA (MVA-MERS-S).
en-mt: As of March 2020, there is one MERS vaccine (DNA-based) that has completed phase I clinical trials in humans, and three others are ongoing, all of which are viral vector vaccines, two adenoviral vectors (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac), and one MVA vector (MVA-MERS-S).

sourceString: Social media posts have promoted a conspiracy theory claiming the virus behind COVID-19 was known and that a vaccine was already available.
targetString: Siaran-siaran di media sosial menggalakkan teori konspirasi yang mendakwa virus di sebalik COVID-19 telah diketahui dan satu vaksin sudah boleh didapati.
en-mt: Posts on social media promote conspiracy theories that claim the virus behind COVID-19 is known and that a vaccine is already available.

sourceString: The patents cited by various social media posts reference existing patents for genetic sequences and vaccines for other strains of coronavirus such as the SARS coronavirus.
targetString: Paten yang dipetik oleh pelbagai siaran media sosial merujuk paten sedia ada untuk jujukan genetik dan vaksin untuk strain koronavirus lain seperti koronavirus SARS.
en-mt: The patents cited by various social media posts reference existing patents for genetic sequences and vaccines for other coronavirus strains such as the SARS coronavirus.

sourceString: b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Penyakit b'Koronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) ialah penyakit jangkitan disebabkan oleh koronavirus sindrom respirasi akut teruk 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
en-mt: b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by the severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Gejala-gejala biasa termasuk demam, batuk dan sesak nafas.
en-mt: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Other symptoms may include fatigue, muscle pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of smell, and abdominal pain.
targetString: Gejala-gejala lain mungkin termasuk keletihan, sakit otot, diarea, sakit kerongkong, hilang deria bau dan sakit abdomen.
en-mt: Other symptoms may include fatigue, muscle pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of sense of smell and abdominal pain.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: Masa sejak pendedahan sehingga pemulaan gelajala biasanya selama lima hari tetapi mungkin bermula antara dua hingga empat belas hari.
en-mt: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is usually five days but may range from two to fourteen days.

sourceString: While the majority of cases result in mild symptoms, some progress to viral pneumonia and multi-organ failure.
targetString: Sementara majoriti kes menyebabkan gejala ringan, sesetengahnya maju menjadi pneumonia virus dan kegagalan berbilang organ.
en-mt: While the majority of cases cause mild symptoms, some progress to viral pneumonia and multi-organ failure.

sourceString: As of 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported across 210 countries and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.
targetString: Setakat 17 April 2020, lebih daripada 2.24 juta kes telah dilaporkan di seluruh 210 negara dan wilayah, menyebabkan lebih daripada 153,000 kematian.
en-mt: As of April 17, 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported across 210 countries and territories, causing more than 153,000 deaths.

sourceString: More than 568,000 people have recovered.The virus is primarily spread between people during close contact, often via small droplets produced by coughing, sneezing, or talking.
targetString: Lebih daripada 568,000 orang pesakit sudah pulih. Virus ini khususnya menyebar antara manusia semasa hubungan dekat, selalunya menerusi titisan kecil dihasilkan menerusi batuk, bersin atau bercakap.
en-mt: More than 568,000 patients have recovered. The virus is mainly spread between people during close contact, often through small droplets produced through coughing, sneezing or talking.

sourceString: While these droplets are produced when breathing out, they usually fall to the ground or onto surfaces rather than being infectious over long distances.
targetString: Sementara titisan-titisan ini dihasilkan semasa menghembus nafas, biasanya ia jatuh ke tanah atau atas permukaan berbanding menjadi jangkitan untuk jarak yang jauh.
en-mt: While these droplets are produced during exhalation, they usually fall to the ground or on surfaces rather than being infectious for long distances.

sourceString: People may also become infected by touching a contaminated surface and then touching their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: Orang ramai juga boleh dijangkiti dengan menyentuh permukaan yang tercemar dan kemudian menyentuh mata, hidung atau mulut mereka.
en-mt: People can also become infected by touching contaminated surfaces and then touching their eyes, nose or mouth.

sourceString: The virus can survive on surfaces up to 72 hours.
targetString: Virus boleh kekal hidup atas permukaan sehingga 72 jam.
en-mt: The virus can remain alive on surfaces for up to 72 hours.

sourceString: It is most contagious during the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.The standard method of diagnosis is by real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) from a nasopharyngeal swab.
targetString: Paling berjangkit semasa tiga hari pertama selepas permulaan gejala, walaupun penyebaran mungkin berlaku sebelum gejala muncul dan dalam peringkat penyakit yang seterusnya. Kaedah standard diagnosis ialah dengan reaksi rantai polimerase transkripsi berbalik masa nyata (cRT-PCR) dari swab nasofaringeal.
en-mt: Most contagious during the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although transmission may occur before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease. The standard method of diagnosis is real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (cRT-PCR) from nasopharyngeal swabs.

sourceString: The use of masks is recommended for those who suspect they have the virus and their caregivers.
targetString: Penggunaan topeng disyorkan kepada mereka yang mengesyaki diri mereka membawa virus dan penjaga mereka.
en-mt: The use of masks is recommended to those who suspect themselves of carrying the virus and their caregivers.

sourceString: Recommendations for mask use by the general public vary, with some authorities recommending against their use, some recommending their use, and others requiring their use.
targetString: Pengesyoran untuk penggunaan topeng oleh orang awam biasa berbeza, dengan sesetengah pihak berkuasa mengesyorkan tidak menggunakannya, sesetengahnya mengesyorkan penggunaannya dan yang lain mewajibkan penggunaannya.
en-mt: Recommendations for the use of masks by the general public vary, with some authorities recommending against their use, some recommending their use and others mandating their use.

sourceString: Currently, there is no vaccine or specific antiviral treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: Pada masa ini, tiada vaksin atau rawatan virus khusus untuk COVID-19.
en-mt: Currently, there is no vaccine or specific viral treatment for COVID-19.

sourceString: Local transmission of the disease has been recorded in most countries across all six WHO regions.
targetString: Pemindahan setempat penyakit dicatatkan di kebanyakan negara seluruh kesemua enam wilayah WHO.
en-mt: Local transmission of the disease was recorded in most countries across all six WHO regions.

sourceString: Those infected with the virus may be asymptomatic or develop flu-like symptoms such as fever, cough, fatigue, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Mereka yang dijangkiti dengan virus mungkin asimptomatik atau menunjukkan gejala-gejala seperti flu seperti demam, batuk, keletihan dan kesesakan nafas.
en-mt: Those infected with the virus may be asymptomatic or show flu-like symptoms such as fever, cough, fatigue and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Emergency symptoms include difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.
targetString: Gejala-gejala kecemasan termasuk kesukaran pernafasan, sakit atau tekanan dada berterusan, kebingungan, kesukaran berjalan dan muka atau bibir kebiruan; perhatian perubatan segera dinasihatkan jika gelaja-gejala ini muncul.
en-mt: Emergency symptoms include difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, confusion, difficulty walking and blue face or lips; Immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms appear.

sourceString: Less commonly, upper respiratory symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose or sore throat may be seen.
targetString: Kurang biasa, gelaja pernafasan bahagian atas seperti bersin, hidung berair atau sakit kerongkong mungkin diperhatikan.
en-mt: Less commonly, upper respiratory symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose or sore throat may be observed.

sourceString: Gastrointestinal symptoms such as nausea, vomiting and diarrhoea have been observed in varying percentages.
targetString: Gejala-gejala gastrousus seperti rasa loya, muntah dan diarea diperhatikan dalam peratusan berbilang.
en-mt: Gastrointestinal symptoms such as nausea, vomiting and diarrhea are observed in multiple percentages.

sourceString: Some cases in China initially presented only with chest tightness and palpitations.
targetString: Beberapa kes di China pada awalnya hanya menunjukkan kesesakan data dan palpitasi.
en-mt: Some cases in China initially only showed data congestion and palpitations.

sourceString: In some, the disease may progress to pneumonia, multi-organ failure, and death.
targetString: Dalam sesetengahnya, penyakit boleh maju menjadi pneumonia, kegagalan berbilang organ dan kematian.
en-mt: In some, the disease can progress to pneumonia, multiple organ failure and death.

sourceString: This is called the incubation period.
targetString: Ini dipanggil tempoh inkubasi.
en-mt: This is called the incubation period.

sourceString: The incubation period for COVID-19 is typically five to six days but may range from two to 14 days.
targetString: Tempoh inkubasi untuk COVID-19 biasanya lima hingga enam hari tetapi mungkin antara dua hingga 14 hari.
en-mt: The incubation period for COVID-19 is usually five to six days but may range from two to 14 days.

sourceString: 97.5% of people who develop symptoms will do so within 11.5 days of infection.Reports indicate that not all who are infected develop symptoms.
targetString: 97.5% pesakit yang menunjukkan gejala-gejala akan melakukannya dalam 11.5 hari sejak jangkitan. Laporan menunjukkan bahawa bukan semua yang dijangkiti menunjukkan gejala.
en-mt: 97.5% of patients who show symptoms will do so within 11.5 days of infection. Reports indicate that not all those infected show symptoms.

sourceString: The role of these asymptomatic carriers in transmission is not yet fully known; however, preliminary evidence suggests that they may contribute to the spread of the disease.
targetString: Peranan pembawa asimptomatik ini dalam pemindahan masih tidak diketahui sepenuhnya; bagaimanapun, bukti awal mencadangkan bahawa ia mungkin menyumbang kepada penyebaran penyakit.
en-mt: The role of these asymptomatic carriers in transmission is still not fully known; however, preliminary evidence suggests that it may contribute to the spread of disease.

sourceString: The proportion of infected people who do not display symptoms is currently unknown and being studied, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) reporting that 20% of all confirmed cases remained asymptomatic during their hospital stay.
targetString: Perkadaran mereka yang dijangkiti tidak menunjukkan gejala-gejala tidak diketahui buat masa ini dan sedang dikaji, dengan Pusat Kawalan dan Pencegahan Penyakit Korea (KDCC) melaporkan bahawa 20% daripada semua kes yang disahkan kekal asimptomatik semasa tinggal di hospital mereka.
en-mt: The proportion of those infected who do not show symptoms is currently unknown and is being studied, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KDCC) reporting that 20% of all confirmed cases remain asymptomatic during their hospital stay.

sourceString: China's National Health Commission began including asymptomatic cases in its daily cases on 1 April; of the 166 infections on that day, 130 (78%) were asymptomatic at the time of testing.
targetString: Suruhanjaya Kesihatan Kebangsaan China mula memasukkan kes asimptomatik dalam kes harian mereka pada 1 April; daripada 166 jangkitan pada hari itu, 130 (78%) merupakan asimptomatik pada masa pengujian.
en-mt: China's National Health Commission began including asymptomatic cases in their daily cases on April 1; of the 166 infections that day, 130 (78%) were asymptomatic at the time of testing.

sourceString: Both sputum and saliva can carry large viral loads.
targetString: Kahak dan saliva boleh membawa beban virus yang banyak.
en-mt: Phlegm and saliva can carry a large viral load.

sourceString: Loud talking releases more droplets than normal talking.
targetString: Bercakap kuat melepaskan lebih titisan berbanding bercakap secara normal.
en-mt: Speaking loudly releases more drops than speaking normally.

sourceString: A study in Singapore found that an uncovered cough can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 meters (15 feet).
targetString: Satu kajian di Singapura mendapati bahawa batuk tidak menutup mulut boleh menyebabkan titisan bergerak sehingga 4.5 meter (15 kaki).
en-mt: A study in Singapore found that coughing without covering the mouth can cause droplets to travel up to 4.5 meters (15 feet).

sourceString: Though the virus is not generally airborne, the National Academy of Science has suggested that bioaerosol transmission may be possible and air collectors positioned in the hallway outside of people's rooms yielded samples positive for viral RNA.
targetString: Walaupun virus bukannya secara bawaan, Akademik Sains Kebangsaan mencadangkan bahawa pemindahan bioaerosol berkemungkinan dan pengumpul udara pada kedudukan dalam lorong di luar bilik orang ramai menunjukkan sampel positif untuk RNA virus.
en-mt: Although the virus is not airborne, the National Academies of Sciences suggest that bioaerosol transfer is likely and air collectors at positions in hallways outside public rooms showed positive samples for viral RNA.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolised and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: Beberapa prosedur perubatan seperti intubasi dan resusitasi kardiopulmonari (CPR) mungkin menyebabkan rembesan respirasi menjadi aerosol dan seterusnya menyebabkan penyebaran bawaan.
en-mt: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to become aerosols and thus cause airborne spread.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread via feces, this risk is believed to be low.The virus is most contagious when people are symptomatic; while spread may be possible before symptoms emerge, the risk is low.
targetString: Walaupun ada kebimbangan ia menyebar menerusi tinja, risiko ini dipercayai rendah. Virus sangat menular apabila orang yang asimptomatik; walaupun penyebaran adalah mungkin sebelum kemunculan gejala, risikonya rendah.
en-mt: Although there is concern that it is spread through faeces, this risk is believed to be low. The virus is highly contagious when people are asymptomatic; although transmission is possible before the appearance of symptoms, the risk is low.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) says while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) menyebut walaupun keseluruhannya tidak jelas tentang mudahnya penyakit tersebar, seseorang menjangkiti dua hingga tiga orang secara umumnya. Virus bertahan untuk beberapa jam sehingga beberapa hari pada permukaan.
en-mt: The European Center for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) mentions that although it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person infects two to three people in general. Viruses survive for several hours to several days on surfaces.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for one day on cardboard, for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and stainless steel (AISI 304), and for up to four hours on 99% copper.
targetString: Khususnya, virus ditemui sebagai boleh dikesan untuk sehari atas kadbod, sehingga tiga hari atas plastik (polipropilena) dan keluli tahan karat (AISI 304), and sehingga empat jam atas 99% tembaga.
en-mt: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for one day on cardboard, up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and stainless steel (AISI 304), and up to four hours on 99% copper.

sourceString: This, however, varies depending on the humidity and temperature.
targetString: Namun, ini berbeza bergantung pada kelembapan dan suhu.
en-mt: However, this varies depending on humidity and temperature.

sourceString: Soap and detergent are also effective if correctly used; soap products degrade the virus' fatty protective layer, deactivating it, as well as freeing them from skin and other surfaces.
targetString: Sabun dan detergen juga berkesan jika digunakan dengan betul; produk sabun melemahkan lapisan perlindungan lemak virus, menyahaktifkannya serta membebaskannya dari kulit dan permukaan lain.
en-mt: Soaps and detergents are also effective if used correctly; soap products weaken the virus' protective layer of fat, deactivating it and freeing it from the skin and other surfaces.

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (a surgical disinfectant), are less effective.In a Hong Kong study, saliva samples were taken a median of two days after the start of hospitalization.
targetString: Larutan lain seperti benzalkonium klorida dan klorheksidina glukonat (bahan penyahjangkit pembedahan) kurang berkesan. Dalam satu kajian Hong Kong, contoh saliva diambil untuk median selama dua hari selepas permulaan kemasukan hospital.
en-mt: Other solutions such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (a surgical disinfectant) are less effective. In one Hong Kong study, saliva samples were taken for a median of two days after the onset of hospitalization.

sourceString: In five of six patients, the first sample showed the highest viral load, and the sixth patient showed the highest viral load on the second day tested.
targetString: Dalam lima daripada enam pesakit, sampel pertama menunjukkan beban virus tertinggi, and pesakit keenam menunjukkan beban virus tertinggi pada hari kedua diuji.
en-mt: In five of the six patients, the first sample showed the highest viral load, and the sixth patient showed the highest viral load on the second day tested.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: Koronavirus sindrom respirasi akut teruk 2 (SARS-CoV-2) ialah novel koronavirus sindrom respirasi akut teruk, pertama diasingkan daripada tiga orang dengan pneumonia berkaitan dengan kluster kes penyakit respirasi akut di Wuhan.
en-mt: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia associated with a cluster of acute respiratory disease cases in Wuhan.

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.
targetString: Semua ciri-ciri novel virus SARS-CoV-2 berlaku dalam koronavirus berkaitan secara semula jadi.
en-mt: All the novel features of the SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in naturally related coronaviruses.

sourceString: Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: Di luar badan manusia, virus dibunuh oleh sabun isi rumah, yang membocorkan gelembung pelindungnya. SARS-CoV-2 hampir berkaitan dengan SARS-CoV asal.
en-mt: Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which leaks its protective bubble. SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.

sourceString: The lungs are the organs most affected by COVID-19 because the virus accesses host cells via the enzyme angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), which is most abundant in the type II alveolar cells of the lungs.
targetString: Paru-paru ialah organ yang paling terjejas oleh COVID-19 kerana virus mengakses sel hos menerusi enzim penukar enzim angiotensin (ACE2), yang paling banyak dalam sel alveolus jenis II pada paru-paru.
en-mt: The lung is the organ most affected by COVID-19 because the virus accesses host cells through angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE2), which is most abundant in type II alveolar cells of the lung.

sourceString: The virus uses a special surface glycoprotein called a "spike" (peplomer) to connect to ACE2 and enter the host cell.
targetString: Virus menggunakan permukaan khas glikoprotein yang dipanggil "pepaku" (peplomer) untuk menyambung pada ACE2 dan memasuki sel hos.
en-mt: The virus uses a special surface glycoprotein called a "peplomer" (peplomer) to attach to ACE2 and enter the host cell.

sourceString: Acute cardiac injury was found in 12% of infected people admitted in hospital in Wuhan, China, and is more frequent in severe disease.
targetString: Kecederaan kardium akut ditemui dalam 12% orang dijangkiti yang dimasukkan ke hospital di Wuhan, China dan lebih kerap dalam penyakit teruk.
en-mt: Acute cardiac injury was found in 12% of infected people hospitalized in Wuhan, China and more often in severe disease.

sourceString: Rates of cardiovascular symptoms is high, owing to the systemic inflammatory response and immune system disorders during disease progression, but acute myocardial injury may also be related to ACE2 receptors in the heart.
targetString: Kadar gejala kardiovaskular tinggi, disebabkan tindakan balas keradangan sistemik dan penyakit sistem imun semasa kemajuan penyakit, tetapi kecederaan miokardium akut mungkin juga berkaitan dengan reseptor ACE2 dalam jantung.
en-mt: The rate of cardiovascular symptoms is high, due to systemic inflammatory response and immune system disease during disease progression, but acute myocardial injury may also be related to ACE2 receptors in the heart.

sourceString: ACE2 receptors are highly expressed in the heart and are involved in heart function.
targetString: Reseptor ACE2 sangat banyak di dalam jantung dan terlibat dalam fungsi jantung.
en-mt: ACE2 receptors are abundant in the heart and are involved in cardiac function.

sourceString: A high incidence of thrombosis (31%) and venous thromboembolism (25%) have been found in ICU patients with COVID-19 infections and may be related to poor prognosis.Autopsies of people who died of COVID-19 have found diffuse alveolar damage (DAD), and lymphocyte-containing inflammatory infiltrates within the lung.
targetString: Insiden tinggi trombosis (31%) dan tromboembolisme vena (25%) ditemui dalam pesakit ICU dengan jangkitan COVID-19 dan mungkin berkaitan dengan prognosis lemah. Autopsi mereka yang meninggal dunia kerana COVID-19 telah menemui kerosakan alveolus difus (DAD), dan pencerobohan limfosit mengandungi keradangan di dalam paru-paru.
en-mt: A high incidence of thrombosis (31%) and venous thromboembolism (25%) was found in ICU patients with COVID-19 infection and may be related to poor prognosis. Autopsies of those who died of COVID-19 have found diffuse alveolar damage (DAD), and lymphocyte invasion containing inflammation in the lungs.

sourceString: Although SARS-COV-2 has a tropism for ACE2-expressing epithelial cells of the respiratory tract, patients with severe COVID-19 have symptoms of systemic hyperinflammation.
targetString: Walaupun SARS-COV-2 mempunyai tropisme untuk sel epitelial ekspresi ACE2 pada saluran pernafasan, pesakit dengan COVID-19 teruk mempunyai gejala hiperkeradangan sistemik.
en-mt: Although SARS-COV-2 has a tropism for ACE2-expressing epithelial cells in the airways, patients with severe COVID-19 have symptoms of systemic hyperinflammation.

sourceString: In particular, pathogenic GM-CSF-secreting T-cells were shown to correlate with the recruitment of inflammatory IL-6-secreting monocytes and severe lung pathology in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Khususnya, sel T merembeskan GM-CSF patogenik ditunjukkan bagi mengkorelasi dengan pengambilan keradangan monosit merembeskan IL-6 dan patologi paru-paru teruk dalam pesakit COVID-19.
en-mt: In particular, T cells secreting pathogenic GM-CSF were shown to correlate with inflammatory recruitment of IL-6 secreting monocytes and severe lung pathology in COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: Lymphocytic infiltrates have also been reported at autopsy.
targetString: Pencerobohan limfositik juga dilaporkan semasa autopsi.
en-mt: Lymphocytic invasion was also reported at autopsy.

sourceString: The WHO has published several testing protocols for the disease.
targetString: WHO menerbitkan beberapa protokol pengujian untuk penyakit.
en-mt: WHO publishes several testing protocols for diseases.

sourceString: The standard method of testing is real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: Kaedah standard pengujian ialah reaksi rantai polimerase transkripsi berbalik masa nyata (rPT-PCR).
en-mt: The standard method of testing is real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rPT-PCR).

sourceString: The test is typically done on respiratory samples obtained by a nasopharyngeal swab; however, a nasal swab or sputum sample may also be used.
targetString: Ujian biasanya dilakukan pada sampel pernafasan diperoleh dengan swab nasofaringeal; bagaimanapun, swab hidung atau sampel kahak mungkin juga digunakan.
en-mt: The test is usually performed on a breath sample obtained with a nasopharyngeal swab; however, a nasal swab or sputum sample may also be used.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to two days.
targetString: Keputusannya secara umumnya boleh didapati dalam beberapa jam sehingga dua hari.
en-mt: Results are generally available within a few hours to two days.

sourceString: Blood tests can be used, but these require two blood samples taken two weeks apart and the results have little immediate value.
targetString: Ujian darah boleh digunakan tetapi ini memerlukan dua sampel darah diambil dua minggu berjarak dan keputusannya mempunyai nilai segera yang sedikit.
en-mt: A blood test can be used but this requires two blood samples to be taken two weeks apart and the results have little immediate value.

sourceString: Chinese scientists were able to isolate a strain of the coronavirus and publish the genetic sequence so laboratories across the world could independently develop polymerase chain reaction (PCR) tests to detect infection by the virus.
targetString: Ahli sains China mampu mengasingkan strain koronavirus dan menerbitkan jujukan genetik agar makmal seluruh dunia boleh secara bebas membangunkan ujian reaksi rantai polimerase (PCR) untuk mengesan jangkitan oleh virus.
en-mt: Chinese scientists were able to isolate a strain of the coronavirus and publish the genetic sequence so that laboratories around the world could independently develop polymerase chain reaction (PCR) tests to detect infection by the virus.

sourceString: As of 4 April 2020, antibody tests (which may detect active infections and whether a person had been infected in the past) were in development, but not yet widely used.
targetString: Setakat 4 April 2020, ujian antibodi (mungkin mengesan jangkitan aktif dan sama ada seseorang itu pernah dijangkiti pada masa lalu) sedang dalam pembangunan tetapi tidak digunakan secara meluas.
en-mt: As of April 4, 2020, antibody tests (which may detect active infection and whether a person has been infected in the past) are in development but not widely used.

sourceString: The Chinese experience with testing has shown the accuracy is only 60 to 70%.
targetString: Pengalaman China dengan pengujian telah menunjukkan ketepatan hanyalah 60 hingga 70%.
en-mt: China's experience with testing has shown accuracy to be only 60 to 70%.

sourceString: The FDA in the United States approved the first point-of-care test on 21 March 2020 for use at the end of that month.Diagnostic guidelines released by Zhongnan Hospital of Wuhan University suggested methods for detecting infections based upon clinical features and epidemiological risk.
targetString: FDA di Amerika Syarikat meluluskan ujian permulaan penjagaan pertama pada 21 Mac 2020 untuk digunakan pada hujung bulan itu. Garis panduan diagnostik diterbitkan oleh Hospital Zhongnan di Wuhan University mencadangkan kaedah untuk pengesanan jangkitan berdasarkan ciri klinikal dan risiko epidemiologi.
en-mt: The FDA in the United States approved the first point-of-care test on March 21, 2020 for use at the end of the month. Diagnostic guidelines published by Zhongnan Hospital at Wuhan University suggest methods for infection detection based on clinical features and epidemiological risk.

sourceString: Bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution are common in early infection.
targetString: Kelegapan kaca hancur multilobar bilateral dengan pengagihan periferi, asimmetrik dan posterior adalah biasa semasa jangkitan awal.
en-mt: Bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacities with a peripheral, asymmetric, and posterior distribution are common during early infection.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving (lobular septal thickening with variable alveolar filling), and consolidation may appear as the disease progresses.
targetString: Dominans subpleura, banyak turapan (penebalan septum berlobul dengan pengisian alveolus berbilang) dan penyatuan mungkin muncul apabila penyakit kian maju.
en-mt: Subpleural predominance, multiple pavements (thickening of the lobulated septum with multiple alveolar fillings) and consolidation may appear as the disease progresses.

sourceString: Few data are available about microscopic lesions and the pathophysiology of COVID-19.
targetString: Beberapa data boleh didapati mengenai lesi monoskopik dan patofisiologi COVID-19.
en-mt: Few data are available regarding monoscopic lesions and the pathophysiology of COVID-19.

sourceString: The main pathological findings at autopsy are:
targetString: Penemuan patologikal utama semasa autopsi ialah:
en-mt: The main pathological findings during autopsy are:

sourceString: Macroscopy: pleurisy, pericarditis, lung consolidation and pulmonary oedema
targetString: Makroskopi: pleurisi, perikarditis, penyatuan paru-paru dan edema pulmonari
en-mt: Macroscopy: pleurisy, pericarditis, lung consolidation and pulmonary edema

sourceString: Four types of severity of viral pneumonia can be observed:
targetString: Empat jenis keterukan untuk pneumonia virus boleh diperhatikan:
en-mt: Four types of severity for viral pneumonia can be observed:

sourceString: mild pneumonia: pulmonary oedema, pneumocyte hyperplasia, large atypical pneumocytes, interstitial inflammation with lymphocytic infiltration and multinucleated giant cell formation
targetString: pneumonia ringan: edema pulmonari, pneumosit, hiperplasia, pneumosit atipikal besar, keradangan ruang-antara dengan pencerobohan limfositik dan formasi sel gergasi multinukleat
en-mt: mild pneumonia: pulmonary edema, pneumocytes, hyperplasia, large atypical pneumocytes, interstitial inflammation with lymphocytic infiltration and multinucleated giant cell formation

sourceString: severe pneumonia: diffuse alveolar damage (DAD) with diffuse alveolar exudates.
targetString: pneumonia teruk: kerosakan alveolus difus (DAD) dengan eksudat alveolus difus.
en-mt: severe pneumonia: diffuse alveolar damage (DAD) with diffuse alveolar exudate.

sourceString: DAD is the cause of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and severe hypoxemia.
targetString: DAD ialah penyebab sindrom distres respirasi akut (ARDS) dan hipoksemia teruk.
en-mt: DAD is the cause of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and severe hypoxemia.

sourceString: healing pneumonia: organisation of exudates in alveolar cavities and pulmonary interstitial fibrosis
targetString: memulih pneumonia: penyusunan eksudat dalam kaviti alveolus dan fibrosis ruang-antara pulmonari
en-mt: recovering pneumonia: accumulation of exudate in the alveolar cavity and fibrosis of the pulmonary interstitial space

sourceString: Blood: disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC); leukoerythroblastic reaction
targetString: Darah: koagulanisasi intravaskular disebarkan (DIC), rekais leukoeritroblastik
en-mt: Blood: disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC), leukoerythroblastic resection

sourceString: Preventive measures to reduce the chances of infection include staying at home, avoiding crowded places, washing hands with soap and water often and for at least 20 seconds, practising good respiratory hygiene and avoiding touching the eyes, nose or mouth with unwashed hands.
